name: Shirvallah, the Tiger
card_text: Divine Shield, Rush, Lifesteal Costs (1) less for each Manayou've spent on spells.
flavor_text: On bended knee Thekal placed his weapon upon Shirvallah’s altar, whereupon she slowly knocked it off with her paw.

name: Arcane Giant
card_text: Costs (1) less for each spellyou've cast this game.
flavor_text: Claims to be drawn to Karazhan because of the ley lines. Actually, just loves Moroes’ cooking.

name: Clockwork Giant
card_text: Costs (1) less for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavor_text: He and Mountain Giant don't get along.

name: Mountain Giant
card_text: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor_text: His mother said that he was just big boned.

name: C'Thun
card_text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack randomly split among all enemies.
flavor_text: C'Thun's least favorite Hearthstone card: Eye for an Eye.

name: Deathwing
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
flavor_text: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated. Daddy issues?

name: Deathwing, Dragonlord
card_text: Deathrattle: Put all Dragons from your hand into the battlefield.
flavor_text: To his credit, Deathwing really took to heart the feedback he was receiving that he needed to be "more of a team player".

name: Molten Giant
card_text: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
flavor_text: He gets terrible heartburn. BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

name: Grave Horror
card_text: TauntCosts (1) less for each spellyou've cast this game.
flavor_text: Trolls can regenerate lost limbs, but this is what they do with the leftovers.

name: Snowfury Giant
card_text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
flavor_text: This minion goes all the way to 11!

name: Aviana
card_text: Your minions cost (1).
flavor_text: Call her "Tweety". She'll find it real funny. I PROMISE.

name: Big Bad Archmage
card_text: At the end of your turn, summon a random6-Cost minion.
flavor_text: "My, my, what big minions I have!"

name: Colossus of the Moon
card_text: Divine ShieldReborn
flavor_text: Strike him down, and you'll face the Colossus of the New Moon.

name: C'Thun, the Shattered
card_text: Start of Game: Break intopieces. Battlecry: Deal 30damage randomly splitamong all enemies.
flavor_text: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

name: Frost Giant
card_text: Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
flavor_text: Don't ask him about the beard. JUST DON'T.

name: Goldshire Gnoll
card_text: RushCosts (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor_text: They're searching for one ring. They're pretty sure someone said Goldshire.

name: Hakkar, the Soulflayer
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a Corrupted Blood into each player's deck.
flavor_text: ATTENTION: Do not enter any major city while infected with the Corrupted Blood!

name: Jumbo Imp
card_text: Costs (1) less whenever a friendly Demon dies while this is in your hand.
flavor_text: Jumbo in size! Huge in E.V.I.L.!

name: King Phaoris
card_text: Battlecry: For each spellin your hand, summon arandom minion of thesame Cost.
flavor_text: When you're the king of the cats, the whole desert is your litterbox.

name: Lokholar the Ice Lord
card_text: Rush, Windfury Costs (5) less if you have 15 Health or less.
flavor_text: Suddenly the names of Iceblood Tower and Iceblood Garrison make a lot more sense.

name: Mecha'thun
card_text: Deathrattle: If you have nocards in your deck, hand,and battlefield, destroythe enemy hero.
flavor_text: "Your software will fail. Your users will abandon you. You are already obsolete."

name: Neptulon the Tidehunter
card_text: Colossal +2, Rush, WindfuryWhenever Neptulon attacks,if you control any Hands,they attack instead.
flavor_text: Neptulon, tired of filling hands, is now throwing hands.

name: Nozari
card_text: Battlecry: Restore both heroes to full Health.
flavor_text: In another timeline, she was called Yeszari.

name: N'Zoth, the Corruptor
card_text: Battlecry: Summon your Deathrattle minions that died this game.
flavor_text: Has not been able to get "Under the Sea" out of his head for like FIVE THOUSAND YEARS.

name: Emeriss
card_text: Battlecry: Double the Attack and Health of all minions in your hand.
flavor_text: Taste your world's corruption! It tastes like chicken.

name: Faceless Behemoth
flavor_text: Rejected names: Forty-Foot Faceless, Big ol' No-face, Huge Creature Sans Face, Teddy.

name: Kun the Forgotten King
card_text: Choose One - Gain 10 Armor; or Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: Aya siphons a bit of Kun's soul to animate each golem in her Jade army. To his credit, he's being a great sport about it.

name: Living Monument
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: This is not the greatest card in the world. This is just a monument.

name: Raid Boss Onyxia
card_text: Rush. Immune whileyou control a Whelp.Battlecry: Summon six 2/1 Whelps with Rush.
flavor_text: Onyxia chose her guises to manipulate mortals, but her true form? That was reserved for ending them.

name: Sea Giant
card_text: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavor_text: See? Giant.

name: Ultrasaur
flavor_text: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.

name: Varian Wrynn
card_text: Battlecry: Draw 3 cards.Put any minions you drew directly into the battlefield.
flavor_text: Leader of the Alliance! Father of Anduin! Also he likes to play Arena, and he averages 12 wins.

name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End
card_text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell for each spell you've cast this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor_text: I spell your doom... Y-O-U-R D-O-O-M!

name: Y'Shaarj, Rage Unbound
card_text: At the end of your turn, put a minion from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor_text: When he's working out, he binds all that rage back into a ponytail.

name: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder
card_text: Battlecry: Choose acharacter. If it's friendly,restore 8 Health. If it's an enemy, deal 8 damage.
flavor_text: Friendly Fire: Off

name: Anub'arak
card_text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand and summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor_text: Was actually a pretty nice guy before, you know, the whole Lich King thing.

name: Arch-Thief Rafaam
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a powerful Artifact.
flavor_text: He's very good at retrieving artifacts. From other people's museums.

name: Baku the Mooneater
card_text: Start of Game:If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, upgradeyour Hero Power.
flavor_text: In her defense, it did look like a cookie.

name: Blood of G'huun
card_text: TauntAt the end of your turn,summon a 5/5 copy of aminion in your deck.
flavor_text: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

name: Burly Shovelfist
card_text: Rush
flavor_text: Shovel beats paper and rock!

name: Carnival Clown
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Summon 2 copiesof this. Corrupt: Fill yourboard with copies.
flavor_text: Send in the clowns!

name: Dragonhatcher
card_text: At the end of your turn, Recruit a Dragon.
flavor_text: Which came first? The dragon or the dragonhatcher?

name: Giant Mastodon
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

name: Icehowl
card_text: ChargeCan't attack heroes.
flavor_text: This massive yeti just closes his eyes and charges at the nearest target. The nearest Target is a couple blocks away and has sick deals on skateboards.

name: King Krush
card_text: Charge
flavor_text: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Krul the Unshackled
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck hasno duplicates, summon all Demons from your hand.
flavor_text: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

name: Majordomo Executus
card_text: Deathrattle: Replace your hero with Ragnaros the Firelord.
flavor_text: You thought Executus turned you into Ragnaros, but really Ragnaros was in you the whole time.

name: Mayor Noggenfogger
card_text: All targets are chosen randomly.
flavor_text: This flavor text was randomly generated. If it happens to form words and make sense, that is purely by chance.

name: Mulchmuncher
card_text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly Treant that died this game.
flavor_text:
The latest advancement in
hippo-botany.

name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep
card_text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly minion of each minion type.
flavor_text: It really just wants to cuddle all the creatures of Azeroth.

name: Scrapyard Colossus
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Felcracked Colossuswith Taunt.
flavor_text: Heap on heapin' on.

name: The Boom Reaver
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of a minion in your deck. Give it Rush.
flavor_text: “What’s better than reaving? BOOM reaving!”

name: Tyrantus
card_text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
card_text: Battlecry: If you've cast10 spells this game, spinthe Wheel of Yogg-Saron.@({0} left!)@(Ready!)
flavor_text: Yogg take the wheel!

name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
card_text: Battlecry: Add a copy of eachCorrupted card you've playedthis game to your hand.They cost (0) this turn.
flavor_text: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

name: Alexstrasza
card_text: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavor_text: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone. Except Deathwing. And Malygos. And Nekros.

name: Anubisath Warbringer
card_text: Deathrattle: Give all minions in your hand +3/+3.
flavor_text: Some dogs will bring you a bone or a squeaky toy. This one brings war!

name: Blade of C'Thun
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Add its Attack and Health to your C'Thun's (wherever it is).
flavor_text: C'Thun demands a sacrifice! Preferably a Deathwing.

name: Blood of The Ancient One
card_text: If you control two of theseat the end of your turn, merge them into 'The Ancient One'.
flavor_text: Add two cups of Blood of the Ancient One to one cup of lemon juice. Add just a dash of sugar and stir. Delicious!

name: Bull Dozer
card_text: Divine Shield
flavor_text: Leave them alone for two minutes and they go right into sleep mode.

name: Dragoncaller Alanna
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Dragon for each spell you cast this game that costs (5) or more.
flavor_text: Her secret is using a gentle voice and carrying a baggie of hotdogs.

name: Dragonqueen Alexstrasza
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck hasno duplicates, add 2 otherrandom Dragons to yourhand. They cost (0).
flavor_text: Givin' lives and takin' names.

name: Hadronox
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon your Taunt minions thatdied this game.
flavor_text: The viziers of Azjol-Nerub released Hadronox as a last-ditch effort to hold back the Lich King. They did so by VERY carefully scooping him up in a LARGE newspaper and releasing him.

name: Kalecgos
card_text: Your first spell eachturn costs (0).Battlecry: Discovera spell.
flavor_text: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: King Mosh
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged minions.
flavor_text: He's a terror at concerts.

name: Mal'Ganis
card_text: Your other Demons have +2/+2.Your hero is Immune.
flavor_text: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

name: Malygos
card_text: Spell Damage +5
flavor_text: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic. He gets so mad!

name: Master Oakheart
card_text: Battlecry: Recruit a 1, 2, and 3-Attack minion.
flavor_text: His adventuring party consists of Goldshire Footman, Frostwolf Grunt and Hadronox.

name: Mekgineer Thermaplugg
card_text: Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a Leper Gnome.
flavor_text: He was obsessed with explosives until he discovered knitting. Now he yells, “SWEATERS! MORE SWEATERS!”

name: Mogu Fleshshaper
card_text: Rush. Costs (1) less for eachminion on the battlefield.
flavor_text: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

name: Nefarian
card_text: Battlecry: Add 2 random spells to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor_text: They call him "Blackwing" because he's a black dragon...... and he's got wings.

name: North Sea Kraken
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavor_text: You have no idea how tired this guy is of being released.

name: Nozdormu
card_text: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
flavor_text: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Obsidian Statue
card_text: Taunt, LifestealDeathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

name: Onyxia
card_text: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavor_text: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor. You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Oondasta
card_text: RushOverkill: Summon a Beast from your hand.
flavor_text: Adorning devilsaurs with armor and feathers is a respected job in troll culture, although it has a high turnover rate.

name: Cauldron Elemental
card_text: Your other Elementals have +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Decorating tip: Unused cauldrons can make a lovely elemental display.

name: Sathrovarr
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a copy of it to your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor_text: Just wait until you also find a copy in your pocket. And your desk! And your FRIDGE!!

name: Sleepy Dragon
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Ysera, Unleashed
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle 7 DreamPortals into your deck.When drawn, summona random Dragon.
flavor_text: Releash the Dragon!

name: Abominable Lieutenant
card_text: At the end of your turn,eat a random enemy minion and gain its stats.
flavor_text: If you can't join 'em, eat 'em.

name: Akali, the Rhino
card_text: RushOverkill: Draw a Rush minion from your deck. Give it +5/+5.
flavor_text: Most trolls only get to “AAAAHHH!” and don’t make it to the “kali” part.

name: Archivist Elysiana
card_text: Battlecry: Discover 5 cards. Replace your deck with 2 copies of each.
flavor_text: Your deck is just another organizational challenge to her.

name: Batterhead
card_text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor_text: When it comes to problem-solving, he always uses his head.

name: Deathwing, Mad Aspect
card_text: Battlecry: Attack ALLother minions.
flavor_text: Bite that one, bite that other one, claw this one, swallow that one whole....

name: Deranged Doctor
card_text: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Unfortunately, his doctorate is in Murloc Literature.

name: Doomcaller
card_text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is). If it's dead, shuffle it into your deck.
flavor_text: "Hello, is Doom there? No? Can I leave a message?"

name: Foe Reaper 4000
card_text: Also damages the minions next to whomever it attacks.
flavor_text: Foe reaping is really not so different from harvest reaping, at the end of the day.

name: Fossilized Devilsaur
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Beast, gain Taunt.
flavor_text: This was the only job he could get after the dinosaur theme park debacle.

name: Gigafin
card_text: Colossal +1. Battlecry:Devour all enemy minions.Deathrattle: Spit themback out.
flavor_text: How much storage does Gigafin's Maw have? About a giga bite.

name: Onyxia the Broodmother
card_text: At the end of each turn, fill your board with 1/1 Whelps.
flavor_text: Throw more dots, throw more dots, more dots, more dots!

name: Ozruk
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Gain +5 Healthfor each Elemental youplayed last turn.
flavor_text: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

name: Runaway Blackwing
card_text: At the end of your turn,deal 9 damage to arandom enemy minion.
flavor_text: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

name: Shudderwock
card_text: Battlecry: Repeat all otherBattlecries from cards youplayed this game (targetschosen randomly).
flavor_text: Beware the Shudderwock, my son. We're fresh out of vorpal daggers.

name: Naga Sea Witch
card_text: Your cards cost (5).
flavor_text: If she had studied harder, she would have been a C+ witch.

name: Soggoth the Slitherer
card_text: TauntCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Don't tell Soggoth, but in the future he gets totally owned by the Master's Glaive and his skull becomes a tourist attraction.

name: Voidlord
card_text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon three1/3 Demons with Taunt.
flavor_text: Never let it hold your checkbook.

name: Volcanic Lumberer
card_text: TauntCosts (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor_text: The roots, the roots, the roots is on fire!

name: Ysera
card_text: At the end of your turn, add a Dream Card to your hand.
flavor_text: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream. Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Ysera the Dreamer
card_text: Battlecry: Add one of each Dream card to your hand.
flavor_text: Quick! Quick! Write it down before you forget them all!

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
card_text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor_text: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords. And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Anomalus
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: That's short for "Anomnomnomnomalus".

name: Arcane Devourer
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Likes her magic with a pinch of salt.

name: Captain Hooktusk
card_text: Battlecry: Summon 3 Pirates from your deck. Give them Rush.
flavor_text: "You three! Get in the cannon!"

name: Catrina Muerte
card_text: At the end of your turn,summon a friendly minionthat died this game.
flavor_text: She always manages to lift your spirits.

name: Cenarius
card_text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavor_text: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.

name: Charged Devilsaur
card_text: ChargeBattlecry: Can't attack heroes this turn.
flavor_text: What happens when a dinosaur mixes soda and pop rocks.

name: Chromaggus
card_text: Whenever you draw a card, put another copy into your hand.
flavor_text: Left head and right head can never agree about what to eat for dinner, so they always end up just eating ramen again.

name: Da Undatakah
card_text: Battlecry: Gain theDeathrattle effects of3 friendly minions thatdied this game.
flavor_text:
First Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Second: Draw 2 cards.
Third: Throw Mon'kind off a steel cage and plummet sixteen feet through an announcer’s table.

name: Eldritch Horror
flavor_text: Often wonders what path his life might have taken if he wasn't named, you know, "Eldritch Horror".

name: Fel Lord Betrug
card_text: Whenever you draw aminion, summon a copy with Rush that dies atend of turn.
flavor_text: Nobody else likes rush hour.

name: Force-Tank MAX
card_text: Divine Shield
flavor_text: There is a factory in Tanaris for crafting force-tanks, but it only ever made two, because of cost overruns.

name: Geosculptor Yip
card_text: At the end of your turn, summon a random minion with Cost equal to your Armor (up to 10).
flavor_text: Once crafted a gauntlet out of earwax and pure ambition.

name: Giant Sand Worm
card_text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor_text: Banned from every all-you-can-eat buffet on Azeroth.

name: Gilnean Royal Guard
card_text: Divine Shield, RushEach turn this is in your hand,swap its Attack and Health.
flavor_text: Admittedly, they kind of dropped the ball with Prince Liam.

name: Grand Archivist
card_text: At the end of your turn, cast a spell from your deck (targets chosen randomly).
flavor_text: Qualifications: Found pointy hat.

name: Grizzled Guardian
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Recruit 2 minions that cost (4) or less.
flavor_text: Favorite sandwich? Grizzled cheese.

name: Heroic Innkeeper
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 for each other friendly minion.
flavor_text: We reserve the right to refuse service to any 1/1.

name: Hir'eek, the Bat
card_text: Battlecry: Fill your board with copies of this minion.
flavor_text: REPEL’S EFFECT WORE OFF.

name: Jepetto Joybuzz
card_text: Battlecry: Draw 2 minions from your deck. Set their Attack, Health, and Cost to 1.
flavor_text: “I’m a real toy now!”

name: Kathrena Winterwisp
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Recruit a Beast.
flavor_text: She’s not one of those treehugger elves – but she does like the occasional cuddle.

name: Kel'Thuzad
card_text: At the end of each turn, summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavor_text: Kel'Thuzad could not resist the call of the Lich King. Even when it's just a robo-call extolling the Lich King's virtues.

name: Marin the Fox
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/8 Treasure Chest for your opponent. (Break it for awesome loot!)
flavor_text: My name is Marin the Fox. You took my treasure. Prepare to die.

name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Gain 8 Armor.
flavor_text: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

name: Mosh'Ogg Enforcer
card_text: TauntDivine Shield
flavor_text: Can’t break the rules if you can’t read ‘em.

name: Natalie Seline
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavor_text: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: Octosari
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
flavor_text: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

name: Pit Crocolisk
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage.
flavor_text: PIT! Not PET!

name: Primordial Drake
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Deal 2 damageto all other minions.
flavor_text: Before he became a rap artist.

name: Princess Talanji
card_text: Battlecry: Summon all minions from your hand that didn't start in your deck.
flavor_text: Everyone wants to be a princess, but nobody ever considers the size of the hat.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
card_text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Ragnaros, Lightlord
card_text: At the end of your turn, restore 8 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor_text: What happens when you try and corrupt a corrupted firelord? DOUBLE NEGATIVE, INSECT!

name: Rhonin
card_text: Deathrattle: Add 3 copies of Arcane Missiles to your hand.
flavor_text: A masterless shamurai.

name: Grommash Hellscream
card_text: ChargeHas +6 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes! Maybe not his best decision.

name: Gruul
card_text: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavor_text: He's Gruul "the Dragonkiller". He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Hex Lord Malacrass
card_text: Battlecry: Add a copy of your opening hand to your hand (except this card).
flavor_text: Extremely awkward cousin of Hex Lord Malaclass.

name: Ironbark Protector
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
card_text: Battlecry: If you played anElemental last turn, cast anElemental Invocation.
flavor_text: All that's missing is a little heart.

name: Kazakusan
card_text: Battlecry: If you played 4other Dragons this game,craft a custom deckof Treasures.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor_text: Kazakus had always seemed too clever a sort to bottle a brew that could do him any harm. Perhaps it should come as no surprise, then, that the originator of the Dragonfire Potion was a dragon himself.

name: King Togwaggle
card_text: Battlecry: Swap deckswith your opponent.Give them a Ransomspell to swap back.
flavor_text: Management of the Kobold Empire requires a careful balance between a lack of social services and fiscal irresponsibility.

name: Lucentbark
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Go Dormant. Restore 5 Health to awaken this minion.
flavor_text: Always feels refreshed after a little dirt nap.

name: Medivh, the Guardian
card_text: Battlecry: Equip Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian.
flavor_text: If you think the party's great now, just wait 'til he invites the orcs over!

name: Mordresh Fire Eye
card_text: Battlecry: If you've dealt 10damage with your Hero Power this game, deal 10 damageto all enemies.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor_text: You're not hardcore unless you died hardcore.

name: Murozond the Infinite
card_text: Battlecry: Play all cards your opponent played last turn.
flavor_text: "Well, I'm glad YOU knew what I should be doing this turn."

name: Plagued Protodrake
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 7-Cost minion.
flavor_text: "What’s in the drake?! WHAT’S IN THE DRAKE?"

name: Primordial Protector
card_text: Battlecry: Draw yourhighest Cost spell.Summon a random minionwith the same Cost.
flavor_text: I thought the "shape of water" meant something else.

name: Rotface
card_text: After this minionsurvives damage,summon a randomLegendary minion.
flavor_text: Daddy! I think I made a Legendary!

name: Splintergraft
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendlyminion. Add a 10/10 copy toyour hand that costs (10).
flavor_text: We're going to need some bigger tweezers.

name: The Boogeymonster
card_text: Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Has 20 years of training in classical ballet, but ALLLLLL he ever gets asked to do is boogie.

name: The Lich King
card_text: TauntAt the end of your turn,add a random Death Knightcard to your hand.
flavor_text: "All that I am: anger, cruelty, vengeance, 8 attack - I bestow upon you, my chosen knight."

name: Tirion Fordring
card_text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavor_text: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Tortollan Pilgrim
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a spellin your deck and cast itwith random targets.
flavor_text: A tortollan made it to the desert!

name: Twin Tyrant
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor_text: They can never agree on whether it's too hot or too cold.

name: Varian, King of Stormwind
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Rushminion to gain Rush.Repeat for Taunt andDivine Shield.
flavor_text: Man, this guy is so cool. Sure hope nothing happens to him.

name: Abominable Bowman
card_text: Deathrattle: Summona random friendly Beastthat died this game.
flavor_text: Frosty the Bowman... was an angry hateful soul... with a fresh hewn bow and a missing nose...

name: Acidmaw
card_text: Whenever another minion takes damage, destroy it.
flavor_text: With the help of his trusty sidekick Dreadscale, the giant jormungar Acidmaw is ready to face any knight!

name: Ancient of Lore
card_text: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore 5 Health.
flavor_text: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Ancient of War
card_text: Choose One -+5 Attack; or +5 Health and Taunt.
flavor_text: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?" You lose if you get crushed to death.

name: Ancient Shieldbearer
card_text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain 10 Armor.
flavor_text: Back in her day, each shield weighed two tons and she had to carry four of them on each arm!

name: Animated Avalanche
card_text: Battlecry: If you playedan Elemental last turn,summon a copy of this.
flavor_text: Always sliding down mountains because it can't stop talking with its hands.

name: Archmage Antonidas
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor. This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Azalina Soulthief
card_text: Battlecry: Replace your hand with a copy of your opponent's.
flavor_text: The cards are always golden on the other side.

name: Beryllium Nullifier
card_text: MagneticCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Why Beryllium? Because it's hard to spell.

name: Blackhowl Gunspire
card_text: Can't attack. Wheneverthis minion takes damage,deal 3 damage to arandom enemy.
flavor_text: The upper windows used to be for aiming. Then we thought: "Hey! MORE cannons!"

name: Blazecaller
card_text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
flavor_text: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

name: Bogshaper
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your deck.
flavor_text: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

name: Bonechewer Vanguard
card_text: TauntWhenever this minion takesdamage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: She came here to taunt you and chew on bones, and she's all outta bones.

name: Bonemare
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and Taunt.
flavor_text: Attacks her job with unbridled enthusiasm.

name: Sindragosa
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/1 Frozen Champions.
flavor_text: "I recognize your effort but I think your magic still has room for improvement." - Sindragosa after taking a class on giving constructive feedback.

name: Sneed's Old Shredder
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor_text: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

name: Splitting Festeroot
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Splitting Saplings.
flavor_text: No use crying over split Festeroot,

name: Tomb Warden
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor_text: Also known as an ancient copy machine.

name: Tortollan Primalist
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a spell and cast it with random targets.
flavor_text: I see pizza in my future.

name: Turalyon, the Tenured
card_text: Rush. Whenever this attacksa minion, set the defender'sAttack and Health to 3.
flavor_text: "Let evil flee before righteousness; let the innocent live in peace. Let the day come when none need fear. For that day, I give my life gladly."

name: Violet Wurm
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon seven 1/1 Grubs.
flavor_text: It's wurms all the way down.

name: Walking Fountain
card_text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
flavor_text: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

name: Zzeraku the Warped
card_text: Whenever your herotakes damage, summona 6/6 Nether Drake.
flavor_text: The extra Z is for "zesty."

name: Abyssal Enforcer
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor_text: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

name: Amani War Bear
card_text: RushTaunt
flavor_text: "I used to farm for hours! Now they just come in packs?"

name: Archbishop Benedictus
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle a copy of your opponent's deck into your deck.
flavor_text: Nobody expects the Archbishop's Benediction!

name: Arch-Villain Rafaam
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Replace your hand and deck with Legendary minions.
flavor_text: Minions must wash hands before being LIQUIDATED AND REPLACED BY SOMEONE BETTER.

name: Astromancer
card_text: Battlecry: Summon arandom minion with Costequal to your hand size.
flavor_text: All signs point to Antonidas.

name: Baron Geddon
card_text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor_text: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros's foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Blood Troll Sapper
card_text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Main supplier of Blood Troll Syrup to the Intercontinental Hut of Funnel Cakes.

name: Bog Creeper
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: He's tried other things, but bog sidling, bog ambling, and bog trundling just aren't as effective as bog creeping.

name: Boommaster Flark
card_text: Battlecry: Summon four 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
flavor_text: Every good plan requires a bit of patience. And a lot of explosives.

name: Captured Jormungar
flavor_text: You can keep him, but you have to promise to feed him and clean out his tank every day!

name: Chef Nomi
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck is empty, summon six 6/6 Greasefire Elementals.
flavor_text: His cooking is always very well done.

name: Cho'gall
card_text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor_text: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

name: Confessor Paletress
card_text: Inspire: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor_text: She sees into your past and makes you face your fears. Most common fear: Getting Majordomo out of Sneed's Old Shredder.

name: Corridor Creeper
card_text: Costs (1) less whenever a minion dies while this is in your hand.
flavor_text: It likes the smell of dead things, which is curious, as it has no visible nose.

name: Countess Ashmore
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush,Lifesteal, and Deathrattlecard from your deck.
flavor_text: "1 minion… ah, ah, ah! 2 minions… ah, ah, ah! 3 minions… ah, ah, ah!"

name: Dinotamer Brann
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, summon King Krush.
flavor_text: Brann's new dino-taming hobby is going well—his pet can already make him sit, stand, and roll over!

name: Dr. Boom
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
flavor_text: MARVEL AT HIS MIGHT!

name: Druid of the Plains
card_text: RushFrenzy: Transform into a 6/7 Kodo with Taunt.
flavor_text: Not to be confused with the aeronautically advanced Druid of the Planes.

name: Eadric the Pure
card_text: Battlecry: Change all enemy minions'Attack to 1.
flavor_text: Nobody rocks a monocle like Eadric.

name: Fearsome Doomguard
flavor_text: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

name: Flame Leviathan
card_text: When you draw this, deal 2 damage to all characters.
flavor_text: Mimiron likes to take the Flame Leviathan out on some sweet joyrides.

name: Furious Ettin
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: One head is a morning person. The other head hates morning people.

name: Gloop Sprayer
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of each adjacent minion.
flavor_text:
"Are you sure that's enough gloop?"
"Hold on."

name: Gonk, the Raptor
card_text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, it may attack again.
flavor_text: There’s a word for Zandalari druids who refuse to pledge loyalty to Gonk: “Delicious.”

name: Grotesque Dragonhawk
card_text: Windfury
flavor_text: They say that "grotesque is in the eye of the beholder," but that's just because they've never seen a Grotesque Dragonhawk. Yikes!

name: Guardian of Kings
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Jade Chieftain
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Give it Taunt. @Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
flavor_text: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

name: Jan'alai, the Dragonhawk
card_text: Battlecry: If your Hero Powerdealt 8 damage this game,summon Ragnaros theFirelord.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor_text: You mess with the Bird, you get the Firelord.

name: Lightforged Crusader
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck hasno Neutral cards, add 5random Paladin cardsto your hand.
flavor_text: Self-appointed president of the Paladins Only Paladin Club.

name: Bwonsamdi, the Dead
card_text: Battlecry: Draw 1-Costminions from your deckuntil your hand is full.
flavor_text: Everyone's dying to meet him.

name: Chillmaw
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: If you're holdinga Dragon, deal 3 damageto all minions.
flavor_text: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

name: Colaque
card_text: Colossal +1 Immune while you controlColaque's Shell.
flavor_text: Ten thousand years ago, the city of Zin-Azshari fell to the bottom of the sea... and partially onto Colaque's shell.

name: Core Hound
flavor_text: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Crowd Roaster
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga Dragon, deal 7 damageto an enemy minion.
flavor_text: Every major show has an opening act to warm up the crowd.

name: Darkmire Moonkin
card_text: Spell Damage +2
flavor_text: Birds of a feather Moonfire together.

name: Don Han'Cho
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor_text: The brilliant mastermind of the Grimy Goons, Han sometimes thinks about ditching the idiot Cho, but that would just tear him apart.

name: Dreampetal Florist
card_text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of a random minion in your hand by (7).
flavor_text: Unlike gnomes, dreampetals grow more than 3 feet tall.

name: Evasive Drakonid
card_text: TauntCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Doesn't respond to spells, hero powers, calls, or text messages.

name: Exotic Mountseller
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random3-Cost Beast.
flavor_text: *Taps roof of mammoth* “You can fit so many squirrels in this thing!”

name: Frostsaber Matriarch
card_text: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each Beast you've summoned this game.
flavor_text: They say “don’t poke the bear”, but they NEVER said “don’t poke the frostsaber or her cubs”.

name: Gahz'rilla
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, double its Attack.
flavor_text: The Sen'jin High football team is The Gahz'rillas.

name: Giant Anaconda
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.
flavor_text: Must be something it ate.

name: Goru the Mightree
card_text: TauntBattlecry: For the rest ofthe game, your Treantshave +1/+1.
flavor_text: He's untreefeated.

name: Grimestreet Protector
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Give adjacent minions Divine Shield.
flavor_text: Some new asphalt should do the trick.

name: Gurubashi Hypemon
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a 1/1 copy of a Battlecry minion. It costs (1).
flavor_text:
Throw your hands in the air!
They cost (1).

name: Hogger, Doom of Elwynn
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavor_text: When C'thun went to sleep, he checked under his bed for Hogger.

name: Hydralodon
card_text: Colossal +2Battlecry: Give your Hydralodon Heads Rush.
flavor_text: Deep beneath the waves, this hydra grew to incredible size based on a steady diet of literally anything that crossed its path.

name: Inkmaster Solia
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck hasno duplicates, the nextspell you cast this turncosts (0).
flavor_text: Solia marks the Kabal with intricate tattoos that grant immense power. Also it makes it harder for other gangs to recruit from their numbers. BACK OFF, GOONS.

name: Ironhide Direhorn
card_text: Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Ironhide Runt.
flavor_text: "Boy! Bring me my masks and skull rams."

name: Keymaster Alabaster
card_text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, add a copy to  your hand that costs (1).
flavor_text: The key to his mastery is a solid stack of backup copies.

name: Knight of the Wild
card_text: Whenever you summon a Beast, reduce the Cost of this card by (1).
flavor_text: He gets a discount on the tournament entry fee because he is his own horse.

name: Lady Liadrin
card_text: Battlecry: Add a copy ofeach spell you cast onfriendly characters thisgame to your hand.
flavor_text: When it comes to spells, she loves 'em then she librams.

name: Linecracker
card_text: Overkill: Double this minion's Attack.
flavor_text: "Tell me if you’ve heard this one!"

name: Lord Godfrey
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage toall other minions. If any die,repeat this Battlecry.
flavor_text: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

name: Lynessa Sunsorrow
card_text: Battlecry: Cast each spellyou cast on your minions this game on this one.
flavor_text: A diet of pure magic is great for the complexion but wreaks havoc on one's mood.

name: Malkorok
card_text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon.
flavor_text: Garrosh's best buddy. It's true. Look it up.

name: Marsh Hydra
card_text: RushAfter this attacks, add arandom 8-Cost minionto your hand.
flavor_text: Three heads of marsh-mashing, bog-bashing, swamp-stomping fury!

name: Nightscale Matriarch
card_text: Whenever a friendly minion is healed, summon a 3/3 Whelp.
flavor_text: Everywhelp, get in here!

name: Obsidian Destroyer
card_text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Scarab with Taunt.
flavor_text: No obsidian is safe around the Obsidian Destroyer!

name: Prophet Velen
card_text: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavor_text: He's been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn't have a lot to complain about.

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
card_text: Stealth
flavor_text: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold. He'll take care of the rest.

name: Rend Blackhand
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a Legendary minion.
flavor_text: Rend believes he is the True Warchief of the Horde and he keeps editing the wikipedia page for "Warchief of the Horde" to include his picture.

name: Sated Threshadon
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor_text: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

name: Siegebreaker
card_text: TauntYour other Demons have +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Has a side hustle as a siegebroker.

name: Silas Darkmoon
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
flavor_text: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

name: Silver Vanguard
card_text: Deathrattle: Recruit an8-Cost minion.
flavor_text: Float like a Faerie Dragon, sting like a Hivequeen.

name: Skycap'n Kragg
card_text: CharrrrrgeCosts (1) less for each friendly Pirate.
flavor_text: What's more boss than riding a parrot with a jawbone for a shoulderpad while wielding a giant hook-lance-thing and wearing a pirate hat? NOTHING.

name: Stone Sentinel
card_text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
flavor_text: He and his friends just want to rock out.

name: Stormwind Champion
card_text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavor_text: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: Strongman
card_text: TauntCorrupt: This costs (0).
flavor_text: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
card_text: Battlecry: Add a 5/5Horror to your hand. Teachit two Shaman spells.
flavor_text: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Tar Lord
card_text: TauntHas +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
flavor_text: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

name: The Curator
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
flavor_text: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

name: Tunnel Blaster
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Deal 3 damageto all minions.
flavor_text: And you always thought they wore the candles just for fun.

name: Malorne
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your deck.
flavor_text: When Malorne isn't mauling hordes of demons, he enjoys attending parties, though he prefers to go stag.

name: Mr. Smite
card_text: Your Pirates have Charge.
flavor_text: “Please, Mr. Smite was my father. Call me Yorik.”

name: Mutanus the Devourer
card_text: Battlecry: Eat a minion inyour opponent's hand.Gain its stats.
flavor_text: As long as Naralex stays under the blanket, Mutanus can't get him.

name: Neptulon
card_text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)
flavor_text: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

name: Rabble Bouncer
card_text: TauntCosts (1) less for each enemy minion.
flavor_text: "Shirt? Shoes!? No service!"

name: Shu'ma
card_text: At the end of your turn,fill your board with 1/1 Tentacles.
flavor_text: How to tell your mother to go away.

name: Siamat
card_text: Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush,Taunt, Divine Shield, orWindfury (your choice).
flavor_text: TAUNT. TAUNT.

name: Skeletal Dragon
card_text: TauntAt the end of your turn, adda Dragon to your hand.
flavor_text: I wish to complain about this dragon what I purchased not half an hour ago from this very boutique.

name: Soulciologist Malicia
card_text: Battlecry: For each Soul Fragment in your deck, summon a 3/3 Soul with Rush.@ (@)
flavor_text: If you value your life, don't call it a "soft science."

name: Star Aligner
card_text: Battlecry: If you control 3minions with 7 Health, deal7 damage to all enemies.
flavor_text: "You're a Sagittarius? Me too! Just gimme a sec."

name: Stormwatcher
card_text: Windfury
flavor_text: Aspiring meteorologist!

name: Swamp King Dred
card_text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack it.
flavor_text: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

name: Tak Nozwhisker
card_text: Whenever you shuffle acard into your deck, adda copy to your hand.
flavor_text: "One for me and one for future me!"

name: Temporus
card_text: Battlecry: Your opponent takes two turns. Then you take two turns.
flavor_text: Follows adventurers, seeking the ultimate time magic: the ability to reload.

name: Tess Greymane
card_text: Battlecry: Replay every cardfrom another class you'veplayed this game (targetschosen randomly).
flavor_text: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: The Leviathan
card_text: Colossal +1Rush, Divine ShieldAfter this attacks,Dredge.
flavor_text: Built by Ini Stormcoil, this massive vessel can withstand almost anything you put it through... although she would prefer you didn't!

name: Troggzor the Earthinator
card_text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, summon a Burly Rockjaw Trogg.
flavor_text: He keeps earthinating the countryside despite attempts to stop him.

name: Twin Emperor Vek'lor
card_text: TauntBattlecry: If your C'Thun hasat least 10 Attack, summonanother Emperor.
flavor_text: Do they make decisions based on age? "I'm two minutes older therefore we burn this village."

name: Valdris Felgorge
card_text: Battlecry: Increase your maximum hand size to 12. Draw 4 cards.
flavor_text: I don't mean to pry, but you don't by chance happen to have six fingers on both of your hands?

name: Volcanosaur
card_text: Battlecry: Adapt, then Adapt.
flavor_text: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

name: Worgen Abomination
card_text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to all other damaged minions.
flavor_text: Does anyone want to play dead!?

name: Abyssal Summoner
card_text: Battlecry: Summon aDemon with Taunt and statsequal to your hand size.
flavor_text: But gnomes have tiny hands...

name: Ancient of Blossoms
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: His new shampoo is really working!

name: Anima Golem
card_text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
flavor_text: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

name: Arcane Dynamo
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (5) or more.
flavor_text: We ran out of jars, so we started putting brains in other stuff.

name: Archmage
card_text: Spell Damage +1
flavor_text: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

name: Armagedillo
card_text: TauntAt the end of your turn,give all Taunt minionsin your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: We may never know what provoked it, but we will never forget the consequences.

name: Aya Blackpaw
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. @ Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor_text: Though young, Aya took over as the leader of Jade Lotus through her charisma and strategic acumen when her predecessor was accidentally crushed by a jade golem.
raw_attributes: {"Battlecry and Deathrattle:","Jade Golem","Battlecry and Deathrattle:","Jade Golem"}

name: Battleground Battlemaster
card_text: Adjacent minionshave Windfury.
flavor_text: Farm! No wait… Mine! No wait… 3 to Smith—they're taking Farm. Get there now!

name: Blackguard
card_text: Whenever your hero is healed, deal that much damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: "Did I ever tell you the story of when I single-handedly took down a 29/29 C'thun?" - Reno Jackson

name: Bone Drake
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
flavor_text: The bone drake brings all the dragons to the yard. He would teach you, but you have no cards.

name: Book Wyrm
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack.
flavor_text: His favorites are classic tragedies like "The Hobbit" and "Grendel".

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavor_text: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Cabal Shadow Priest
card_text: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
flavor_text: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

name: Camouflaged Dirigible
card_text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs Stealth until your next turn.
flavor_text:
"What does that cloud look like to you?"
"Trouble."

name: Coffin Crasher
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a Deathrattle minion from your hand.
flavor_text: Also does weddings.

name: Corrupted Seer
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all non-Murloc minions.
flavor_text: For seers, it's very handy to have your crystal ball hanging right in front of your face.

name: Crystal Lion
card_text: Divine ShieldCosts (1) less for each SilverHand Recruit you control.
flavor_text: Standard issue recruit gear: 1 silver sword, 1 Lordaeron insignia, 2 bags of crystal kibble.

name: Vereesa Windrunner
card_text: Battlecry: Equip Thori'dal, the Stars' Fury.
flavor_text: Good things come in threes: Windrunner sisters and arrows of Thori'dal.

name: War Golem
flavor_text: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them. Instinct, maybe? A desire to blend in?

name: Winged Guardian
card_text: Taunt, RebornCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Take these broken wings, be reborn, and learn to fly again.

name: Wrapped Golem
card_text: RebornAt the end of your turn,summon a 1/1 Scarabwith Taunt.
flavor_text: The end result of one of the greatest wrap battles of all time.

name: Wyrmguard
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor_text: They think they're trusted guardians. Dragons think they're convenient snacks.

name: Aeon Reaver
card_text: Battlecry: Deal damage to a minion equal to its Attack.
flavor_text: Ripping centuries asunder helps him manage his busy schedule.

name: Ancient Harbinger
card_text: At the start of your turn, put a 10-Cost minion from your deck into your hand.
flavor_text: "honey, can u run down to the store and pick up some 10 cost minions? thx"

name: Anetheron
card_text: Costs (1) if your hand is full.
flavor_text: Leads every demonic invasion. Hopefully this one turns out better than the World Tree.

name: Aranasi Broodmother
card_text: TauntWhen you draw this, restore4 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: She's got a big brood and a big mood.

name: Arcanosaur
card_text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor_text: Arcane energy… finds a way.

name: Argent Commander
card_text: ChargeDivine Shield
flavor_text: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

name: Big-Time Racketeer
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Ogre.
flavor_text: "It'd be a shame if someone disenchanted those Legendaries."

name: Bolf Ramshield
card_text: Whenever your hero takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
flavor_text: Bolf keeps coming in 2nd at the Grand Tournament. It might be his year this year, if Lebron doesn't enter.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavor_text: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck. It's pretty insensitive.

name: Coldarra Drake
card_text: You can use your Hero Power any number of times.
flavor_text: The Grand Tournament has a "No dragons allowed" policy, but it's rarely enforced.

name: Cowardly Grunt
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your deck.
flavor_text: Cowardice is the wisest part of valor.

name: Cruel Dinomancer
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon arandom minion youdiscarded this game.
flavor_text: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

name: Cursed Castaway
card_text: RushDeathrattle: Draw a Combo card from your deck.
flavor_text: She was an ordinary castaway... until she found that cursed volleyball.

name: Dark Arakkoa
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Give your C'Thun+3/+3 (wherever it is).
flavor_text: There's a whole gradient of Arakkoa! This one is on the darker side.

name: Dragoncaster
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, your next spell this turn costs (0).
flavor_text: It’s challenging to perform magic on dragonback. It’s so easy to drop the rabbit.

name: Drakonid Crusher
card_text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3.
flavor_text: Drakonids were created to have all the bad parts of a dragon in the form of a humanoid. But, like, why?

name: Dread Infernal
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavor_text: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Emerald Explorer
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor_text: Make it a double dragon!

name: Faceless Summoner
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor_text: They never get the recognition they deserve.

name: Fire Elemental
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavor_text: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Forest Warden Omu
card_text: Spellburst: Refresh your Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: She wishes all things could grow and flourish at Scholomance. If only she knew…

name: Frost Elemental
card_text: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
flavor_text: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

name: Furnacefire Colossus
card_text: Battlecry: Discard all weapons from your hand and gain their stats.
flavor_text: Smelts in his mouth, not in your hand.

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
card_text: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
flavor_text: He's the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor. He's getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

name: Genn Greymane
card_text: Start of Game:If your deck has only even-Cost cards, your startingHero Power costs (1).
flavor_text: Ever since Sylvanas killed his son, he's dreamed of getting… even.

name: Giggling Inventor
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: "I shall build a mighty golden paladin! And he will GREET the WORLD!"

name: Grand Crusader
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Paladin card to your hand.
flavor_text: A veteran of a number of crusades, she is a force for light and goodness. Her latest crusade is against goblin telemarketers.

name: Green-Thumb Gardener
card_text: Battlecry: Refresh emptyMana Crystals equal to theCost of the most expensivespell in your hand.
flavor_text: Sometimes all a plant needs is, like, A LOT of water.

name: Heistbaron Togwaggle
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Lackey, choose a fantastic treasure.
flavor_text: A staunch ally of Rafaam, at least while the shinies keep flowing.

name: Herald Volazj
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of each of your other minions.
flavor_text: His whole job is yelling "Yogg-Saron comin'!"

name: High Inquisitor Whitemane
card_text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly minions that died this turn.
flavor_text: No one told her that champions want to sleep in.

name: Hogger
card_text: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavor_text: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it's because he let you.

name: Icehoof Protector
card_text: TauntFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor_text: I can't feel my axe!

name: Iron Juggernaut
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Mine into your opponent's deck. When drawn, it explodes for 10 damage.
flavor_text: The Iron Juggernaut guards Orgrimmar and has just earned the "Employee of the Month" award!

name: Damaged Stegotron
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavor_text: Sadly the warranty does not cover fireballs or acts of Boom.

name: Defias Cleaner
card_text: Battlecry: Silence a minion with Deathrattle.
flavor_text: His house cleaning service is quite thorough. Not a spot to be found... or any of your stuff!

name: Dr. Morrigan
card_text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
flavor_text: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

name: Dragonmaw Sky Stalker
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Dragonrider.
flavor_text: "I will find you, sky!"

name: Eccentric Scribe
card_text: Deathrattle: Summonfour 1/1 Vengeful Scrolls.
flavor_text: Them’s fightin’ words!

name: Emperor Thaurissan
card_text: At the end of your turn, reduce the Cost of cards in your hand by (1).
flavor_text: His second greatest regret is summoning an evil Firelord who enslaved his entire people.

name: Evasive Wyrm
card_text: Divine Shield, RushCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Deftly dodges spells like a real wiggle wyrm.

name: Fight Promoter
card_text: Battlecry: If you controla minion with 6 or more Health, draw two cards.
flavor_text: "Yeah, I can get you Knuckles. No, no, he's been clean for *weeks*."

name: Flik Skyshiv
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy aminion and all copies of it(wherever they are).
flavor_text: Junior explorers scan the night sky in fear of her candle’s flame!

name: Frozen Crusher
card_text: After this minion attacks, Freeze it.
flavor_text: Goes by the online handle "KoolKrusher99."

name: Gazlowe
card_text: Whenever you cast a 1-Cost spell, add a random Mech to your hand.
flavor_text: Gazlowe was voted "Most Likely to Explode" in high school.

name: Gemstudded Golem
card_text: TauntCan only attack if you have 5 or more Armor.
flavor_text: Perfectly accessorized to attract adventurers.

name: Glinda Crowskin
card_text: Minions in your hand have Echo.
flavor_text:
Summon an unlimited* number of minions!**
*Six
**Wisps

name: Grumble, Worldshaker
card_text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor_text: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3) or less.
flavor_text: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

name: Hungry Ettin
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion for your opponent.
flavor_text: How can he be hungry… if he's Ettin!?

name: Ivory Knight
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.Restore Health to your heroequal to its Cost.
flavor_text: Do NOT call it a "horse".

name: Jade Behemoth
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Summon a{1}{0} Jade Golem.@TauntBattlecry: Summon aJade Golem.
flavor_text: I think we should talk about the jade elephant in the room.

name: Kabal Crystal Runner
card_text: Costs (2) less for each Secret you've played this game.
flavor_text: "Listen, I can cut you in on a little of this premium mana, but you can't tell my boss."

name: Kael'thas Sunstrider
card_text: Every third spell you cast each turn costs (1).
flavor_text: “Descent of Dragons was merely a set back!”

name: Khartut Defender
card_text: Taunt, RebornDeathrattle: Restore 3Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Gesundheit!

name: Kodorider
card_text: Inspire: Summon a 3/5 War Kodo.
flavor_text: Someone called her a Rhinorider, and she's NOT HAPPY.

name: Krag'wa, the Frog
card_text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to your hand.
flavor_text: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

name: Lady in White
card_text: Battlecry: Cast 'Inner Fire' on every minion in your deck (set Attack equal to Health).
flavor_text: She was a lady in polka dots until the gnomish laundromat incident.

name: Lord of the Arena
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

name: Luckydo Buccaneer
card_text: Battlecry: If your weapon has at least 3 Attack, gain +4/+4.
flavor_text: You can't just leave a Luckydo somewhere. You gotta keep 'em with you! Especially in Gadgetzan!

name: Mad Summoner
card_text: Battlecry: Fill each player'sboard with 1/1 Imps.
flavor_text: Does he summon because of his madness, or is he mad from all the summoning?

name: Maexxna
card_text: Poisonous
flavor_text: Maexxna gets super mad when people introduce her as "Maxina" or "Maxxy".

name: Master Jouster
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: Needs just a few more ratings points to become Grandmaster Jouster.

name: Mech-Bear-Cat
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, add a Spare Part card to your hand.
flavor_text: Crushes buildings with his BEAR hands.

name: Moat Lurker
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Deathrattle: Resummon it.
flavor_text: He really enjoys lurking and gets a lot of job satisfaction out of it.

name: Mogor's Champion
card_text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor_text: This champion has learned from the best. Except for his target selection.

name: Moorabi
card_text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

name: Mothership
card_text: RushDeathrattle: Summon two random Mechs that cost (3) or less.
flavor_text: Has been known to abduct sea cows and leave kelp circles.

name: Mukla's Big Brother
card_text: So strong! And only 6 Mana?!

name: Nerubian Unraveler
card_text: Spells cost (2) more.
flavor_text: He loves a good yarn.

name: Nithogg
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two0/3 Eggs. Next turn theyhatch into 4/4 Drakeswith Rush.
flavor_text: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

name: Onyx Magescribe
card_text: Spellburst: Add 2 random spells from your class to your hand.
flavor_text: Sometimes you gotta spend spells to earn spells.

name: Justicar Trueheart
card_text: Battlecry: Replace your starting Hero Power with a better one.
flavor_text: It's like putting racing stripes and a giant spoiler on your hero power.

name: Kabal Trafficker
card_text: At the end of your turn,add a random Demonto your hand.
flavor_text: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

name: Kidnapper
card_text: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Lady Anacondra
card_text: Your Nature spellscost (2) less.
flavor_text: Do you think she got her name before or after she turned into a snake?

name: Lady Prestor
card_text: Battlecry: Transform minionsin your deck into randomDragons. (They keep their original stats and Cost.)
flavor_text: To her credit, the best bodyguard for the king WOULD be a dragon in disguise.

name: Leatherclad Hogleader
card_text: Battlecry: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand, gain Charge.
flavor_text: The Hogchoppers, the terrors of Tanaris, can always be found at one tavern or another in Gadgetzan, refueling for totally real and legit adventures that they go on.

name: Lightshower Elemental
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Restore 8 Healthto all friendly characters.
flavor_text: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

name: Madam Goya
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Swap it with a minion in your deck.
flavor_text: She has set up her Black Market here in Gadgetzan for one purpose, to make a KILLING when Beanie Babies make their inevitable comeback.

name: Mechanical Whelp
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 7/7 Mechanical Dragon.
flavor_text: "Well if I didn't build the whelp and YOU didn't build the whelp…"

name: Meteorologist
card_text: Battlecry: For each card in your hand, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: Some say the world will end in fire. Some say in ice. Why not BOTH?

name: Missile Launcher
card_text: MagneticAt the end of your turn,deal 1 damage to allother characters.
flavor_text: We asked, "Where do the missiles go?" and he answered, "Yes."

name: Mogor the Ogre
card_text: All minions have a 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor_text: Mogor helped reopen the Dark Portal once. You know you're in trouble when you have to rely on an ogre.

name: Mojomaster Zihi
card_text: Battlecry: Set each player to 5 Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: Sadly, she was still two credits short of her Witch Doctorate.

name: Mossy Horror
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavor_text: The hills have eyes. And teeth. Pretty bad breath, too.

name: Mukla, Tyrant of the Vale
card_text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
flavor_text: Pro tip: DO NOT BOGART THE BANANAS.

name: Mysterious Challenger
card_text: Battlecry: Put one of each Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor_text: He may sound surly and antisocial, but he's actually just really shy.

name: Necrotic Geist
card_text: Whenever one of your other minions dies, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor_text: An eye for an eye, and a ghoul for a ghoul.

name: Nerubian Prophet
card_text: At the start of your turn, reduce this card'sCost by (1).
flavor_text: It’s a self-reducing prophecy.

name: Oblivitron
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon aMech from your hand andtrigger its Deathrattle.
flavor_text: Reduce, reuse, re-rattle!

name: Ornery Direhorn
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Adapt.
flavor_text: "It's an herbivore. How dangerous can it be?" - Famous last words

name: Portal Overfiend
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portalsinto your deck. When drawn,summon a 2/2 Demonwith Rush.
flavor_text: It’s like an interdimensional game of demon tag.

name: Priestess of Elune
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: If she threatens to "moon" you, it's not what you think.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
card_text: Charge
flavor_text: One Insane Rocketeer. One Rocket full of Explosives. Infinite Fun.

name: Reno the Relicologist
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, deal 10 damage randomly split among all enemy minions.
flavor_text: All his life, Reno Jackson was only a gatling wand away from becoming the greatest and most terrifying mage who ever existed.

name: Rin, the First Disciple
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
flavor_text: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
card_text: Battlecry: Draw @ |4(card, cards).(Upgraded for eachfriendly Secret that hastriggered this game!)
flavor_text: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

name: Scaled Nightmare
card_text: At the start of your turn, double this minion's Attack.
flavor_text: I like it because it scales.

name: Seeping Oozeling
card_text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattle of a random minion in your deck.
flavor_text: Uh, you might want to get that looked at.

name: Sideshow Spelleater
card_text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Hero Power.
flavor_text: Hey! Let me try that...

name: Skulking Geist
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy all1-Cost spells in both hands and decks.
flavor_text: It's as though a million Jade Idols cried out, and were suddenly silenced.

name: Spark Drill
card_text: RushDeathrattle: Add two1/1 Sparks with Rush to your hand.
flavor_text: Preferred weapon of Dr. Boom's orthodontist.

name: Spiteful Summoner
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a spellfrom your deck. Summon a random minion withthe same Cost.
flavor_text: Sometimes she'll summon a Doomsayer. Out of spite.

name: Sunwalker
card_text: TauntDivine Shield
flavor_text: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun. It's just a name. Don’t worry!

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
card_text: Deathrattle: Takecontrol of a randomenemy minion.
flavor_text: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Tending Tauren
card_text: Choose One - Give yourother minions +1/+1;or Summon two2/2 Treants.
flavor_text: That racial bonus to Herbalism finally paid off.

name: The Black Knight
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor_text: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament. We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: The Lurker Below
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damageto an enemy minion. If itdies, repeat on one ofits neighbors.
flavor_text: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

name: The Skeleton Knight
card_text: Deathrattle: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, return this to your hand.
flavor_text: Apparently it really was just a flesh wound.

name: Thing from Below
card_text: TauntCosts (1) less for eachTotem you've summonedthis game.
flavor_text: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Tickatus
card_text: Battlecry: Remove thetop 5 cards from your deck.Corrupt: Your opponent'sdeck instead.
flavor_text: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

name: Piloted Sky Golem
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 4-Cost minion.
flavor_text: The pinnacle of goblin engineering. Includes an espresso machine and foot massager.

name: Possessed Lackey
card_text: Deathrattle: Recruit a Demon.
flavor_text: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

name: Reno Jackson
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, fully heal your hero.
flavor_text: Reno is a four-time winner of the 'Best Accessorized Explorer' award.

name: Sabretooth Stalker
card_text: Stealth
flavor_text: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

name: Safeguard
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Summon a 0/5Vault Safe with Taunt.
flavor_text: Keep it secret. Keep it safeguarded!

name: Savannah Highmane
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavor_text: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Scarlet Webweaver
card_text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random Beast in your hand by (5).
flavor_text: Isn't that nice? The spider made the explorer a sleeping bag!

name: Sea Reaver
card_text: When you draw this, deal 1 damage to your minions.
flavor_text: A little better than Sea Minus Reaver.

name: Security Rover
card_text: Whenever this miniontakes damage, summon a2/3 Mech with Taunt.
flavor_text: Insecurity detected. Alerting hugbots.

name: Skeram Cultist
card_text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor_text: Just before he comes into play, there is an AWESOME training montage with C'Thun.

name: Soulwarden
card_text: Battlecry: Add 3 random cards you discarded this game to your hand.
flavor_text: Reduce, reuse, resoul.

name: Spectral Pillager
card_text: Combo: Deal damage equalto the number of other cardsyou've played this turn.
flavor_text: It turns out you CAN take it with you.

name: Spellweaver
card_text: Spell Damage +2
flavor_text: Spells offer twice the moisture wicking of cotton.

name: Sunkeeper Tarim
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
flavor_text: Ironically, his favorite number is 4.

name: The Beast
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a3/3 Pip Quickwit foryour opponent.
flavor_text: He lives in Blackrock Mountain. He eats Gnomes. That's pretty much it.

name: The Mistcaller
card_text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
flavor_text: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great. "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

name: Toki, Time-Tinker
card_text: Battlecry: Add a randomLegendary minion fromthe past to your hand.
flavor_text: Just a twist to the left, one quarter turn to the right and … oops! Well, we didn’t need that timeline anyway.

name: Toshley
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
flavor_text: Something about power converters.

name: Trade Prince Gallywix
card_text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain a copy of it and give them a Coin.
flavor_text: Gallywix believes in supply and demand. He supplies the beatings and demands you pay up!

name: Veranus
card_text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor_text: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

name: Wild Bloodstinger
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Attack it.
flavor_text: Tame Bloodstingers would politely invite your minion to tea.

name: Windfury Harpy
card_text: Windfury
flavor_text: Harpies are not pleasant sounding. That's the nicest I can put it.

name: Wind-up Burglebot
card_text: Whenever this attacks a minion and survives, draw a card.
flavor_text: Don't blame the bot for his crimes... Blame whoever keeps winding him up!

name: Wrathion
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: Draw cards until you draw one that isn't a Dragon.
flavor_text: Wrathion, son of Deathwing, is a dragon. Why isn't he tagged as a dragon, you ask? WHAT, ARE YOU TRYING TO BLOW HIS COVER??

name: Xavius
card_text: After you play a card, summon a 2/1 Satyr.
flavor_text: Xavius has grand nightmares of summoning Sargeras into this world, but a few Satyr will have to do for now.

name: Zerek, Master Cloner
card_text: Deathrattle: If you've cast any spells on this minion, resummon it.
flavor_text: His original name was Aerek. Then the first clone was Berek. They went evil around Merek.

name: Aldor Truthseeker
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (2) this game.
flavor_text: It’s under 'T.'

name: Anka, the Buried
card_text: Battlecry: Change each Deathrattle minion in your hand into a 1/1 that costs (1).
flavor_text: "You look familiar. Were you at my first funeral?"

name: Anubisath Defender
card_text: Taunt. Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavor_text: Also comes running when he hears a can opener.

name: Arcane Tyrant
card_text: Costs (0) if you've cast a spell that costs (5) or more this turn.
flavor_text: Tyrant is such a strong word.

name: Arena Patron
card_text: Overkill: Summon another Arena Patron.
flavor_text: Everybody with a ticket get in here!

name: Azerite Elemental
card_text: At the start of your turn, gain Spell Damage +2.
flavor_text: This is some bad blood.

name: Azure Drake
card_text: Spell Damage +1Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor_text: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

name: Barak Kodobane
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2, and 3-Cost spell.
flavor_text: They say he's a pro at horseback archery.

name: Bazaar Mugger
card_text: RushBattlecry: Add a random minion from another class to your hand.
flavor_text: Premium muggings at a discount price.

name: Unseen Saboteur
card_text: Battlecry: Your opponent casts a random spell from their hand (targets chosen randomly).
flavor_text: Far more effective than the flamboyant saboteur.

name: Utgarde Grapplesniper
card_text: Battlecry: Both players draw a card. If it's a Dragon, summon it.
flavor_text: Note: The dragon may be a little cranky upon arrival.

name: Violet Warden
card_text: TauntSpell Damage +1
flavor_text: He's got magic, a shield, and an unwavering obsession with the color purple.

name: Void Crusher
card_text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
flavor_text: We like to call him "Wesley".

name: Volcanic Drake
card_text: Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor_text: Volcanic Drakes breathe lava instead of fire. The antacid vendor at Thorium Point does a brisk business with them.

name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
card_text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
flavor_text:
He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.
*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

name: Wobbling Runts
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon three 2/2 Runts.
flavor_text: The fourth one fell off in a tragic accident. They don't talk about it.

name: Abomination
card_text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2damage to ALL characters.
flavor_text: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

name: Al'ar
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Ashes of Al'ar that resurrects this minion on your next turn.
flavor_text: Week #679: Still no mount...

name: Alley Armorsmith
card_text: TauntWhenever this miniondeals damage, gainthat much Armor.
flavor_text: The rent is cheap and she passes the savings onto YOU!

name: Amara, Warden of Hope
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Set yourhero's Health to 40.

name: Amber Watcher
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 8 Health.
flavor_text: Healing really resin-ates with him.

name: Antique Healbot
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 8 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: They don't make 'em like they used to! (Because of explosions, mostly.)

name: Anubisath Sentinel
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3/+3.
flavor_text: He's actually a 1/1 who picked up the hammer from the last guy.

name: Avian Watcher
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1and Taunt.
flavor_text: He mostly watches light romantic comedies.

name: Azsharan Sentinel
card_text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a'Sunken Sentinel' on thebottom of your deck.
flavor_text: For some, the Sundering was the collapse of civilization. For others, it was a great core workout.

name: Barista Lynchen
card_text: Battlecry: Add a copy of each of your other Battlecry minions to your hand.
flavor_text: "Thanks a latte!"

name: Barnes
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 copy of a random minion in your deck.
flavor_text: He used to play every part, until Moroes confiscated his Orb of Deception.

name: Big Ol' Whelp
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor_text: A chonker, a real absolute unit.

name: Blackwing Corruptor
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage.
flavor_text: He got his name when he gave Blackwing some comic books and rock & roll records.

name: Blingtron 3000
card_text: Battlecry: Equip a random weapon for each player.
flavor_text: PREPARE PARTY SERVOS FOR IMMEDIATE DEPLOYMENT.

name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
card_text: LifestealHas +1 Attack for eachcard you've discardedthis game.
flavor_text: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

name: Bolvar Fordragon
card_text: Whenever a friendly minion dies while this is in your hand, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Spoiler alert: Bolvar gets melted and then sits on an ice throne and everyone forgets about him.

name: Bomb Squad
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damageto an enemy minion.Deathrattle: Deal 5 damageto your hero.
flavor_text: Please don't explode! Please don't explode! Please don't explode!

name: Bonfire Elemental
card_text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, draw a card.
