flavor_text: Next step: Marshmallow elementals.

name: Captain Greenskin
card_text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor_text: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren't for those pesky kids!

name: Carnivorous Cube
card_text: Battlecry: Destroya friendly minion.Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of it.
flavor_text: He's always grumpy until he's eaten his first barista of the morning.

name: Chief Inspector
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets.
flavor_text: Empty your pockets, I know you’ve got a Wandering Monster in there!

name: Chronobreaker
card_text: Deathrattle: If you're holdinga Dragon, deal 3 damageto all enemy minions.
flavor_text: If he asks to borrow your watch, just say no.

name: Clockwork Knight
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
flavor_text: It takes a lot to wind him up.

name: Cobalt Guardian
card_text: Whenever you summon a Mech, gain Divine Shield.
flavor_text: Guardians used to be built out of Adamantium, but production got moved to Gadgetzan and Cobalt was cheap.

name: Cobalt Spellkin
card_text: Battlecry: Add two 1-Cost spells from your class to your hand.
flavor_text: Spews more spells than a sleep-talking wizard.

name: Bewitched Guardian
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: Amwitched. Beingwitched. Beenwitched.

name: Bittertide Hydra
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

name: Bloodworm
card_text: Lifesteal
flavor_text: Queen Lana'thel insists on one of these, fried, every morning for breakfast.

name: Bolvar, Fireblood
card_text: Divine ShieldAfter a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: He's so hot right now.

name: Bomb Lobber
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: He lobbies Orgrimmar daily on behalf of bombs.

name: Bone Baron
card_text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Skeletons to your hand.
flavor_text: "Oil," "Rail," and "Blubber" were already taken.

name: Boompistol Bully
card_text: Battlecry: Enemy Battlecry cards cost (5) more next turn.
flavor_text: Preventing insults with injuries.

name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

name: Burgly Bully
card_text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, add a Coin to your hand.
flavor_text: He only burgles to pay the bills. He is really just a bully at heart.

name: Carrion Drake
card_text: Battlecry: If a minion died this turn, gain Poisonous.
flavor_text: Fits easily into overhead luggage bins.

name: Chromatic Egg
card_text: Battlecry: Secretly Discovera Dragon to hatch into.Deathrattle: Hatch!
flavor_text: Nefarian was known for creating two things: horrible monsters and excellent breakfasts.

name: Clockwork Automaton
card_text: Double the damage and healing of your Hero Power.
flavor_text: Most mechs are pretty chill, but this one is all wound up.

name: Cloud Prince
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 6 damage.
flavor_text: "In West Cloudidelphia, born and raised; flinging lightning for the rest of my days."

name: Cobalt Scalebane
card_text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavor_text: You get a sword! And you get a sword! Everybody gets a sword!

name: Corpse Widow
card_text: Your Deathrattle cards cost (2) less.
flavor_text: Her marriage survived death, but it decayed pretty quickly after that.

name: Crazed Chemist
card_text: Combo: Give a friendly minion +4 Attack.
flavor_text: You don't have to be crazy to work here, but it helps.

name: Crazed Worshipper
card_text: Taunt. Whenever this minion takes damage, give your C'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor_text: Every month they share a pancake breakfast with the Perfectly Rational Worshippers.

name: Cryomancer
card_text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: She loves Frozen. I mean who doesn't?

name: Cult Apothecary
card_text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, restore 2 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Cults need pharmacists too.

name: Curio Collector
card_text: Whenever you draw a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: Experts worry that curios are a gateway to face-collecting.

name: Dalaran Crusader
card_text: Divine Shield
flavor_text: Stops for nothing—except donuts.

name: Darkscale Healer
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor_text: Healing is just something she does in her free time. It's more of a hobby really.

name: Darkshire Alchemist
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 5 Health.
flavor_text: The secret ingredient: liquified funnel cake.

name: Darkspeaker
card_text: Battlecry: Swap stats with a friendly minion.
flavor_text: People often think that Darkspeaker is the arch nemesis of Lightspeaker, but that title actually belongs to Heavyspeaker.

name: Deathweb Spider
card_text: Battlecry: If your herotook damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
flavor_text: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

name: Desert Obelisk
card_text: If you control 3 of theseat the end of your turn,deal 5 damage to arandom enemy.
flavor_text: The Obelisk of the Stars can hide an entire land from prying eyes! Or zap a rando.

name: Despicable Dreadlord
card_text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: He's deathspicable.

name: Djinni of Zephyrs
card_text: After you cast a spell on another friendly minion, cast a copy of it on this one.
flavor_text: If you want your wish granted, don't rub him the wrong way.

name: Dollmaster Dorian
card_text: Whenever you draw a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor_text: The children were puzzled by the scratches covering the insides of their toy-boxes.

name: Doomguard
card_text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavor_text: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Dragon Consort
card_text: Battlecry: The next Dragon you play costs (2) less.
flavor_text: Everybody wants someone to snuggle with. Even giant armored scaly draconic beasts of destruction.

name: Dragonmaw Scorcher
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor_text: Caution: Contains Flammable Material

name: Drakonid Operative
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga Dragon, Discover acopy of a card in youropponent's deck.
flavor_text: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.

name: Druid of the Claw
card_text: Rush

name: Convincing Infiltrator
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: It’s always nice to steal a familiar face.

name: Corpse Raiser
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendlyminion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor_text: He was just minding his business, farming corpses, when you meddling adventurers came along.

name: Corrosive Sludge
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor_text: The result of centuries of terrible sanitation.

name: Corrupted Healbot
card_text: Deathrattle: Restore 8 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Not so much "corrupted" as "has terrible aim".

name: Crazed Netherwing
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other characters.
flavor_text: Always tail swipes left.

name: Cumulo-Maximus
card_text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
flavor_text: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

name: Darius Crowley
card_text: RushAfter this attacks and killsa minion, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: You either die a villain, or live long enough to see yourself become the hero.

name: Dark Iron Skulker
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all undamaged enemy minions.
flavor_text: He loves skulking. He skulks after hours just for the joy of it, but his friends are pretty worried he'll get burnt out.

name: Death Revenant
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each damaged minion.
flavor_text: How's everyone doing? Hurt? Bleeding? Wounded? ... Excellent.

name: Direhorn Hatchling
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
flavor_text: His mom could beat up your mom.

name: Doppelgangster
card_text: Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this minion.
flavor_text: "Every me, get in here!"

name: Dragon Speaker
card_text: Battlecry: Give all Dragons in your hand +3/+3.
flavor_text: All of his speeches really drag on.

name: Druid of the Claw
card_text: Choose One - Transforminto a 5/4 with Rush;or a 5/6 with Taunt.
flavor_text: Cat or Bear? Cat or Bear?! I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Druid of the Claw
card_text: Taunt

name: Druid of the Fang
card_text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, transform this minion into a 7/7.
flavor_text: The Druids of the Fang live in the Wailing Caverns. They wear cool snake shirts and tell snake jokes and say "bro" a lot.

name: Dyn-o-matic
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions except Mechs.
flavor_text: Star player on the inter-office Boomball team.

name: Earth Elemental
card_text: TauntOverload: (2)
flavor_text: Nothing beats rock.

name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
card_text: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
flavor_text: He's looking for a drummer. The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen'jin Shieldmasta', and Ragnaros the Firelord.

name: Emberscale Drake
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor_text: The third little dragon made his armor out of adamantite.

name: Ethereal Conjurer
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor_text: Despite the name, he's a solid conjurer.

name: Ethereal Peddler
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards from another class, reduce their Cost by (2).
flavor_text: Yeah, sure. That Ragnaros "fell off the back of a truck".

name: Faceless Lurker
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Double this minion's Health.
flavor_text: Longtime lurker, first time attacker.

name: Fen Creeper
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn't an actual beast. Boom, New Name!

name: Festeroot Hulk
card_text: After a friendly minion attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Tree puns arboring.

name: Feugen
card_text: Deathrattle: If Stalagg also died this game, summon Thaddius.
flavor_text: Feugen is sad because everyone likes Stalagg better.

name: Floating Watcher
card_text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

name: Furbolg Mossbinder
card_text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a 6/6 Elemental.
flavor_text: Behold, the unstoppable power of MOSS!

name: Ghostly Charger
card_text: Divine ShieldRush
flavor_text: Maybe we should have called him Ghostly Rusher.

name: Duskfallen Aviana
card_text: On each player's turn, the first card played costs (0).
flavor_text: Someone called her "Tweety". She didn't take it well.

name: E.M.P. Operative
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a Mech.
flavor_text:
"I said this looks like a job for me
So everybody just follow me
'Cause we need a little E.M.P.
'Cause it feels so mechy without me…"

name: Elise the Trailblazer
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed Un'Goro pack into your deck.
flavor_text: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

name: Envoy Rustwix
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 3random Prime Legendaryminions into your deck.
flavor_text: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

name: Faceless Corruptor
card_text: Rush. Battlecry: Transformone of your minions intoa copy of this.
flavor_text: What does Madame Lazul have against faces?!

name: Faceless Manipulator
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavor_text: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

name: Fatespinner
card_text: Choose a Deathrattle (Secretly) - Deal 3 damage to all minions; or Give them +2/+2.
flavor_text: Her clothing? Pure silk, of course.

name: Fel Reaver
card_text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor_text: So reaver. Much fel. Wow.

name: Finja, the Flying Star
card_text: Stealth Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, summon 2 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor_text: The last true master of Finjitsu.

name: Former Champ
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 5/5 Hotshot.
flavor_text: The last time he saw action, Undertaker ruled the meta.

name: Freewheeling Skulker
card_text: At the end of your turn, switch sides.

name: Frostwolf Warlord
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
flavor_text: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley. Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

name: Fungalmancer
card_text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2/+2.
flavor_text: Fungalmancy is the easy major for those who can't cut it at Waxmancy.

name: Gloom Stag
card_text: TauntBattlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Majestic. Ethereal. Still pretty down in the dumps, though.

name: Gorloc Ravager
card_text: Battlecry: Draw 3 Murlocs.
flavor_text: Be careful what you fish for.

name: Green Jelly
card_text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/2 Ooze with Taunt.
flavor_text: This card really breaks out of the mold.

name: Grim Patron
card_text: After this minion survives damage, summon another Grim Patron.
flavor_text: If you love getting your face punched, come to the Grim Guzzler!

name: Grook Fu Master
card_text: Windfury
flavor_text: Grook Fu, the ancient Hozen art of bashing heads with a stick.

name: Guild Recruiter
card_text: Battlecry: Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
flavor_text: The original telemarketer.

name: Halazzi, the Lynx
card_text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with 1/1 Lynxes that have Rush.
flavor_text: Remember, you’re only as strong as your weakest lynx.

name: Harrison Jones
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
flavor_text: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

name: Intrepid Dragonstalker
card_text: Whenever ANY player plays a card, gain +1/+1.

name: Jandice Barov
card_text: Battlecry: Summon tworandom 5-Cost minions.Secretly pick one that dies when it takes damage.
flavor_text: Her parents own Scholomance. Of course she's going to play tricks on the students!

name: Junkbot
card_text: Whenever a friendly Mech dies, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: One bot's junk is another bot's AWESOME UPGRADE!

name: Kabal Songstealer
card_text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor_text: Gadgetzan Writer’s Award goes to the player who writes the most compelling fanfic about why this Arakkoa has a golden frog in his hand!

name: Glitter Moth
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, double the Health of your other minions.
flavor_text: Some moths are attracted to flame. This one's attracted to disco.

name: Glowstone Technician
card_text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"Windell! More light!"
"I'm givin' it all she's got, Kangor!"

name: Gral, the Shark
card_text: Battlecry: Eat a minion inyour deck and gain its stats.Deathrattle: Add it toyour hand.
flavor_text: “… We’re gonna need a bigger board.”

name: Greybough
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Give a randomfriendly minion "Deathrattle:Summon Greybough."
flavor_text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

name: Grimestreet Enforcer
card_text: At the end of your turn, give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Sir, you don't have a permit to park your mount here."

name: Gurubashi Berserker
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
flavor_text: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Hailbringer
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1Ice Shards that Freeze.
flavor_text: Knows every way to greet someone.

name: Hallazeal the Ascended
card_text: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Hallazeals all your dallazamage.

name: Hemet Nesingwary
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a Beast.
flavor_text: It's hard to make a living as a hunter in a world where beasts instantly reappear minutes after you kill them.

name: Holomancer
card_text: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor_text: Help me, worthy opponent. You're my only hope.

name: Ixlid, Fungal Lord
card_text: After you play a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: We suggest crafting Ixlid; he'll grow on you. Literally.

name: King of Beasts
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other Beast you have.
flavor_text: He never sleeps. Not even in the mighty jungle.

name: Kobold Stickyfinger
card_text: Battlecry: Steal your opponent's weapon.
flavor_text: He no take candle. He take sword.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
card_text: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavor_text: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Loose Specimen
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split among other friendly minions.
flavor_text: You leave Deathstalker Rexxar alone in the lab for TWO minutes…

name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
card_text: Battlecry: For the rest of thegame, after you summona Silver Hand Recruit,give it Divine Shield.
flavor_text: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

name: Lotus Assassin
card_text: Stealth. Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, gain Stealth.
flavor_text: For 5000g, you can just give the Jade Lotus any name and they will assassinate and/or embarrass them.

name: Lyra the Sunshard
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

name: Madder Bomber
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavor_text: Dang, Bomber, calm down.

name: Malygos, Aspect of Magic
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga Dragon, Discover an upgraded Mage spell.
flavor_text: It's official. We can say Malygeese.

name: Mechano-Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Robosaur.
flavor_text: When you need more iron in your diet.

name: Mimiron's Head
card_text: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 3 Mechs, destroy them all and form V-07-TR-0N.
flavor_text: Do not push the big red button!

name: Moonfang
card_text: Can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavor_text: Moonforehead just didn't have the same ring to it.

name: Muckmorpher
card_text: Battlecry: Transform intoa 4/4 copy of a differentminion in your deck.
flavor_text: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

name: Knuckles
card_text: After this attacks aminion, it also hits the enemy hero.
flavor_text: When confronted with accusations of performance-enhancing bananas, Knuckles replied, "I get my fruit from trees I knock down with my bare hands like everyone else."

name: Kvaldir Raider
card_text: Inspire: Gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Coming soon... to a tuskarr village near you!

name: Lake Thresher
card_text: Also damages the minions next to whomeverthis attacks.
flavor_text:
"There’s a monster in the lake?!"
"That’s not a monster, that’s Gary."

name: Lilypad Lurker
card_text: Battlecry: If you played anElemental last turn, transforman enemy minion into a0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor_text: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

name: Loatheb
card_text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
flavor_text: Loatheb used to be a simple Bog Beast. This is why we need stricter regulations on mining and agriculture.

name: Lotus Agents
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Druid, Rogue, or Shaman card.
flavor_text: Mostly, they stand around and look cool.

name: Menagerie Magician
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +2/+2.
flavor_text: Just between us, if things get tight the Menagerie Magician position will probably be the first to go.

name: Menagerie Warden
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Beast. Summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: Please? Can I keep him? I promise to clean his cage every day.

name: Mosh'Ogg Announcer
card_text: Enemies attacking thishave a 50% chance toattack someone else.
flavor_text: One's play-by-play. The other is off-color.

name: Muck Hunter
card_text: RushBattlecry: Summon two 2/1 Mucklings for your opponent.
flavor_text: You think your job mucks.

name: Myra Rotspring
card_text: Battlecry: Discover aDeathrattle minion. Alsogain its Deathrattle.
flavor_text: On her first day on the job, Myra removed the smoke detectors.

name: Nesting Roc
card_text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
flavor_text: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

name: Ogre Ninja
card_text: Stealth50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor_text: He didn't have the grades to get into ninja school, but his dad pulled some strings.

name: Omega Agent
card_text: Battlecry: If you have 10Mana Crystals, summon 2 copies of this minion.
flavor_text: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

name: Overlord Runthak
card_text: Rush. Whenever thisattacks, give +1/+1 to allminions in your hand.
flavor_text: Knows how to lift everyone up while tearing every enemy down.

name: Platebreaker
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's Armor.
flavor_text: Worst. Dinner guest. Ever.

name: Priest of An'she
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, gain +3/+3.
flavor_text: "An’she?" "Bless you!" "No, you, An'she…" "Bless you again!"

name: Prince Malchezaar
card_text: Start of Game:Add 5 extra Legendaryminions to your deck.
flavor_text: He was super excited to acquire Gorehowl at a garage sale!  Then super disappointed to find out it was a foam reproduction.

name: Princess Huhuran
card_text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor_text: She flitters around Ahn'Qiraj dreaming of the day she will meet a sweet prince, whom she can lay thousands of eggs with.

name: Psych-o-Tron
card_text: TauntDivine Shield
flavor_text: "Annoyinger-o-Tron" was just too unwieldy. And accurate.

name: Quartermaster
card_text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2.
flavor_text: His specialty? Dividing things into four pieces.

name: Queen Azshara
card_text: Battlecry: If you've cast three spells while holding this, choose an Ancient Relic.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor_text: Hobbies include: Ordering subjects around, making deals with old gods, and taking long walks under the beach.

name: Ram Wrangler
card_text: Battlecry: If you have a Beast, summon arandom Beast.
flavor_text: Not getting trampled is really the trick here.

name: Recruiter
card_text: Inspire: Add a 2/2 Squire to your hand.
flavor_text: Join the Argent Crusade! We have attractive tabards and you get to carry really nice swords!

name: Red Mana Wyrm
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: It has double the Attack. "Go on." And double the Health. "Yes??" And its trigger has twice the effect. "WHAT???" And it costs… Five times more.

name: Ringmaster Whatley
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
flavor_text: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

name: Rotten Applebaum
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Key ingredient in Gilnean applesauce.

name: Ruststeed Raider
card_text: Taunt, RushBattlecry: Gain +4 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: Three-time winner (and sole survivor) of the Crashes of Outland motocross!

name: Salty Dog
flavor_text: He's recently recovered from being a "scurvy dog."

name: Sandhoof Waterbearer
card_text: At the end of your turn, restore 5 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor_text: Used to carrying for his team.

name: Scrap Golem
card_text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Gain Armor equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor_text: Abuse, reuse, recycle.

name: Seaforium Bomber
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Bombinto your opponent's deck.When drawn, it explodesfor 5 damage.
flavor_text: Dress for the bomb you want, not the bomb you have.

name: Shado-Pan Rider
card_text: Combo: Gain +3 Attack.
flavor_text: He needed a break after that business in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Naturally, he chose to spend his vacation in an icy snowscape killing monsters.

name: Mukla's Champion
card_text: Inspire: Give your other minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: An elegant gorilla, for a more civilized age.

name: Nexus-Champion Saraad
card_text: Inspire: Add a random spell to your hand.
flavor_text: The ethereals have their own jousting tournament, and Saraad is the reigning champion. Also he won the ethereal hot dog eating contest.

name: Nightblade
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Your face is the place you'd probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

name: Oasis Surger
card_text: RushChoose One - Gain +2/+2; or Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor_text: Surge's up, dude!

name: Onyx Bishop
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a friendly minion that died this game.
flavor_text: B4 is a nice place to visit, but he wouldn't want to live there.

name: Pit Fighter
flavor_text: What did the pits ever do to you?

name: Prince Liam
card_text: Battlecry: Transform all1-Cost cards in your deck into Legendary minions.
flavor_text: "I have a very particular set of skills. Skills that make me a nightmare for witches like you."

name: Quartz Elemental
card_text: Can't attack while damaged.
flavor_text: These elementals, along with feldspar and mica, are often taken for granite.

name: Raza the Chained
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, your Hero Power costs (0) this game.
flavor_text: "Could you do me a favor and get the keys from Kazakus?"

name: Reckless Experimenter
card_text: Deathrattle minions youplay cost (3) less, but dieat the end of the turn.
flavor_text: It's hard to call her reckless when it's clear she knows what she's doing.

name: Recurring Villain
card_text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 4 or more Attack, resummon it.
flavor_text: Mwahahaha! You'll never catch him this time!

name: Rotnest Drake
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga Dragon, destroy a randomenemy minion.
flavor_text: Clean your room, or I'm taking your favorite minion away!

name: Rusty Recycler
card_text: TauntLifesteal
flavor_text: Ironic. It could recycle others, but not itself.

name: Scalelord
card_text: Battlecry: Give your Murlocs Divine Shield.
flavor_text: It's about what they have in common, not what makes them different.

name: Second-Rate Bruiser
card_text: TauntCosts (2) less if youropponent has at leastthree minions.
flavor_text: He'll be a first-rate bruiser once he gets used to his contacts.

name: Servant of Kalimos
card_text: Battlecry: If you playedan Elemental last turn, Discover an Elemental.
flavor_text: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

name: Servant of Yogg-Saron
card_text: Battlecry: Cast a random spell that costs (5) or less (targets chosen randomly).
flavor_text: Yogg-Saron always likes to complain about how he has too many servants and there are too many mouths to feed.

name: Shadow Hunter Vol'jin
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Swap it with a random one in its owner's hand.
flavor_text: You wouldn’t see this swap-meet on the Zandalari Roadshow.

name: Shieldmaiden
card_text: Battlecry: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor_text: She has three shieldbearers in her party to supply her with back ups when she gets low on durability.

name: Siege Engine
card_text: Whenever you gain Armor, give this minion +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Wintergrasp Keep's only weakness!

name: Silver Hand Knight
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Squire.
flavor_text: It's good to be a knight. Less so to be one's squire.

name: Sludge Belcher
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Slime with Taunt.
flavor_text: DO NOT GIVE HIM A ROOT BEER.

name: Spectral Knight
card_text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: What do Faerie Dragons and Spectral Knights have in common? They both love pasta!

name: Spiteful Smith
card_text: Your weapon has +2 Attack while this is damaged.
flavor_text: She'll craft you a sword, but you'll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

name: Stalagg
card_text: Deathrattle: If Feugen also died this game, summon Thaddius.
flavor_text: Stalagg want to write own flavor text. "STALAGG AWESOME!"

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
card_text: Stealth
flavor_text: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Streetwise Investigator
card_text: Battlecry: Enemy minions lose Stealth.
flavor_text: "Hmmmm… Call it a hunch, but I'm starting to think that there may be some kind of criminal activity going on in Gadgetzan."

name: Summoning Stone
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random minion of the same Cost.
flavor_text: Sometimes it feels like it's always the same slackers that are waiting for a summon.

name: Sunborne Val'kyr
card_text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +2 Health.
flavor_text: Bring valor to Odyn's halls, Champion!

name: Tar Lurker
card_text: TauntHas +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor_text: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

name: Teacher's Pet
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Summon arandom 3-Cost Beast.
flavor_text: Really goes the extra mile to get the Hay+.

name: Shadowcaster
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a 1/1 copy to your hand that costs (1).
flavor_text: I mean, it's not creepy if you ASK before you steal their shadow to make a small replica of them to keep on your shelf.

name: Sightless Ranger
card_text: RushOverkill: Summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavor_text: An eye for sore sights.

name: Skelemancer
card_text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon an 8/8 Skeleton.
flavor_text: What do you mean there's no such thing as "Skelemancy?" But "Dinomancy" is ok?

name: Snapjaw Shellfighter
card_text: Whenever an adjacentminion takes damage, this minion takes it instead.
flavor_text: Nonono, the turtle is the Shellfighter.

name: Spiked Hogrider
card_text: Battlecry: If an enemy minion has Taunt, gain Charge.
flavor_text: Did you know the Hogchoppers compete every year at the Mirage Raceway? They do. It's a real group.

name: Stampeding Kodo
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavor_text: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

name: Steward of Scrolls
card_text: Spell Damage +1Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor_text: Oh dang it, I spilled ink elemental all over my essay!

name: Stormpike Commando
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavor_text: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts. They also bake a mean cupcake.

name: Stowaway
card_text: Battlecry: If there are cardsin your deck that didn't startthere, draw 2 of them.
flavor_text: Cut him a break. Even economy class tickets are pretty expensive these days.

name: Subject 9
card_text: Battlecry: Draw 5 different Secrets from your deck.
flavor_text: The original clever girl.

name: Taelan Fordring
card_text: Taunt, Divine ShieldDeathrattle: Draw yourhighest Cost minion.
flavor_text: After growing up with the Scarlet Crusade for most of his life, Taelan finally realized they were maybe not the nicest people.

name: Temple Enforcer
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor_text: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: The Rat King
card_text: Rush. Deathrattle: GoDormant. Revive after 5friendly minions die.
flavor_text: "I'm the giant rat that makes all of da rules!"

name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
card_text: Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating. I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

name: Tol'vir Warden
card_text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
flavor_text: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

name: Totem Goliath
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems.Overload: (1)
flavor_text: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Tuskarr Jouster
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, restore 7 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Just could not be talked out of using his turtle for the joust...

name: Twilight Runner
card_text: StealthWhenever this attacks, draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: Every morning you find two dead cards at your doorstep.

name: Usher of Souls
card_text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1(wherever it is).
flavor_text: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

name: Vectus
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two1/1 Whelps. Each gains aDeathrattle from your minionsthat died this game.
flavor_text: Don’t let that dark magic worry you. He’ll ensure they hatch without a scratch.

name: Venomancer
card_text: Poisonous
flavor_text: Eight times the death of regular-mancers.

name: Verdant Longneck
card_text: Battlecry: Adapt.
flavor_text: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

name: Vilespine Slayer
card_text: Combo: Destroy a minion.
flavor_text: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

name: Void Drinker
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroya Soul Fragment in yourdeck to gain +3/+3.
flavor_text: It has no taste.

name: Voodoo Hexxer
card_text: TauntFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor_text: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

name: Waxadred
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle aCandle into your deck thatresummons Waxadredwhen drawn.
flavor_text: Waxadred the dragon fought for his king, frolicking through the fields melting everything!

name: Windshear Stormcaller
card_text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir the Windlord.
flavor_text: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

name: Tomb Lurker
card_text: Battlecry: Add a randomDeathrattle minion that diedthis game to your hand.
flavor_text: She hangs out in all the tombs, but she rarely posts.

name: Trampling Rhino
card_text: Rush. After this attacksand kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
flavor_text: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

name: Treespeaker
card_text: Battlecry: Transform your Treants into 5/5 Ancients.
flavor_text: Honestly, his delivery is a little wooden.

name: Trogg Gloomeater
card_text: TauntPoisonous
flavor_text: His breath smells like agony and despair, which is still better than most troggs.

name: Tundra Rhino
card_text: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavor_text: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

name: Twilight Darkmender
card_text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: First she separates them from the lights, washes them in cold water, and hang-dries.

name: Upgraded Repair Bot
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +4 Health.
flavor_text: It's the same as the previous generation but they slapped the word "upgraded" on it to sell it for double.

name: Validated Doomsayer
card_text: At the start of your turn, set this minion's Attack to 7.
flavor_text: Really feels good about himself and is in a much better place now. But… he sure does miss piloting those shredders.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
card_text: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavor_text: No Job is too big. No fee is too big.

name: Vilebrood Skitterer
card_text: PoisonousRush
flavor_text: It aspires to be a Vilebrood Dancer, but it has eight left feet.

name: Virmen Sensei
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2.
flavor_text: There is no carrot.

name: Vol'jin
card_text: Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
flavor_text: Vol'jin is a shadow hunter, which is like a shadow priest except more voodoo.

name: Wargear
card_text: Magnetic
flavor_text: WAR! GEAR! What is it good for?

name: White Eyes
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Shuffle'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
flavor_text: My life for Aya!

name: Witchwood Grizzly
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Lose 1 Healthfor each card in youropponent's hand.
flavor_text: You know what they say about people with big hands? Small bears.

name: Zilliax
card_text: MagneticDivine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal, Rush
flavor_text: Everything but the kitchen sink. Oh wait, there's one on his back.

name: Aberrant Berserker
card_text: Has +2 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: I berserk, therefore I am.

name: Ancestral Guardian
card_text: LifestealReborn
flavor_text: No one knows whose ancestor he is, but he's still upset that you never call.

name: Ancient Brewmaster
card_text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor_text: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak. But apparently that's a compliment.

name: Animated Armor
card_text: Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.
flavor_text: Try putting it on. Wait, let me get my camera.

name: Annoy-o-Module
card_text: MagneticDivine ShieldTaunt
flavor_text: Every ten seconds it asks if you want to update.

name: Apothecary Helbrim
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Poison to your hand.
flavor_text: The best way to maintain your health is to poison everyone else.

name: Arathi Weaponsmith
card_text: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
flavor_text: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

name: Arcane Keysmith
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
flavor_text: She sells all manner of keys: from A flat to G sharp.

name: Arcane Nullifier X-21
card_text: TauntCan't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: There was some hard talk between gnome magi and engineers about inventing this mech.

name: Archmage Vargoth
card_text: At the end of your turn, casta spell you've cast this turn(targets are random).
flavor_text: He's an archmage, but he might want to brush up on the basics... like aiming.

name: Arena Treasure Chest
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: Yeah it's great, but did you see the Arena Treasure Arms?!

name: Armored Warhorse
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain Charge.
flavor_text: Yep. It's a horse... wearing armor... going to war.

name: Axe Flinger
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Once a lowly "Stick Flinger", he's been relentless on the path to his ultimate dream: "Tauren Flinger".

name: Azure Explorer
card_text: Spell Damage +2Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor_text: Has an appetite for knowledge!

name: Backroom Bouncer
card_text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: "WHY ARE YOU IN THE BACK ROOM? WHO IS WATCHING THE FRONT?!"

name: Baron Rivendare
card_text: Your minions trigger their Deathrattles twice.
flavor_text: There used to be five Horsemen but one of them left because a job opened up in the deadmines and the benefits were better.

name: Bellringer Sentry
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Who are you? Eh, none of my business."

name: Blademaster Samuro
card_text: RushFrenzy: Deal damage equalto this minion's Attack to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Artists paint their visions meticulously on canvas. Blademasters paint with, uh, broader strokes.

name: Bloodhoof Brave
card_text: TauntHas +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it. He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

name: Ambassador Faelin
card_text: Battlecry: Put 3 Colossal minions on the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text: For thousands of years, Faelin has longed to return to his homeland. Will Zin-Azshari be as he hopes, or are the secrets of the deep better left forgotten?

name: Ancient Mage
card_text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
flavor_text: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else's game.

name: Ancient Shade
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle an 'Ancient Curse' into your deck that deals 7 damage to you when drawn.
flavor_text: Warning: Do not expose to direct sunlight.

name: Anub'ar Ambusher
card_text: Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand.
flavor_text: Originally he was called "Anub'ar Guy who bounces a guy back to your hand", but it lacked a certain zing.

name: Arcane Fletcher
card_text: Whenever you play a1-Cost minion, draw aspell from your deck.
flavor_text: Stop trying to make fletch happen. It's not going to happen.

name: Arcanosmith
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/5 minion with Taunt.
flavor_text: He’s really just a Blacksmith, but he thought the fancy title would bring in more business.

name: Arena Fanatic
card_text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Her fantasy Rumble league gives double points for dismemberment.

name: Arfus
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Death Knight card to your hand.
flavor_text: There must always be a Lick King.

name: Arrogant Crusader
card_text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn, summon a 2/2 Ghoul.
flavor_text: To be honest, he was kind of a jerk even BEFORE he was bitten by that ghoul.

name: Astral Tiger
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this minion into your deck.
flavor_text: Astral kitty litter is surprisingly hard to find.

name: Auchenai Soulpriest
card_text: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
flavor_text: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they're not sure when.

name: Balloon Merchant
card_text: Battlecry: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +1 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: It's a shiny yellow balloon! But it can be popped with a single point of damage.

name: Big Game Hunter
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavor_text: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him. Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Blackwater Pirate
card_text: Your weapons cost (2) less.
flavor_text: "Look, they fell off the back of a ship, do you want them or not? I have a meeting with Y'Shaarj in like ten minutes."

name: Blademaster Okani
card_text: Battlecry: Secretly choose toCounter the next minion orspell your opponent playswhile this is alive.
flavor_text: Yet ANOTHER sword fighter that spams counters.

name: Blightnozzle Crawler
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Poisonous and Rush.
flavor_text: "Well we HAD it contained. Then you went and gave it legs!"

name: Blood Witch
card_text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

name: Body Wrapper
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Shuffle it into your deck.
flavor_text: She uses pickle slices for the eyes. Keeps them well-preserved.

name: Bone Wraith
card_text: TauntReborn
flavor_text: It uses only the eco-friendly bones from free-range humanoids.

name: Bright-Eyed Scout
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).
flavor_text: Also inordinately excited for cupcakes.

name: Burly Rockjaw Trogg
card_text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: He's burly because he does CrossFit.

name: Canal Slogger
card_text: Rush, LifestealOverload: (1)
flavor_text: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

name: Cariel Roame
card_text: Rush, Divine ShieldWhenever this attacks,reduce the Cost of Holy spells in your hand by (1).
flavor_text: Cariel had pledged her honor to the Alliance, but when someone matching her long-lost sister's description was sighted at the Crossroads, Cariel did the unthinkable: she abandoned her post and set out across the Barrens.

name: Chillblade Champion
card_text: ChargeLifesteal
flavor_text: It slices, it dices, it vaporizes! The Chillblade will make a Champion out of even the lowliest gnome.

name: Circus Amalgam
card_text: TauntThis has all minion types.
flavor_text: Who needs a petting zoo when you have all the creatures right here?!

name: Conjured Mirage
card_text: TauntAt the start of your turn, shuffle this minion into your deck.
flavor_text: What you see is Isiset.

name: Core Rager
card_text: Battlecry: If your hand is empty, gain +3/+3.
flavor_text: It takes a special kind of hunter to venture deep into a firey lava pit and convince a monster who lives there to come home and be a cuddly housepet.

name: Corpsetaker
card_text: Battlecry: Gain Taunt if yourdeck has a Taunt minion.Repeat for Divine Shield,Lifesteal, Windfury.
flavor_text: Her extensive collection of corpses includes one of nearly every type. She'd love for you to join it.

name: Cosmic Anomaly
card_text: Spell Damage +2
flavor_text:
INGREDIENTS: STAR-STUFF,
BLUE #1, NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS.

name: Crowd Favorite
card_text: Whenever you play a card with Battlecry, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: The crowd ALWAYS yells lethal.

name: Crystalweaver
card_text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
flavor_text: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

name: C'Thun's Chosen
card_text: Divine ShieldBattlecry: Give your C'Thun+2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor_text: He gave her a promise ring and everything.

name: Cursed Disciple
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/1 Revenant.
flavor_text: Politer than his brother, the cursing disciple, but far more evil.

name: Cyclopian Horror
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each enemy minion.
flavor_text: What are the qualifications for being a 'Horror?' Just how horrible do you have to be?

name: Daring Reporter
card_text: Whenever your opponent draws a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: She's working on a story! While skydiving!

name: Deathaxe Punisher
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random Lifesteal minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: Don't fear the Arcanite Reaper.

name: Brittlebone Destroyer
card_text: Battlecry: If your hero'sHealth changed this turn,destroy a minion.
flavor_text: Broke many a leg in drama class.

name: Burrowing Scorpid
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.If that kills the target,gain Stealth.
flavor_text: It's a game of hide and go sting.

name: Chillwind Yeti
flavor_text: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

name: Coppertail Imposter
card_text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.
flavor_text: It was fitting in fine until it gathered nuts and bolts.

name: Crimson Hothead
card_text: Spellburst: Gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor_text: Has a real passion for spelling.

name: Cult Master
card_text: After a friendly minion dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

name: Dalaran Aspirant
card_text: Inspire: Gain Spell Damage +1.
flavor_text: Is he aspiring or inspiring? Make up your mind!

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
card_text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore. Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

name: Demented Frostcaller
card_text: After you cast a spell, Freeze a random enemy.
flavor_text: He prefers that you refer to him by his nickname: 'Frostwaker.'

name: Disguised Wanderer
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 9/1 Inquisitor.
flavor_text: He wanders east... always into the east.

name: Dragonling Mechanic
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
flavor_text: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

name: Dread Corsair
card_text: TauntCosts (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavor_text: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Dreadsteed
card_text: Deathrattle: At the end of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
flavor_text: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament. Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

name: Eager Underling
card_text: Deathrattle: Give two random friendly minions +2/+2.
flavor_text: Eager to please, even if it kills him.

name: Earth Revenant
card_text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 1 damageto all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

name: Ebon Dragonsmith
card_text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of a random weapon in your hand by (2).
flavor_text: Having a furnace-mouth is really handy for a blacksmith.

name: Eerie Statue
card_text: Can’t attack unless it’s the only minion on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Don't blink! Don't turn your back, don't look away, and DON'T BLINK.

name: Elise Starseeker
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey' into your deck.
flavor_text: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.

name: Elven Minstrel
card_text: Combo: Draw 2 minions from your deck.
flavor_text: "After that gig in Hamlin went south, I swore off rats."

name: Evasive Feywing
card_text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: I've never heard of this fey-dragon called "Brightwing," but if I HAD, I’d say we’d be best friends.

name: Evolved Kobold
card_text: Spell Damage +2
flavor_text: You no take tentacle!

name: Exploding Bloatbat
card_text: Deathrattle:Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: We've all been there after a night of one-too-many funnel cakes.

name: Fal'dorei Strider
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3Ambushes into your deck.When drawn, summona 4/4 Spider.
flavor_text: What’s worse? Seeing the spider, or NOT seeing the spider, but knowing it’s somewhere in your deck?

name: Defender of Argus
card_text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavor_text: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending. But it does.

name: Diseased Vulture
card_text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, summon a random3-Cost minion.
flavor_text: He's off the twig! He's kicked the bucket! THIS IS AN EX-VULTURE!

name: Dispatch Kodo
card_text: Battlecry: Deal damage equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor_text: "Crime reported at First Bank of Gadgetzan. Huge quantities of Jade being carried away by what looks like a bunch of Hozen. Kodo 77 can you make it over there now?"

name: Draenei Totemcarver
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each friendly Totem.
flavor_text: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

name: Dragonbane
card_text: After you use your Hero Power, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: *Thunk* "That wasn’t a dragon!" *Thunk* "THAT wasn’t a dragon!"

name: Dragonkin Sorcerer
card_text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: Dragonkin Sorcerers be all "I'm a wizard" and everyone else be all "daaaaang".

name: Dragonmaw Poacher
card_text: Battlecry: If your opponent controls a Dragon, gain +4/+4 and Rush.
flavor_text: I prefer my dragons over-easy.

name: Dunemaul Shaman
card_text: Windfury, Overload: (1)50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor_text: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

name: Duskbreaker
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga Dragon, deal 3 damage to all other minions.
flavor_text: Waking up at the break of dusk is just not as impressive.

name: Eater of Secrets
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy all enemy Secrets. Gain +1/+1 for each.
flavor_text: You don't want to be around after it has eaten an explosive trap. You thought Sludge Belcher was bad...

name: Enhance-o Mechano
card_text: Battlecry: Give your other minions Windfury, Taunt, or Divine Shield(at random).
flavor_text: His enhancements are gluten free!

name: Ethereal Arcanist
card_text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it's nice and soft.

name: Evil Heckler
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: To be honest, heckling is not the most effective form of evil.

name: Explodinator
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 0/2 Goblin Bombs.
flavor_text: When it absolutely, positively, has to blow up overnight.

name: Faceless Shambler
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Attack and Health.
flavor_text: "What is that thing?!" "I'm not sure, but it seems to be sort of Ysera shaped."

name: Fandral Staghelm
card_text: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
flavor_text: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

name: Fel Cannon
card_text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
flavor_text: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

name: Fire Breather
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
flavor_text: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

name: Fireguard Destroyer
card_text: Battlecry: Gain 1-4 Attack. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.

name: Fishy Flyer
card_text: Rush. Deathrattle: Add a 4/3 Ghost with Rush to your hand.
flavor_text: Like a fish out of water.

name: Flobbidinous Floop
card_text: While in your hand, this is a 3/4 copy of the last minion you played.
flavor_text: Of all the scientists, he has the most knowledge (when measured in volume).

name: Forest Guide
card_text: At the end of your turn, both players draw a card.
flavor_text: "Just sign this waiver, and we'll be on our way."

name: Frigid Snobold
card_text: Spell Damage +1
flavor_text: Ironically, the natural enemy of the snobold is THE CANDLE.

name: Garden Gnome
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga spell that costs (5) or more,summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor_text: "Greetings, my little shrubs... It's whittlin' time."

name: Genzo, the Shark
card_text: Whenever this attacks, both players draw until they have 3 cards.
flavor_text: Infamous in the seedy underground card rooms of Gadgetzan, he got his nickname winning the coveted Shark Plushie in the city's first Hearthstone tournament.

name: Goblin Blastmage
card_text: Battlecry: If you have a Mech, deal 4 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor_text: If you can't find a bomb to throw, just pick up any goblin invention and throw that.

name: Gormok the Impaler
card_text: Battlecry: If you have at least 4 other minions, deal 4 damage.
flavor_text: Gormok has been giving impaling lessons in a small tent near the tournament grounds. For only 25g you too could learn the fine art of impaling!

name: Grave Shambler
card_text: Whenever your weapon is destroyed, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: I think one of the necromancers got a little carried away.

name: Grim Necromancer
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Skeletons.
flavor_text: WARNING: Skeletons will NOT explode.

name: Felfin Navigator
card_text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +1/+1.
flavor_text: Return my fishes to me, and I myself shall carry you to the gates of Mrrhalla!

name: Felsoul Inquisitor
card_text: LifestealTaunt
flavor_text: Everyone expects an inquisition reference.

name: Fire Plume Phoenix
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavor_text: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

name: Flamewreathed Faceless
card_text: Overload: (2)
flavor_text: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!

name: Frizz Kindleroost
card_text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Dragons in your deck by (2).
flavor_text: Frizz knows that baby dragons need warmth, care, and the highest possible level of goblin engineering.

name: Gentle Megasaur
card_text: Battlecry: Adapt your Murlocs.
flavor_text: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

name: Ghastly Conjurer
card_text: Battlecry: Add a 'Mirror Image' spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Wearing purple after the holidays? GHASTLY!

name: Gnomish Inventor
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor_text: She's never quite sure what she's making, she just knows it's AWESOME!

name: Granite Forgeborn
card_text: Battlecry: Reduce the cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
flavor_text: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

name: Griftah
card_text: Battlecry: Discover twocards. Give one to youropponent at random.
flavor_text: With Griftah in your deck, sometimes you start the game with The Coin!

name: Grimy Gadgeteer
card_text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: "You look like a Gadgetgun 3000-Mark IV man, am I right?"

name: Groundskeeper
card_text: TauntBattlecry: If you're holding aspell that costs (5) or more,restore 5 Health.
flavor_text: It’s tricky for dryads to tend the garden without trampling the flowers.

name: Hecklebot
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Your opponent summons a minion from their deck.
flavor_text: Built by goblins, designed by a troll.

name: Hench-Clan Hag
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Amalgams with all minion types.
flavor_text: The Hench Clan is an equal opportunity employer, no matter which parts of you came from where.

name: High Abbess Alura
card_text: Spellburst: Cast a spell from your deck (targets this if possible).
flavor_text: She's all about hitting the books. Literally.

name: High Priestess Jeklik
card_text: Taunt, LifestealWhen you discard this,add 2 copies of it toyour hand.
flavor_text: If you love Jeklik, set her free. YOU CAN'T GET RID OF HER.

name: Hippogryph
card_text: RushTaunt
flavor_text: Known for its ferocious grace, the hippogryph is a truly majestic creature. Except when molting.

name: Hoarding Dragon
card_text: Deathrattle: Give your opponent two Coins.
flavor_text: Keeps his two cents to himself.

name: Holy Champion
card_text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: She really likes seeing people get better. That's why she hurts them in the first place.

name: Hooked Reaver
card_text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or less Health, gain +3/+3 and Taunt.
flavor_text: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

name: Houndmaster Shaw
card_text: Your other minions haveRush.
flavor_text: They’re good dogs, Tess.

name: Hungry Dragon
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
flavor_text: Hungry Hungry Dragon is NOT a fun game.

name: Ice Cream Peddler
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Frozen minion, gain 8 Armor.
flavor_text: I scream, you scream, we all scream when we see a Freeze Mage.

name: Infested Tauren
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavor_text: The Overmind and the Old Gods are surprisingly similar.

name: Gruntled Patron
card_text: Frenzy: Summon another Gruntled Patron.
flavor_text: Gruntled and whelmed.

name: Half-Time Scavenger
card_text: StealthOverkill: Gain 3 Armor.
flavor_text: One player's trash is another's “Best In Slot”.

name: Harbinger Celestia
card_text: StealthAfter your opponent playsa minion, become acopy of it.
flavor_text: She wanders realities, taking on many forms. One was a unicorn princess.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor_text: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Hench-Clan Shadequill
card_text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: The Hench-Clan has a point.

name: High Priest Amet
card_text: Whenever you summon aminion, set its Health equalto this minion's.
flavor_text: All minions are equal, but some minions are more equal than others.

name: Hoard Pillager
card_text: Battlecry: Equip one of your destroyed weapons.
flavor_text: Better to have stabbed and lost. And then found again!

name: Hooded Acolyte
card_text: Whenever a character is healed, give yourC'Thun +1/+1 (wherever it is).
flavor_text: Wait, what kind of acolyte doesn't wear a hood?

name: Houndmaster
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor_text: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks. It's rhetorical.

name: Hozen Healer
card_text: Battlecry: Restore a minion to full Health.
flavor_text: He didn't go to school for healing, but we keep losing all the good healers to Ratchet, so I guess we'll take him.

name: Hyena Alpha
card_text: Battlecry: If you controla Secret, summon two2/2 Hyenas.
flavor_text: Everything the sun touches is ours—so long as it's already dead.

name: Infested Wolf
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spiders.
flavor_text: A little flea powder will fix that right up.

name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health.Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

name: Jungle Moonkin
card_text: Both players haveSpell Damage +2.
flavor_text: The REAL angry chicken!

name: Kargath Bladefist
card_text: RushDeathrattle: Shuffle'Kargath Prime'into your deck.
flavor_text: He rules the Shattered Hand orc clan with an iron... bladefist.

name: Keeper of the Grove
card_text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
flavor_text: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Keeper of Uldaman
card_text: Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor_text: U da man! No, U da man!

name: Klaxxi Amber-Weaver
card_text: Battlecry: If your C'Thun has at least 10 Attack, gain +5 Health.
flavor_text: Amberweaving is a specialty course at the local trade school.

name: Kobold Illusionist
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 copy of a minion from your hand.
flavor_text: He can make ANYTHING look like a candle.

name: Kor'kron Elite
card_text: Charge
flavor_text: The Kor'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let's just say you don't want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Lakkari Felhound
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Discard your two lowest-Cost cards.
flavor_text: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

name: Leyline Manipulator
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding any cards that didn't start in your deck, reduce their Cost by (2).
flavor_text: The shortest distance between two points is a leyline.

name: Lightsteed
card_text: Your healing effects also give affected minions+2 Health.
flavor_text: All the steed, half the calories.

name: Lilian Voss
card_text: Battlecry: Replace spells in your hand with random spells (from your opponent's class).
flavor_text: She doesn't feel pity, or remorse, or fear. And she absolutely will not stop... ever, until all necromancers are dead.

name: Injured Marauder
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Deal 6 damage to this minion.
flavor_text: He’ll keep going despite the neighsayers.

name: Ironwood Golem
card_text: TauntCan only attack if you have 3 or more Armor.
flavor_text: Marketed as a "rust-proof iron golem."

name: Jade Spirit
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor_text: "He's so cute! I just want to squeeze him, then use him for Jade Golem parts!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Jeeves
card_text: At the end of each player's turn, that player draws until they have 3 cards.
flavor_text: This robot is a lean, mean, butlerin' machine.

name: Kabal Chemist
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Potion to your hand.
flavor_text: Sure you could have that Polymorph potion, but wouldn't you rather have this mystery potion? It could be anything. Even a Polymorph potion!

name: Kazakus
card_text: Battlecry: If your deckhas no duplicates, create a custom spell.
flavor_text: The mysterious leader of the Kabal is NOT a dragon, and does NOT deal in illegal potions. Any public statements to the contrary will be met with litigation and Dragonfire Potions.

name: Keening Banshee
card_text: Whenever you play a card, remove the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor_text: "What are your strengths?" the interviewer asked. "Well," she replied, "I'm really good at keening."

name: Kezan Mystic
card_text: Battlecry: Take control of a random enemy Secret.
flavor_text: They pretend to be wise and enlightened, but they mostly just hate to be left out of a secret.

name: Kirin Tor Tricaster
card_text: Spell Damage +3Your spells cost (1) more.
flavor_text: The math checks out!

name: Kobold Monk
card_text: Your hero can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: There is no candle.

name: Kooky Chemist
card_text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavor_text: #abs

name: Lifedrinker
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage tothe enemy hero. Restore3 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Lightfused Stegodon
card_text: Battlecry: Adapt your Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor_text: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

name: Lorekeeper Polkelt
card_text: Battlecry: Reorder your deckfrom the highest Cost cardto the lowest Cost card.
flavor_text: quicksort [] = [] quicksort (x:xs) = quicksort small ++ (x : quicksort large) where small = [y | y <- xs, y <= x] large = [y | y <- xs, y > x]

name: Lost Tallstrider
flavor_text: The message, "If found, please return to Mulgore," is tattooed on his rear.

name: Mad Hatter
card_text: Battlecry: Randomly toss3 hats to other minions.Each hat gives +1/+1.
flavor_text: He's entirely bonkers. All the best goblins are.

name: Maiev Shadowsong
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a minion.It goes Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor_text: Go directly to Demon Jail. Do not attack minions, do not collect mana crystals.

name: Master of Evolution
card_text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor_text: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

name: Mechanical Yeti
card_text: Deathrattle: Give each player a Spare Part.
flavor_text: The yetis of Chillwind Point are a source of both inspiration and savage beatings.

name: Mire Keeper
card_text: Choose One - Summon a2/2 Slime; or Gain anempty Mana Crystal.
flavor_text:
"Hey.... Is that Mire for sale?"
"No. I'm keeping it."

name: Murloc Knight
card_text: Inspire: Summon a random Murloc.
flavor_text: Hee hee! Look at his cute little feet.

name: Naga Corsair
card_text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Hook-tails are nice and all but she keeps getting stuck on things.

name: Necrium Apothecary
card_text: Combo: Draw a Deathrattle minion from your deck and gain its Deathrattle.
flavor_text: Necrium: Get the afterlife without the aftertaste!

name: Necromechanic
card_text: Your Deathrattles trigger twice.
flavor_text: If at first you don't succeed, die, die again.

name: Night Prowler
card_text: Battlecry: If this is the only minion on the battlefield, gain +3/+3.
flavor_text: Listen to the mew-sic of the night.

name: Lotus Illusionist
card_text: After this minion attacksa hero, transform it into a random 6-Cost minion.
flavor_text: If you think her Xavius and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

name: Magnataur Alpha
card_text: Also damages the minions next to whomeverhe attacks.
flavor_text: Playing him also gets you into the Magnataur Beta.

name: Maiden of the Lake
card_text: Your Hero Power costs (1).
flavor_text: Not a good basis for a system of government.

name: Main Tank
card_text: Battlecry: Give all other minions +2/+2, except the Boss.

name: Master of Disguise
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.
flavor_text: She's actually a male tauren. People don't call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

name: Meat Wagon
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon aminion from your deckwith less Attack thanthis minion.
flavor_text: Necromancers call it "Meals on Wheels."

name: Midnight Drake
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each other cardin your hand.
flavor_text: Still fearsome in the daytime.

name: Militia Commander
card_text: RushBattlecry: Gain +3 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: She only needs two commands: "Heel" and "Sic 'em!"

name: Mistwraith
card_text: Whenever you play an Echo card, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: One little Mistwraith sitting in a tree. M-I-S-T-I-N-G.

name: Mogu'shan Warden
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King. BOOOORRRINNG!

name: Murloc Tastyfin
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 Murlocsfrom your deck.
flavor_text: He was destined for the soup. One way or another…

name: Najak Hexxen
card_text: Battlecry: Take control ofan enemy minion.Deathrattle: Give theminion back.
flavor_text: "I've got friends on the other side... of the battlefield."

name: Night Howler
card_text: Whenever this minion takesdamage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Honestly, he howls during the day, too.

name: Nightshade Matron
card_text: RushBattlecry: Discard your highest Cost card.
flavor_text: Throws shade at those "high-cost" minions.

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavor_text: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: Ogre Magi
card_text: Spell Damage +1
flavor_text: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Old Murk-Eye
card_text: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
flavor_text: He's a legend among murlocs. "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

name: Omega Devastator
card_text: Battlecry: If you have 10Mana Crystals, deal 10damage to a minion.
flavor_text: The Alpha Devastator didn’t devastate enough. The Beta Devastator devastated too much. But the Omega was just right!

name: Park Panther
card_text: Rush. Whenever thisattacks, give your hero+3 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: Somebody called animal control once. It didn't work out very well for anybody.

name: Piloted Reaper
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a random minion fromyour hand that costs (2) or less.
flavor_text: New facial recognition systems keep out the Lorewalkers and Doomsayers.

name: Pit Lord
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Plaguebringer
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Poisonous.
flavor_text: One sip and you've got the grippe.

name: Portal Keeper
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Portalsinto your deck. When drawn,summon a 2/2 Demonwith Rush.
flavor_text: No longer allowed to be “it” when playing demon tag.

name: Priest of the Feast
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, restore 3 Health toyour hero.
flavor_text: Now that's a world champion cheesecake!

name: Psychopomp
card_text: Battlecry: Summon arandom friendly minionthat died this game.Give it Reborn.
flavor_text: "Come with me if you want to re-live."

name: Rattling Rascal
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a5/5 Skeleton.Deathrattle: Summon onefor your opponent.
flavor_text: Don't give up, skeleton!

name: Ravenous Pterrordax
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt twice.
flavor_text: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

name: Occult Conjurer
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of this.
flavor_text: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

name: Oil Rig Ambusher
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.If this entered your hand this turn, deal 4 instead.
flavor_text: Days since last accident: 0

name: Omega Defender
card_text: TauntBattlecry: If you have10 Mana Crystals,gain +10 Attack.
flavor_text: "Surrender. You have 10 mana to comply."

name: Phantom Freebooter
card_text: Battlecry: Gain stats equal to your weapon's.
flavor_text: There's no such thing as a free boot.

name: Piloted Shredder
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavor_text: Once upon a time, only goblins piloted shredders. These days, everyone from Doomsayer to Lorewalker Cho seems to ride one.

name: Polluted Hoarder
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Roll ‘greed’ OR THIS COULD HAPPEN TO YOU.

name: Prince Valanar
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 4-Cost cards, gain Lifesteal and Taunt.
flavor_text: Three Princes stand before you. This one devours one after another.

name: Professor Putricide
card_text: After you play a Secret,put a random Hunter Secret into the battlefield.
flavor_text: Among his more notable inventions: A tentacle-groomer, a plague that would wipe out all life on Azeroth, and a fidget spinner.

name: Proud Defender
card_text: TauntHas +2 Attack while you have no other minions.
flavor_text: It'll take a humble offender to defeat him.

name: Raid Healer
card_text: Whenever your hero is healed, also heal your teammate for that much.

name: Reckless Apprentice
card_text: Battlecry: Fire your Hero Power at all enemies.
flavor_text: It’s all a great learning experience until someone accidentally aggros the boss.

name: Refreshment Vendor
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
flavor_text: Menu: Funnel cakes, carrots, popcorn, jormungar steaks. It's hard serving a diverse clientele.

name: Regeneratin' Thug
card_text: At the start of your turn, restore 2 Health to this minion.
flavor_text: Regenerates any injury except heartbreak.

name: Rumbling Elemental
card_text: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: He's a very hungry elemental.

name: Scaleworm
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor_text: A popular local alternative to bananas.

name: Screwjank Clunker
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavor_text: If it breaks, just kick it a couple of times while yelling "Durn thing!"

name: Seadevil Stinger
card_text: Battlecry: The next Murlocyou play this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor_text: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Shadow Sensei
card_text: Battlecry: Give a Stealthed minion +2/+2.
flavor_text: He used to be Aya's tutor, but she fired him for bugging her too much.

name: Shellshifter
card_text: Choose One - Transforminto a 5/3 with Stealth;or a 3/5 with Taunt.
flavor_text: Master of the Three Shell Monte.

name: Shifting Shade
card_text: Deathrattle: Copy a cardfrom your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavor_text: Yeah, it's cooler in the shade, but you're also more likely to get JACKED.

name: Shimmering Courser
card_text: Only you can targetthis with spells andHero Powers.
flavor_text: A courser is a courser of course, of course, she's more of a unicorn than a horse...

name: Shroom Brewer
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health.
flavor_text: Side effects guaranteed!

name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
card_text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

name: Silvermoon Guardian
card_text: Divine Shield
flavor_text: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

name: Sneaky Devil
card_text: StealthYour other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor_text: The result of a tragic accident involving a Defias Thug, a Wand of Polymorph, and a bundle of Fel Lotus.

name: Replicating Menace
card_text: MagneticDeathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Microbots.
flavor_text:
It's a car!
*Whomp whomp whomp*
It's a robot!
*Whomp whom-CRUNCH*
It's… three.. smaller robots!

name: Replicat-o-tron
card_text: At the end of your turn, transform a neighbor into a copy of this.
flavor_text: According to the Boom Labs sales brochure, it "impractically makes itself!"

name: Rumbletusk Shaker
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Rumbletusk Breaker.
flavor_text:
Rub a dub dub, three trolls in a tub.
And who do you think dey be?
Da Shaker, Da Breaker, and Da Undatakah.
And all of dem comin' for me.

name: Runeforge Haunter
card_text: During your turn, your weapon doesn't lose Durability.
flavor_text: Don't worry, he'll keep an eye on that for you.

name: Rustsworn Cultist
card_text: Battlecry: Give yourother minions "Deathrattle:Summon a 1/1 Demon."
flavor_text: "Rust… I love it. It's all coarse, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere."

name: Sahket Sapper
card_text: Deathrattle: Return a random enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor_text: "Here, you dropped this."

name: Sandbinder
card_text: Battlecry: Draw an Elemental from your deck.
flavor_text: The secret is glue.

name: Saronite Chain Gang
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Summon acopy of this minion.
flavor_text: Desperately needs some alone time.

name: Savage Combatant
card_text: Inspire: Give your hero+2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: Maybe if you whistle a tune it will soothe him. Yeah... Try that.

name: Scabbs Cutterbutter
card_text: Combo: The next twocards you play this turncost (3) less.
flavor_text: "Never lie, steal, cheat, or drink. Unless you're compelled to, that is…" —Scabbs Cutterbutter

name: Scargil
card_text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
flavor_text: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

name: School Teacher
card_text: Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Nagaling to your hand. Discover a spell that costs (3) or less to teach it.
flavor_text: She also tutors 3 Piranha Swarmers on her off hours.

name: Selfish Shellfish
card_text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavor_text: Keeps any ancient book it finds all to its shelf.

name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower
card_text: Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.
flavor_text: A Tortollan gardener's worst nightmare.

name: Sky Gen'ral Kragg
card_text: TauntBattlecry: If you've played aQuest this game, summon a4/2 Parrot with Rush.
flavor_text: He's gunning for Sky Adm'ral.

name: Soldier of Fortune
card_text: Whenever this minion attacks, give your opponent a Coin.
flavor_text: His allies call him invaluable.

name: Southsea Squidface
card_text: Deathrattle: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Quick! Before I drown! Let me sharpen your sword for you.

name: Spice Bread Baker
card_text: Battlecry: Restore Health to your hero equal to your hand size.
flavor_text: The secret ingredient is love. And a LOT of butter.

name: Spirit Healer
card_text: After you cast a Holy spell, give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor_text: "You again? What did I tell you about trying to fight ALL the quilboars."

name: Spirit of the Tiger
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.After you cast a spell,summon a Tiger with statsequal to its Cost.
flavor_text: Less of a cantrip and more of a cat-nip.

name: Spiritsinger Umbra
card_text: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
flavor_text: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

name: Squallhunter
card_text: Spell Damage +2Overload: (2)
flavor_text:
"Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful!
And since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

name: Steam Surger
card_text: Battlecry: If you playedan Elemental last turn,add a 'Flame Geyser'to your hand.
flavor_text: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

name: Stegodon
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon. There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

name: Stormpike Battle Ram
card_text: RushDeathrattle: Your nextBeast costs (2) less.
flavor_text: Baa ram ewe! To your dwarves, your beard, Stormpike clan be true!

name: Stormwind Knight
card_text: Charge
flavor_text: They're still embarrassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

name: Stubborn Suspect
