card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 3-Cost minion.
flavor_text: He keeps saying "I'll never talk," but no one has actually asked him anything.

name: Summoning Portal
card_text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavor_text: NOT LESS THAN 1! Don't get any ideas!

name: Sunwing Squawker
card_text: Battlecry: Repeat the lastspell you've cast on a friendly minion on this.
flavor_text: Most parrots repeat curses, not blessings.

name: Sword Eater
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Equip a 3/2 Sword.
flavor_text: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

name: The Glass Knight
card_text: Divine ShieldWhenever you restore Health,gain Divine Shield.
flavor_text: She seems scary, but she's got a glass jaw.

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
card_text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor_text: Apprentices are great for bossing around. "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee! Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Spawn of Shadows
card_text: Inspire: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
flavor_text: What did you expect to happen? He's a Spawn. Of Shadows.

name: Spellbreaker
card_text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor_text: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders. The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

name: Spirit of the Shark
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.Your minions' Battlecries and Combos trigger twice.
flavor_text: It has Stealth, but its ominous theme music keeps giving it away.

name: Steel Rager
card_text: Rush
flavor_text: Rage alongside the machine.

name: Storm Chaser
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a spell from your deck that costs (5) or more.
flavor_text: Best drank after a stiff gale.

name: Strongshell Scavenger
card_text: Battlecry: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
flavor_text: It isn't "grave robbing" when there's no grave. It's just scavenging…

name: Swift Messenger
card_text: RushEach turn this is in your hand,swap its Attack and Health.
flavor_text: Same turn delivery - guaranteed!

name: Tanaris Hogchopper
card_text: Battlecry: If your opponent'shand is empty, gain Charge.
flavor_text: The Hogchoppers are well-known throughout Kalimdor for being a real, actual group.

name: The Darkness
card_text: Starts Dormant.Battlecry: Shuffle 3 Candlesinto the enemy deck. Whendrawn, this awakens.
flavor_text: I would rather light a single candle than curse the darkness. But I'm willing to do both.

name: The Nameless One
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
flavor_text: Used to be called " , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

name: Ticket Scalper
card_text: Overkill: Draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: Takes ten percent off the top.

name: Tomb Spider
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast.
flavor_text: Less serious than its cousin, the Grave Spider.

name: Tournament Medic
card_text: Inspire: Restore 2 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: The medic tournament is less entertaining than the Grand Tournament.

name: Toxmonger
card_text: Whenever you play a 1-Costminion, give it Poisonous.
flavor_text: Not all spiders are born poisonous. That's where he comes in.

name: Traveling Healer
card_text: Divine ShieldBattlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavor_text: Some heroes have soft hearts and hard shells.

name: Twilight Drake
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Twilight Summoner
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Faceless Destroyer.
flavor_text: If you strike him down, he shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.

name: Varden Dawngrasp
card_text: Battlecry: Freeze all enemyminions. If any are alreadyFrozen, deal 4 damageto them instead.
flavor_text: Varden Dawngrasp could wield fire, summon hailstorms, and morph a night elf into a sheep with a snap of their fingers. Knowing how malleable reality could be, certain labels felt downright trivial.

name: Veteran Warmedic
card_text: After you cast a Holy spell,summon a 2/2 Medicwith Lifesteal.
flavor_text: In times of war, warmedics bring their own medics.

name: Violet Teacher
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavor_text: If you don't pay attention, you may be turned into a pig. And then you get your name on the board.

name: Voidcaller
card_text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Void! Here, void! Here, buddy!"

name: Wailing Soul
card_text: Battlecry: Silence your other minions.
flavor_text: This soul just wails on you. Dang, soul, let up already.

name: Water Elemental
card_text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor_text: Don't summon a water elemental at a party. It'll dampen the mood.

name: The Voraxx
card_text: After you cast a spell onthis minion, summon a1/1 Plant and castanother copy on it.
flavor_text: I am the Voraxx. I speak for the weeds.

name: Thickhide Kodo
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor_text: The introduction of professions was devastating for kodo populations.

name: Thunderhead
card_text: After you play a card withOverload, summon two1/1 Sparks with Rush.
flavor_text: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

name: Ticking Abomination
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 5 damage to your minions.
flavor_text: Abomination. Emphasis on the second syllable.

name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
card_text: Battlecry: If you played anElemental last turn, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

name: Tomb Pillager
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavor_text: After the guild broke up, he could no longer raid the tombs.

name: Tortollan Shellraiser
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: A hero... In a half-shell.

name: Totem Cruncher
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
flavor_text: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

name: Twilight Guardian
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor_text: A result of magical experiments carried out by the Black Dragonflight, it's not his fault that he's a vicious killer.

name: Unpowered Steambot
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Overpowered Steambot got nerfed.

name: Vessina
card_text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
flavor_text: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

name: Vex Crow
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random2-Cost minion.
flavor_text: As birds of ill omen, these crows often summon Doomsayers.

name: War Master Voone
card_text: Battlecry: Copy allDragons in your hand.
flavor_text: War Master sounds cooler than Dragon Sitter.

name: Wee Spellstopper
card_text: Adjacent minions can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Bane of spellcasters and spelling bees everywhere.

name: Wicked Skeleton
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each minion that died this turn.
flavor_text: It's minions like these that give normal, law-abiding skeletons a bad rap.

name: Wildwalker
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +3 Health.
flavor_text: She was born to be something. She is just not quite sure what yet...

name: Worgen Greaser
flavor_text: Hair products are 79% of his monthly budget.

name: Xyrella
card_text: Battlecry: If you've restored Health this turn, deal that much damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: On the Night of Falling Stars, Xyrella had a vision of a shattered naaru. "Go to the Barrens," the being said. "Seek the shards of my broken body. Restore me, and I will restore your daughter."

name: Ace Hunter Kreen
card_text: Your other characters are Immune while attacking.
flavor_text: This grandmaster marksman loves winning tournaments and eating a bit of ice cream.

name: Akama
card_text: StealthDeathrattle: Shuffle 'AkamaPrime' into your deck.
flavor_text: "To many of my people, I am known as a traitor... as Illidan's lapdog. I will remain in the shadows, for now... Actually, maybe I'll just remain in the shadows forever."

name: Alliance Bannerman
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a minion.Give minions in yourhand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Back in my day, we had to carry our inspiration uphill both ways to war.

name: Ancient Krakenbane
card_text: Battlecry: If you've castthree spells while holdingthis, deal 5 damage.@({0} left!)@(Ready!)
flavor_text: "Call me Fishmael."

name: Arcane Amplifier
card_text: Your Hero Power deals 2 extra damage.
flavor_text: Not on good terms with warlocks.

name: Arcane Luminary
card_text: Cards that didn't start inyour deck cost (2) less(but not less than 1).
flavor_text: They say true value is the cards you find along the way.

name: Archspore Msshi'fn
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Shuffle'Msshi'fn Prime'into your deck.
flavor_text: Brave leader of the Sporeggar. Guided by the philosophy that one should not mssh with matters that are not one's msshiness.

name: Arid Stormer
card_text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.
flavor_text: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.

name: Auctionmaster Beardo
card_text: After you cast a spell, refresh your Hero Power.
flavor_text: Gadgetzan has always run an under-the-table auction house, and business has been PRETTY good for Beardo since the population explosion. And since the explosion that destroyed the competing auction houses in the city.

name: Weaponized Piñata
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor_text: It'll be fine. It's not like they have any reason to hate us.

name: Whizbang the Wonderful
card_text: You start the game with one of Whizbang's Wonderful Decks!
flavor_text: From the prestigious Westfall Wonderfuls.

name: Wicked Witchdoctor
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic Totem.
flavor_text: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.

name: Windspeaker
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
flavor_text: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

name: Wing Commander
card_text: Has +2 Attack for each Dragon in your hand.
flavor_text: "Flap! Flap! FLAP!"

name: Witchwood Piper
card_text: Battlecry: Draw the lowestCost minion from your deck.
flavor_text: She rids villages of annoying pests, like rats and children.

name: Xaril, Poisoned Mind
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Add a random Toxin card to your hand.
flavor_text: It's basically your own fault if you go around drinking weird green potions handed out by creepy mantid dudes.

name: Zandalari Templar
card_text: Battlecry: If you've restored10 Health this game, gain+4/+4 and Taunt.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
flavor_text: YOU WERE A TEMPLAR, JONDAR!

name: Zul'Drak Ritualist
card_text: Taunt Battlecry: Summon threerandom 1-Cost minionsfor your opponent.
flavor_text: Generosity is a core value in cult culture.

name: Acolyte of Agony
card_text: Lifesteal
flavor_text: It takes many years of practiced study in order to fully master agony.

name: Acolyte of Pain
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
flavor_text: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

name: Addled Grizzly
card_text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1.
flavor_text: Druids who spend too long in bear form are more susceptible to the whispers of the Old Gods. Right now they are whispering the lyrics to "La Bamba".

name: Alarm-o-Bot
card_text: At the start of your turn,swap this minion with a random one in your hand.
flavor_text: WARNING. WARNING. WARNING.

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
card_text: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavor_text: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Am'gam Rager
flavor_text: peerc rewop

name: Arcane Golem
card_text: Charge. Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
flavor_text: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

name: Arcane Watcher
card_text: Can't attack unless you have Spell Damage.
flavor_text: Now his watch has ended… until you have Spell Damage.

name: Argent Horserider
card_text: ChargeDivine Shield
flavor_text: His horse's name is Betsy.

name: Augmented Elekk
card_text: Whenever you shuffle a card into a deck, shuffle in an extra copy.
flavor_text: Her friends call her "Shuffleupugus".

name: Bad Luck Albatross
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle two 1/1 Albatross into your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Legend holds that it's bad luck to harm it. So maybe just pat it on the head, okay?

name: Benevolent Djinn
card_text: At the end of your turn, restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Wish #1: funnel cakes. Wish #2: funnel cakes. Wish #3: FUNNEL CAKES.

name: Blackwald Pixie
card_text: Battlecry: Refresh your Hero Power.
flavor_text: "Oh hi bark."

name: Blink Fox
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor_text: It's like, SUPER bad at staring contests.

name: Blood Beast
card_text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to your hero.

name: Blood Shard Bristleback
card_text: Lifesteal. Battlecry: If yourdeck contains 10 or fewercards, deal 6 damageto a minion.
flavor_text:
I'm bringin' bristle back (Yeah)
Those other minions don't know how to act (Yeah)
I think it's special how these crystals crack (Yeah)
So turn around and I'll give you a smack (Yeah)
(Take 'em to the Barrens)

name: Bloodsail Cultist
card_text: Battlecry: If you control another Pirate, give your weapon +1/+1.
flavor_text: They're really just in it for the Blood Parrot.

name: Blubber Baron
card_text: Whenever you summon a Battlecry minion while this is in your hand, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: When oil, railroad, steel, robber, and red are all already taken, your options are limited.

name: Bog Slosher
card_text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
flavor_text: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.

name: Boisterous Bard
card_text: Battlecry: Give your other minions +1 Health.
flavor_text: As a kid, she fought with rocks. Now she fights with ROCK!

name: Brann Bronzebeard
card_text: Your Battlecries trigger twice.
flavor_text: Contains 75% more fiber than his brother Magni!

name: Brightwing
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor_text: Little faerie dragons are made of sugar and spice and maniacal vice.

name: Bronze Gatekeeper
card_text: MagneticTaunt
flavor_text: "You have my shield! And the rest of me too."

name: Carnival Barker
card_text: Whenever you summon a 1-Health minion, give it +1/+2.
flavor_text: The barking initially confused faire-goers, so he switched to words.

name: Cave Hydra
card_text: Also damages the minions next to whomeverthis attacks.
flavor_text: Can be upgraded into a Cave Lurker.

name: Backstreet Leper
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damageto the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Quit playing games with his heart. And his fingers. And foot. It's rude.

name: Banana Buffoon
card_text: Battlecry: Add 2 Bananas to your hand.
flavor_text: You could say he has a certain appeal.

name: Bearshark
card_text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: "Candygram."

name: Black Cat
card_text: Spell Damage +1 Battlecry: If your deck has only odd-Cost cards, draw a card.
flavor_text: She's so odd, you can't even.

name: Blackwing Technician
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: This is who you go to when your Blackwing needs a tune up. Don't go to a cut rate Blackwing tune up shop!

name: Blistering Rot
card_text: At the end of your turn,summon a Rot with statsequal to this minion's.
flavor_text: Known as 'Fel Gel' to the Illidari, it's excellent protection against harsh Draenic sunshine.

name: Blood Knight
card_text: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
flavor_text: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

name: Bloodscalp Strategist
card_text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, Discover a spell.
flavor_text: “Shoot them in the face” is more of a tactic than a strategy.

name: Bloodsworn Mercenary
card_text: Battlecry: Choose adamaged friendly minion.Summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: You look really hurt. You could use a friend!

name: Brainstormer
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Healthfor each spell in your hand.
flavor_text: Her hair was always like that.

name: Brilliant Macaw
card_text: Battlecry: Repeat the last Battlecry you played.
flavor_text: He's been repeating the same shanty for a month. Four pirates walked the plank last week. Middle of the ocean, just walked right off.

name: Bronze Explorer
card_text: LifestealBattlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor_text: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

name: Bronze Herald
card_text: Deathrattle: Add two 4/4 Dragons to your hand.
flavor_text: This is why you shouldn’t shoot the messenger.

name: Carrion Grub
flavor_text: Carrion, my wayward grub.

name: Celestial Dreamer
card_text: Battlecry: If you control aminion with 5 or moreAttack, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: If you think her job is easy, YOU try falling asleep on cue.

name: Chittering Tunneler
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
flavor_text: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

name: Coldlight Oracle
card_text: Battlecry: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavor_text: They can see the future. In that future both players draw more cards. Spoooky.

name: Coliseum Manager
card_text: Inspire: Return this minion to your hand.
flavor_text: Meets monthly with the gladiators to discuss career goals.

name: Crypt Lord
card_text: TauntAfter you summon a minion, gain +1 Health.
flavor_text: The original fifth beetle!

name: Curious Glimmerroot
card_text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards.Guess which one startedin your opponent's deckto get a copy of it.
flavor_text: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

name: Cutthroat Buccaneer
card_text: Combo: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor_text: In life he worked as a sword swallower.

name: Dalaran Mage
card_text: Spell Damage +1
flavor_text: You don't see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

name: Dark Cultist
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor_text: The Cult of the Damned has found it's best not to mention their name when recruiting new cultists.

name: Darkmoon Dirigible
card_text: Divine ShieldCorrupt: Gain Rush.
flavor_text: "It's dirigible? I don’t even know what diriging is!"

name: Deathlord
card_text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Your opponent puts a minion from their deck into the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Rise from your grave!" - Kel'Thuzad

name: Death's Head Cultist
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Nothing can stop death. Except a Taunt. With Healing.

name: Deathwarden
card_text: Deathrattles can't trigger.
flavor_text: Ride or die takes on a new meaning.

name: Desert Camel
card_text: Battlecry: Put a 1-Cost minion from each deck into the battlefield.
flavor_text: Dang. This card is sweet. Almost as sweet as Dessert Camel.

name: Devouring Ectoplasm
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a2/2 Adventurer with a random bonus effect.
flavor_text: When it's on keto, it only devours tauren.

name: Diving Gryphon
card_text: RushBattlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavor_text: Warning: May cause carousel flashbacks.

name: Doubling Imp
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
flavor_text: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

name: Dragonhawk Rider
card_text: Inspire: Gain Windfurythis turn.
flavor_text: Check it out. You can do barrel rolls on this thing.

name: Dragonrider Talritha
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +3/+3 and this Deathrattle.
flavor_text: You can't just run away from your problems. Unless you have another dragon to jump to.

name: Dragonslayer
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to a Dragon.
flavor_text: A pair of stout dwarves nearly averted the Cataclysm.

name: Cloaked Huntress
card_text: Your Secrets cost (0).
flavor_text: She's practically GIVING your secrets away!

name: Clockwork Goblin
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle a Bombinto your opponent's deck.When drawn, it explodesfor 5 damage.
flavor_text: They always wind up bombing.

name: Coldlight Seer
card_text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavor_text: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths. So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

name: Coldwraith
card_text: Battlecry: If an enemy is Frozen, draw a card.
flavor_text: He's freezing his bones off!

name: Commander Rhyssa
card_text: Your Secrets trigger twice.
flavor_text: Two people can keep a secret as long as neither of them are Commander Rhyssa.

name: Crossroads Gossiper
card_text: After a friendly Secret is revealed, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Not afraid to spill the tea.

name: Cutlass Courier
card_text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate.
flavor_text: It may be a cutlass, but you can cut lads with it too.

name: Dancing Swords
card_text: Deathrattle: Your opponent draws a card.
flavor_text: They like to dance to reggae.

name: Darkshire Councilman
card_text: After you summon a minion, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Democracy in action!

name: Deadly Fork
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a 3/2 weapon to your hand.
flavor_text: For a proper setting, place the deadly fork after the salad fork, but before the dinner fork.

name: Deathspeaker
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Immune this turn.
flavor_text: It helps to speak really, really loud.

name: Demolisher
card_text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: Laying siege isn't fun for anyone. It's not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

name: Devilsaur Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
flavor_text: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

name: Disciple of C'Thun
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage. Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor_text: C’Thun’s recruiting pitch involves cookies, which is why it’s the most popular Old God.

name: Doomed Apprentice
card_text: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more.
flavor_text: Jaina was never good at keeping up apprentices.

name: Dragonmaw Overseer
card_text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly minion +2/+2.
flavor_text: Ah, the Booterang... nothing cures peon laziness faster.

name: Dragonscale Warrior
card_text: Whenever any player targets this minion with a spell, that player draws a card.

name: Drakkari Defender
card_text: TauntOverload: (3)
flavor_text: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

name: Drakkari Trickster
card_text: Battlecry: Give each player acopy of a random card fromtheir opponent's deck.
flavor_text: “It’s an illusion, Malacrass!”

name: Dune Sculptor
card_text: After you cast a spell,add a random Mageminion to your hand.
flavor_text: Come for the magic show, stay for the sand castles.

name: Duskbat
card_text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
flavor_text: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

name: Earthen Ring Farseer
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavor_text: He can see really far, and he doesn't use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

name: Edwin VanCleef
card_text: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each other card you've played this turn.
flavor_text: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

name: Eggnapper
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Raptors.
flavor_text: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

name: Electrowright
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: Carefully assembled from two Electrowrongs.

name: Enchanted Cauldron
card_text: Spellburst: Cast a random spell of the same Cost.
flavor_text: Do you smell what the cauldron is cooking? If so, we apologize.

name: EVIL Miscreant
card_text: Combo: Add two random Lackeys to your hand.
flavor_text: Because there are no G.O.O.D. Miscreants.

name: Eydis Darkbane
card_text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: HATES being called "the wonder twins".

name: Face Collector
card_text: EchoBattlecry: Add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor_text: “I’ll trade you a Malfurion for an Anduin.”

name: Faire Arborist
card_text: Choose One - Draw a card;or Summon a 2/2 Treant.Corrupt: Do both.
flavor_text: The bad apple never falls far from the treant.

name: Fangbound Druid
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (2).
flavor_text: Bound by the law of the fang, these druid floss their teeth twice a day.

name: Felguard
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: Yes, he'll fight for you. BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Fencing Coach
card_text: Battlecry: The next time you use your Hero Power, it costs (2) less.
flavor_text: Good fencers make good neighbors, right?

name: Fjola Lightbane
card_text: Whenever you target this minion with a spell, gain Divine Shield.
flavor_text: LOVES being called "the wonder twins".

name: Flamewaker
card_text: After you cast a spell, deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor_text: Flamewakers HATE being confused for Flamewalkers. They just wake up fire, they don’t walk on it. Walking on fire is CRAZY.

name: Flesheating Ghoul
card_text: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: 'Flesheating' is an unfair name. It's just that there's not really much else for him to eat.

name: Drakkari Enchanter
card_text: Your end of turn effects trigger twice.
flavor_text: Drakkari sorceresses have the irritating habit of repeating themselves at the end of every sentence. Every sentence.

name: Dreadscale
card_text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor_text: Let's be clear about this: ACIDMAW is the sidekick.

name: Dreaming Drake
card_text: TauntCorrupt: Gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Some dragons dream of conquering Azeroth, some just dream of being 5/6s.

name: Druid of the Flame
card_text: Choose One - Transform into a 5/2 minion; or a 2/5 minion.
flavor_text: Druids who fought too long in Northrend were easily seduced by Ragnaros; a mug of hot chocolate was generally all it took.

name: Druid of the Scythe
card_text: Choose One - Transforminto a 4/2 with Rush;or a 2/4 with Taunt.
flavor_text: She's a scythe for sore eyes.

name: Duskhaven Hunter
card_text: StealthEach turn this is in your hand,swap its Attack and Health.
flavor_text: After a short paws, she's back to herself again.

name: Educated Elekk
card_text: Whenever a spell is played,this minion remembers it.Deathrattle: Shuffle thespells into your deck.
flavor_text: "This reminds me of a saying. 'An elekk never…' something. I can't remember."

name: Elder Longneck
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
flavor_text: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

name: Electra Stormsurge
card_text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
flavor_text: "The coin? You used me for THE COIN!?"

name: Emperor Cobra
card_text: Poisonous
flavor_text: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you're going to visit, wear bug spray. And plate armor.

name: EVIL Recruiter
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly Lackey to summon a 5/5 Demon.
flavor_text: I'm starting to think the lackeys aren't evil, just taken advantage of.

name: Faceless Rager
card_text: Battlecry: Copy a friendly minion's Health.
flavor_text: When you need to rage anonymously.

name: Fairground Fool
card_text: TauntCorrupt: Gain +4 Health.
flavor_text: "What did Illidan say when his rocketeer broke down on the Darkmoon racetrack? YOU ARE NOT REPAIRED!"

name: Fel Orc Soulfiend
card_text: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to this minion.
flavor_text: "Doc says the persistent burning sensation in my soul is probably just an ulcer."

name: Fierce Monkey
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Fierce monkey. That funky monkey.

name: Fire Hawk
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each card in your opponent's hand.
flavor_text: It’s our fault for making all those card backs that look like food.

name: Flight Master
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Gryphon for each player.
flavor_text: Your gryphon will be summoned following a brief safety demonstration.

name: Flying Machine
card_text: Windfury
flavor_text: To operate, this contraption needs a hula doll on the dashboard. Otherwise it's just a “falling machine.”

name: Forlorn Stalker
card_text: Battlecry: Give all Deathrattle minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: He's going to leave the dying up to you, if that's cool.

name: Frothing Berserker
card_text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Giant Wasp
card_text: Stealth Poisonous
flavor_text: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

name: Gluttonous Ooze
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor_text: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

name: Gnomeregan Infantry
card_text: ChargeTaunt
flavor_text: The gnomes are valiant and ready to return to their irradiated, poorly ventilated homeland!

name: Goblin Sapper
card_text: Has +4 Attack while your opponent has 6 or more cards in hand.
flavor_text: He’s not such a binge exploder anymore. These days, he only explodes socially.

name: Gorillabot A-3
card_text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
flavor_text: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.

name: Grimestreet Smuggler
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: She's got anything you want. Need the latest derpinger? No problem!

name: Gyreworm
card_text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, deal 3 damage.
flavor_text: This game of ring toss just got really intense.

name: Hired Gun
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: He loves his job and would do it for free! (But don't tell his boss!)

name: Hobgoblin
card_text: Whenever you play a 1-Attack minion, give it +2/+2.
flavor_text: Hobgoblins are meeting next week to discuss union benefits. First on the list: dental plan.

name: Hot Spring Guardian
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavor_text: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

name: Howling Commander
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine Shield minion from your deck.
flavor_text: Enlistment in her battalion comes with several pairs of earplugs.

name: Hyldnir Frostrider
card_text: Battlecry: Freeze your other minions.
flavor_text: Don't be fooled, that polar bear's the one in charge.

name: Ice Rager
flavor_text: He's a lot cooler than Magma Rager.

name: Fungal Enchanter
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor_text: Qualifications: Born with pointy hat.

name: Gilded Gargoyle
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a Coin to your hand.
flavor_text: You hear a coin rattling inside the slotted gargoyle...What could it mean?

name: Glory Chaser
card_text: After you play a Taunt minion, draw a card.
flavor_text: When you've reached the peak of competition twice, how hard can winning one valley be?

name: Gnomish Experimenter
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a card. If it's a minion, transform it into a Chicken.
flavor_text: He's legitimately surprised every time he turns himself into a chicken.

name: Goody Two-Shields
card_text: Divine ShieldSpellburst: Gain Divine Shield.
flavor_text: These are my shields. There are at least two like them, and both are mine.

name: Grand Totem Eys'or
card_text: At the end of your turn,give +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
flavor_text: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

name: Greedy Sprite
card_text: Deathrattle: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor_text: Sparkliest of the seven deadly sprites.

name: Grimestreet Pawnbroker
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random weapon in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: "I don't know a lot about used GvG cards, so I'm going to have to call in an expert."

name: Imp Gang Boss
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor_text: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.

name: Grove Tender
card_text: Choose One - Give each player a Mana Crystal; or Each player draws a card.
flavor_text: Likes: Hiking and the great outdoors. Dislikes: Goblin shredders and sandals. (Can’t find any that fit!).

name: Happy Ghoul
card_text: Costs (0) if your hero was healed this turn.
flavor_text: When life gives you snow…

name: Harvest Golem
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
flavor_text: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

name: Hench-Clan Thug
card_text: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

name: High Priest Thekal
card_text: Battlecry: Convert all but 1 of your Hero's Health into Armor.
flavor_text: "…and then I beat him with 1 Health!"

name: History Buff
card_text: Whenever you play a minion, give a random minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Actually... what happened was...

name: Horde Operative
card_text: Battlecry: Copy your opponent's Secrets and put them into play.
flavor_text: "We all have our secrets. I mean, your secrets."

name: Howlfiend
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a random card.
flavor_text: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

name: Huffer
card_text: Charge

name: Humongous Razorleaf
card_text: Can't attack.
flavor_text: Loves goblins. In a light cream sauce.

name: Igneous Elemental
card_text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
flavor_text: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

name: Inconspicuous Rider
card_text: Battlecry: Cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor_text: Improvise, adapt, overcome.

name: Infested Goblin
card_text: TauntDeathrattle: Add two 1/1 Scarabs with Taunt to your hand.
flavor_text: Trust us. DON'T go cheap on the scarab repellent.

name: Iron Sensei
card_text: At the end of your turn, give another friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavor_text:
Mechs like learning from him because he really speaks their language.
0110100001101001

name: Ironbeak Owl
card_text: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor_text: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Ironforge Rifleman
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor_text: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Kabal Courier
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Mage, Priest, or Warlock card.
flavor_text: Hey, you park your kodo under a harpy nest, you get what you deserve.

name: Kabal Outfitter
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:Give another random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: Don’t ask her for feathers on your necklace though.

name: King Mukla
card_text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavor_text: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: Kobold Apprentice
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor_text: Horrible secret: The Darkness is immune to Arcane Missiles.

name: Leokk
card_text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.

name: Lil' Exorcist
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each enemy Deathrattle minion.
flavor_text: Warlocks have the town exorcist on speed dial in case they unleash the wrong demon.

name: Lone Champion
card_text: Battlecry: If you control no other minions, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: He is a champion, with no friends. He'll keep on fighting, til the end!

name: Lord Barov
card_text: Battlecry: Set the Healthof all other minions to 1.Deathrattle: Deal 1 damageto all minions.
flavor_text: Alexei Barov stayed at Scholomance despite leasing it to Kel’Thuzad. He says it’s for "supervision."

name: Illuminator
card_text: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: "LUMOS!" is not what they yell. What do you think this is, Hogwarts?

name: Imp Master
card_text: At the end of your turn, deal1 damage to this minion and summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavor_text: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

name: Injured Blademaster
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavor_text: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Ironfur Grizzly
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Jungle Panther
card_text: Stealth
flavor_text: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn't want to live there.

name: Kabal Talonpriest
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavor_text: Inkmaster Solia had to figure out how to tattoo feathers.

name: Kaboom Bot
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: More Boom for your buck.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
card_text: Battlecry: The next Secretyou play this turn costs (0).
flavor_text: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran. How do you make a Dalaran float? Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Kobold Barbarian
card_text: At the start of your turn, attack a random enemy.
flavor_text: What is best in life? To make candle. To keep candle. To hear lamentations of candle-takers.

name: Lady Vashj
card_text: Spell Damage +1Deathrattle: Shuffle 'VashjPrime' into your deck.
flavor_text: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

name: Lifeweaver
card_text: Whenever you restore Health, add a random Druid spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Lifeweaving is all well and good until it's time to cut the thread.

name: Light's Champion
card_text: Battlecry: Silence a Demon.
flavor_text: When there's something strange (say, a gibbering demon) in your neighborhood, who are you going to call?

name: Lightspawn
card_text: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavor_text: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Luckysoul Hoarder
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 SoulFragments into your deck.Corrupt: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Always brings his own reusable shopping bag, satchel, barrel, trunk, tray, and fluffy pillow.

name: Madame Lazul
card_text: Battlecry: Discover acopy of a card in youropponent's hand.
flavor_text: Of course she knows the future, she’s been looking at your cards the WHOLE TIME!

name: Mana Tide Totem
card_text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor_text: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

name: Manic Soulcaster
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.
flavor_text: When casting a tournament, you really have to put your soul into it!

name: Masked Contender
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, cast a Secret from your deck.
flavor_text: Knew Mysterious Challenger back when he was a Mysterious Squire.

name: Metaltooth Leaper
card_text: Battlecry: Give your other Mechs +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Don't leave them out in the rain. In Un'Goro Crater there is a whole colony of rust-tooth leapers.

name: Mind Control Tech
card_text: Battlecry: If your opponenthas 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.
flavor_text: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that's not saying much.

name: Mindflayer Kaahrj
card_text: Battlecry: Choose anenemy minion.Deathrattle: Summon a new copy of it.
flavor_text: It’s pronounced "Kaahrj."

name: Mini-Mage
card_text: StealthSpell Damage +1
flavor_text: He is sometimes found hiding in the treasure chest in the Gurubashi Arena.

name: Mirage Caller
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor_text: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

name: Misha
card_text: Taunt

name: Mountainfire Armor
card_text: Deathrattle: If it's your opponent's turn,gain 6 Armor.
flavor_text: Excuse me. Your mountain is on fire.

name: Neferset Thrasher
card_text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: Tough to do skateboard tricks with four legs.

name: Nightbane Templar
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, summon two 1/1 Whelps.
flavor_text: Originally joined to be Arcanagos’ Templar, but has to admit that ordering pizza has become waaaay easier.

name: Nightmare Amalgam
card_text: This has all minion types.
flavor_text: Be all that you can be.

name: Northwatch Commander
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, draw a minion.
flavor_text: It was all going well until some Horde had the cunning idea of attacking from the south.

name: Ogre Brute
card_text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor_text: Ogres have really terrible short-term chocolate.

name: Magic Carpet
card_text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor_text: Its small yet fierce riders are affectionately known as rug rats.

name: Magma Rager
flavor_text: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

name: Mankrik
card_text: Battlecry: Help Mankrik findhis wife! She was last seensomewhere in your deck.
flavor_text: Relives his nightmare every day a new Horde player is created.

name: Marsh Drake
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Poisonous Drakeslayer for your opponent.
flavor_text: She would have gotten away with it, if it weren't for that meddling Drakeslayer.

name: Master of Ceremonies
card_text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Spell Damage, gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Goes by "MC ElfyElf".

name: Messenger Raven
card_text: Battlecry: Discover aMage minion.
flavor_text: You can make a collect CAW!

name: Microtech Controller
card_text: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Microbots.
flavor_text: Best-selling author of "How to Make Friends You Completely Control."

name: Mindbreaker
card_text: Hero Powers are disabled.
flavor_text: He's a mind breaker, dream taker, ghoul trainer, don't you mess around with him.

name: Moroes
card_text: StealthAt the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Steward.
flavor_text: Moroes runs an army of stewards, but still ends up inflating the balloons himself.

name: Mounted Raptor
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 1-Cost minion.
flavor_text: Clever girl!

name: Murloc Warleader
card_text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound? Nope! Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Nethersoul Buster
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
flavor_text: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

name: Omega Medic
card_text: Battlecry: If you have 10 Mana Crystals, restore 10 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: She feels waiting for healing makes you appreciate it more.

name: Orgrimmar Aspirant
card_text: Inspire: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor_text: "Four out of three orcs struggle with math." - Angry Zurge

name: Ornery Tortoise
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: "Dude, where's my pizza?!"

name: Pack Kodo
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Beast, Secret, or weapon.
flavor_text: He looks simple, but there’s a lot to unpack.

name: Primalfin Lookout
card_text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a Murloc.
flavor_text: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

name: Professor Slate
card_text: Your spells are Poisonous.
flavor_text: "Don’t worry, this will be over in a second. It might FEEL like an eternity, but I assure you, it’s quite quick!"

name: Pufferfist
card_text: After your hero attacks, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor_text: "...and then I'll hit 'em with the ol' puffercut!"

name: Pyromaniac
card_text: Whenever your Hero Power kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor_text: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”

name: Questing Adventurer
card_text: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

name: Raging Worgen
card_text: Has +1 Attack and Windfury while damaged.
flavor_text: If he's raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

name: Raid Leader
card_text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor_text: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Ramkahen Wildtamer

name: Plague Scientist

name: Pterrordax Hatchling
card_text: Battlecry: Adapt.

card_text: Rush

name: Ravaging Ghoul

name: Ravencaller

card_text: Your minions have "Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers."
flavor_text: Warning: Robes of Protection are intended for targeted effects only and are not an effective defense against Flamestrike, Twisting Nether, or other AOE attacks.

name: Saboteur
card_text: Battlecry: Your opponent's Hero Power costs (5) more next turn.

name: Scalerider
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 2 damage.

name: Sewer Crawler
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/3 Giant Rat.

name: Shadow Rager
card_text: Stealth

name: Shadowfiend
card_text: Whenever you draw a card, reduce its Cost by (1).

name: Shaku, the Collector
card_text: Stealth. Whenever thisattacks, add a random cardto your hand (from youropponent's class).

name: Shallow Gravedigger
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Deathrattle minion to your hand.

name: Shrieking Shroom
card_text: At the end of your turn, summon a random1-Cost minion.

name: Silent Knight
card_text: StealthDivine Shield

name: Silverware Golem

card_text: Rush. Whenever this minion gains Attack or Health, double that amount (wherever this is).

name: Sand Drudge

name: Shade of Naxxramas

name: Shadowlight Scholar

name: Shaky Zipgunner

name: Shan'do Wildclaw
card_text: Choose One - Give Beastsin your deck +1/+1; orTransform into a copyof a friendly Beast.

name: Shattered Sun Cleric
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.

name: Silithid Swarmer
card_text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.

name: Silverback Patriarch
card_text: Taunt

name: Sky Claw

name: Skydiving Instructor

"Is it dangerous?"
"For me? Not at all. Now jump!"

name: Smolderthorn Lancer
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, destroy a damaged enemy minion.

name: SN1P-SN4P

flavor_text: "It's gonna be snip this, snap that. Bada-snip, bada-snap!"

name: Soot Spewer
card_text: Spell Damage +1

name: Southsea Captain
card_text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavor_text: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat. He has hat envy.

name: Speaker Gidra
card_text: Rush, WindfurySpellburst: Gain Attackand Health equal tothe spell's Cost.

name: Spellslinger
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random spell to each player's hand.

name: Spider Bomb

name: Spirit of the Lynx
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.Whenever you summon a Beast, give it +1/+1.

name: Spring Rocket

name: Stablemaster

name: Stargazer Luna
card_text: After you play theright-most card in your hand, draw a card.

name: Stoneskin Basilisk
card_text: Divine Shield Poisonous

name: Tar Creeper

name: Tauren Warrior

card_text: After a friendly minion dies, add a 1/1 copy of it to your hand. It costs (1).

name: Spawn of N'Zoth
card_text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1/+1.

name: Spellward Jeweler
card_text: Battlecry: Your hero can'tbe targeted by spells orHero Powers until yournext turn.

name: Spider Tank

name: Spirit of the Frog
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.Whenever you cast a spell,draw a spell from your deckthat costs (1) more.

name: Squirming Tentacle
card_text: Taunt

name: Stonehill Defender

name: Stoneskin Gargoyle

name: Toothy Chest

name: Cagematch Custodian

“Ravasaur!”
“Pretty scary”
“…Blammodax!”
“Is that a thing?”
“SMAXODON!”
“….now you’re just making those up.”

name: Warsong Commander

name: Twilight Elder

name: Twilight Flamecaller

name: Untamed Beastmaster

name: Violet Illusionist
card_text: During your turn, your hero is Immune.

name: Void Terror
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy bothadjacent minions and gain their Attack and Health.

name: Voodoo Doll

name: Vryghoul
card_text: Deathrattle: If it's youropponent's turn,summon a 2/2 Ghoul.

name: Vulpera Scoundrel

name: Walnut Sprite
card_text: Echo

name: Warhorse Trainer
card_text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +1 Attack.

name: Weaponized Wasp
card_text: Battlecry: If you controla Lackey, deal 3 damage.

name: Wickerflame Burnbristle
card_text: Divine Shield, Taunt, Lifesteal
flavor_text: Wickerflame spent years as a recruit for the Goons, never making the big-time because he always fired his chest-cannon too slowly. "Hey," he thought, "maybe if I keep my beard lit on fire, I can do this faster." BOOM, promoted.

name: Witch's Cauldron
card_text: After a friendly minion dies, add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Eye of murloc, ear of bat, foot of Fordring, fur of cat…

name: Zixor, Apex Predator
card_text: RushDeathrattle: Shuffle 'ZixorPrime' into your deck.
flavor_text: A living terror. Teleports at will. Feasts on tainted helboar meat. No head scritches unless you're Leoroxx.

name: Zoobot
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly Beast, Dragon, and Murloc +1/+1.
flavor_text: The Murloc is taking the picture.

name: Alexstrasza's Champion
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Charge.
flavor_text: "Put more spikes on her. No, more spikes. What part of 'more spikes' do you not understand? MORE SPIKES!" - Alexstrasza

name: Amalgam of the Deep
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendlyminion. Discover a minionof the same minion type.
flavor_text: Most explorers call it a success to find just one new species. Imagine Finley's excitement when he identified ten at once!

name: Amani Berserker
card_text: Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

name: Anchored Totem
card_text: After you summon a 1-Cost minion, give it +2/+1.
flavor_text:
The Naga devised the perfect retaliation to any pirates
dropping anchor in their domain: vandalism.

name: Anodized Robo Cub
card_text: Taunt. Choose One -+1 Attack; or +1 Health.
flavor_text: It's adorable! AND OH MY GOODNESS WHY IS IT EATING MY FACE

name: Arcane Flakmage
card_text: After you play a Secret, deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Ancient pandaren proverb: He who is without secrets lacks flak.

name: Arcanologist
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
flavor_text: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

name: Archmage Arugal
card_text: Whenever you draw a minion, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text: His worgen children call him Archmage AROO-OO-OO-OO-gal.

name: Argent Protector

flavor_text: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs. I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Argent Watchman
card_text: Can't attack.Inspire: Can attack as normal this turn.
flavor_text: Who argent watches the Argent Watchman?

name: Armorsmith
card_text: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavor_text: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Astromancer Solarian
card_text: Spell Damage +1Deathrattle: Shuffle'Solarian Prime'into your deck.
flavor_text: Loyal to Kael'thas Sunstrider, this blood elf mage sought arcane power in the Void. Did she find it... or did IT find her?

name: Beckoner of Evil
card_text: Battlecry: Give your C'Thun +2/+2 (wherever it is).
flavor_text: Here, Evil! C'mon boy!

name: Bilefin Tidehunter
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Ooze with Taunt.
flavor_text: Bile actually makes for surprisingly sturdy fins.

name: Bloodfen Raptor
flavor_text: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Wolfrider
card_text: Charge
flavor_text: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

name: Wretched Reclaimer
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendlyminion, then return it to lifewith full Health.

name: Zentimo
card_text: Whenever you target aminion with a spell, cast itagain on its neighbors.

name: Zola the Gorgon
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.

name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.

name: Ancient Watcher
card_text: Can't attack.
flavor_text: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

name: Annoy-o-Tron
card_text: TauntDivine Shield
flavor_text: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

name: Ashtongue Slayer

name: Auchenai Phantasm

name: Baleful Banker
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Shuffle a copy into your deck.

name: Belligerent Gnome
card_text: TauntBattlecry: If your opponenthas 2 or more minions,gain +1 Attack.

name: Biteweed
card_text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
card_text: Spell Damage +1Deathrattle: Draw a card.

name: Bloodsail Howler
card_text: RushBattlecry: Gain +1/+1for each other Pirateyou control.
flavor_text:
They saw their fate a closin'
Aboard a pirate ship
On deck: The Howlin' Hozen
About to let one rip.

name: Boneguard Lieutenant
card_text: Inspire: Gain +1 Health.

name: Booty Bay Bookie

name: Cathedral Gargoyle
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain Taunt and Divine Shield.

name: Cheaty Anklebiter

name: Clutchmother Zavas

name: Cornered Sentry
card_text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your opponent.

name: Crabrider
card_text: RushWindfury
flavor_text: "Now I'm falling asleep and she's calling a crab…"

name: Crystalsmith Kangor
card_text: Divine Shield, LifestealYour healing is doubled.

name: Cult Neophyte
card_text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next turn.

name: Dalaran Librarian
card_text: Battlecry: Silenceadjacent minions.

name: Dark Peddler

name: Darnassus Aspirant

name: Dead Ringer

name: Dendrologist
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Treant, Discover a spell.
flavor_text: He's teaching his little buddy to talk, but all it says is, "I am Gloop."

name: Bloodsail Raider
card_text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attackof your weapon.
flavor_text: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Blowgill Sniper
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor_text: Imagine how much further his darts would go if he had lungs instead of gills!

name: Bluegill Warrior
card_text: Charge
flavor_text: He just wants a hug. A sloppy... slimy... hug.

name: Bonechewer Brawler
card_text: TauntWhenever this minion takes damage, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: When you get this swole, arrows are basically free acupuncture.

name: Boneweb Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Summontwo 2/1 Spiders. If youdiscard this, trigger itsDeathrattle.
flavor_text: Noblegarden is going to be really exciting this year!

name: Brrrloc
card_text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy.
flavor_text: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

name: Captain's Parrot
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Pirate from your deck.
flavor_text: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

name: Cavern Shinyfinder
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon from your deck.
flavor_text: They call her the candled vandal.

name: Celestial Emissary
card_text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn has Spell Damage +2.
flavor_text: Casting with the stars.

name: Cloakscale Chemist
card_text: StealthDivine Shield
flavor_text: Her suit was fitted using a scale model.

name: Confection Cyclone
card_text: Battlecry: Add two 1/2 Sugar Elementals to your hand.
flavor_text: "Oh, I thought it was a desert elemental?"

name: Costumed Entertainer
card_text: Battlecry: Give a randomminion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: Just remember not to talk. It breaks character.

name: Crackling Razormaw
card_text: Battlecry: Adapt a friendly Beast.
flavor_text: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

name: Crazed Alchemist
card_text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavor_text: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Cruel Taskmaster
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavor_text: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Crystal Merchant
card_text: If you have any unspent Mana at the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor_text: I won't ask about your mana curve if you don't ask where I got these.

name: Cult Sorcerer
card_text: Spell Damage +1After you cast a spell,give your C'Thun +1/+1(wherever it is).
flavor_text: No matter how many times we tell her not to, she keeps feeding C'Thun scraps under the table.

name: Cutpurse
card_text: Whenever this minion attacks a hero, add the Coin to your hand.
flavor_text: He has a giant collection of purses now. One for every outfit!

name: Darkshire Librarian
card_text: Battlecry:Discard a random card. Deathrattle:Draw a card.
flavor_text: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

name: Defias Ringleader
card_text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
flavor_text: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

name: Diligent Notetaker
card_text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
flavor_text: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
card_text: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
flavor_text: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Dirty Rat
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Your opponentsummons a random minionfrom their hand.
flavor_text: It's not his fault… Someone keeps stealing his soap!

name: Dozing Marksman
card_text: Has +4 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: It's the sleeper of the set.

name: Dragonmaw Sentinel
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Lifesteal.
flavor_text: On the side, she's training for the annual Dragonmaw hammer throw tournament.

name: Druid of the Saber
card_text: Choose One - Transforminto a 2/1 with Charge;or a 3/2 with Stealth.
flavor_text: That's saberTEETH, not like curved pirate blades. That's a different kind of druid. Druid of the Curved Pirate Blades.

name: Drywhisker Armorer
card_text: Battlecry: For each enemy minion, gain 2 Armor.
flavor_text: Kobolds use anything for armor: Pots, pans, garbage cans… even other kobolds.

name: Duskboar
flavor_text: Often excluded from dinner parties. To be fair, he is very boaring.

name: Echoing Ooze
card_text: Battlecry: Summon an exact copy of this minion at the end of the turn.
flavor_text: OOZE... Ooze... Ooze... (ooze...)

name: Encumbered Pack Mule
card_text: TauntWhen you draw this, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text: "Now I can pick up EVERY knick-knack."

name: EVIL Cable Rat
card_text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor_text: Gradually driven to darkness by the promise of unobtainable cheese.

name: EVIL Genius
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to add 2 random Lackeys to your hand.
flavor_text: You do not want to be on the business end of this intellect!

name: Expired Merchant
card_text: Battlecry: Discard yourhighest Cost card.Deathrattle: Add 2 copiesof it to your hand.
flavor_text: The "best by" date is more like a guideline.

name: Faerie Dragon
card_text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Adorable. Immune to Magic. Doesn't pee on the rug. The perfect pet!

name: Fallen Sun Cleric
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: It's hard to keep a Shattered Sun Cleric down.

name: Felfire Deadeye
card_text: Your Hero Power costs (1) less.
flavor_text: She only shoots people who pet her cat without asking first.

name: Felstalker
card_text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavor_text: This puppy chews up cards instead of shoes.

name: Fire Plume Harbinger
card_text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand by (1).
flavor_text: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

name: Firemancer Flurgl
card_text: After you play a Murloc,deal 1 damage toall enemies.
flavor_text: Diss tracks spitting straight fire.

name: Fireworks Tech
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendlyMech +1/+1. If it hasDeathrattle, trigger it.
flavor_text: She learns by trial and error. Mostly error.

name: Fishflinger
card_text: Battlecry: Add arandom Murloc to each player's hand.
flavor_text: The scent of fish lingers on the fishflinger's fish fingers.

name: Flametongue Totem
card_text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Fogsail Freebooter
card_text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, deal 2 damage.
flavor_text: Goes cheap on wardrobe so he can spend on weaponry.

name: Friendly Bartender
card_text: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: "What'll it be? A Jade Brew? A Grimy Goose? A Kabal Manatini?"

name: Frightened Flunky
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavor_text: Some people just aren't cut out to be supervillain material.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that. It's more than just a job.

name: Doomsayer
card_text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavor_text: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Dragon Breeder
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly Dragon. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text: Deathwing would have been more well-adjusted if he'd been raised by this guy.

name: Druid of the Swarm
card_text: Choose One - Transform into a 1/2 with Poisonous; or a 1/5 with Taunt.
flavor_text: The druid awoke from troubling dreams to find herself transformed into a giant spider.

name: Drygulch Jailor
card_text: Deathrattle: Add 3 Silver Hand Recruits to your hand.
flavor_text: Hard time: 6-10 turns for candle-nappin'.

name: Envoy of Lazul
card_text: Battlecry: Look at 3 cards.Guess which one is inyour opponent's handto get a copy of it.
flavor_text: "Note to self: possess someone who's local and knows directions next time."

name: Eternal Sentinel
card_text: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: Just try to avoid eye contact.

name: EVIL Conscripter
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor_text:
Kobold! There’s a place you can handle
I said kobold! When you’re short in the candle
Cast a spell with the E! V! I! L!

name: EVIL Totem
card_text: At the end of your turn,add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor_text: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

name: Explosive Sheep
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: How is this supposed to work? Your enemies think, "Hey! Cute sheep!" and run over to cuddle it?

name: Fallen Hero
card_text: Your Hero Power deals 1 extra damage.
flavor_text: And he can't get up.

name: Far Watch Post
card_text: Can't attack. After youropponent draws a card, it costs (1) more (up to 10).
flavor_text: Dabu, man. Like, far out.

name: Firetree Witchdoctor
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor_text: If your tree is on fire - stop, drop, and troll.

name: Flame Juggler
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: At first he liked juggling chain saws, but then he thought, "Flames are better! Because FIRE!"

name: Gadgetzan Ferryman
card_text: Combo: Return a friendly minion to your hand.
flavor_text: Is it just me, or is there something fishy about that ferryman?

name: Galvanizer
card_text: Battlecry: Reduce theCost of Mechs in yourhand by (1).
flavor_text: Also known as a power zinc.

name: Ghost Light Angler
card_text: Echo
flavor_text: BoOooOogrglgrlgrlooOoOoo!

name: Gibberling
card_text: Spellburst: Summon a Gibberling.
flavor_text: "As a Linguistics student I have studied the Gibberlings. I have determined they are speaking Gibberish."

name: Gnomeferatu
card_text: Battlecry: Removethe top card of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: She prefers the term "Glampire."

name: Golakka Crawler
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a Pirate and gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

name: Grandmummy
card_text: Reborn Deathrattle: Give a randomfriendly minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: A grandmummy’s love is eternal.

name: Grimestreet Outfitter
card_text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

name: Huge Toad
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: Deals damage when he croaks.

name: Hydrologist
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavor_text: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare. Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

name: Jerry Rig Carpenter
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Choose One spell and split it.
flavor_text: Choose Two – Good; Cheap; or Fast.

name: Kanrethad Ebonlocke
card_text: Your Demons cost (1) less.Deathrattle: Shuffle'Kanrethad Prime'into your deck.
flavor_text: After Illidan's downfall, Kanrethad formed the Council of the Black Harvest to study Illidan's fel magic. Some say he was... green with envy.

name: Khadgar
card_text: Your cards that summon minions summon twice as many.
flavor_text: "What do you call two minions summoned at once? Twinions, haha! Wait... where are you going?"

name: Gadgetzan Socialite
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavor_text: Comment on her height, and she'll go from flapper to kneecapper in seconds flat.

name: Game Master
card_text: The first Secret you play each turn costs (1).
flavor_text: "You hear the mrgrgls of angry murlocs approaching. Roll initiative!"

name: Garrison Commander
card_text: You can use your Hero Power twice a turn.
flavor_text: He'll never admit it, but he pushes you hard because he really cares about you.

name: Gilblin Stalker
card_text: Stealth
flavor_text:
"Shhh, I think I hear something."
"Ah, it's probably nothing." - Every Henchman

name: Goblin Auto-Barber
card_text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor_text: This guy is excellent at adjusting your haircut and/or height.

name: Grimestreet Informant
card_text: Battlecry: Discover aHunter, Paladin, or Warriorcard.
flavor_text: "Naw, naw. You're talkin' about Grime BOULEVARD. I ain't know nuthin' 'bout that."

name: Grizzled Wizard
card_text: Battlecry: Swap Hero Powers with your opponent until your next turn.
flavor_text: When he was young, he was an Outrageous Magus.

name: Haunted Creeper
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Spectral Spiders.
flavor_text: Arachnofauxbia: Fear of fake spiders.

name: Hench-Clan Hogsteed
card_text: RushDeathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavor_text: This is CLEARLY their first rodeo.

name: Hobart Grapplehammer
card_text: Battlecry: Give all weapons in your hand and deck +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Grapplehammer is the horrible mind behind the Automatic Piranha Launcher (banned in 7 districts)!

name: Hunting Mastiff
card_text: EchoRush
flavor_text: "Shh! You're going to start a howl!"

name: Ice Walker
card_text: Your Hero Power also Freezes the target.
flavor_text: Ice Walker you say? He doesn't have feet!

name: Immortal Prelate
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this into your deck. It keeps any enchantments.
flavor_text:
She protec.
She attac.
But most importantly,
she come bac.

name: Imprisoned Scrap Imp
card_text: Dormant for 2 turns.When this awakens,give all minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: His impish imports imply impressively impetuous impropriety.

name: Jade Swarmer
card_text: StealthDeathrattle: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@StealthDeathrattle: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor_text: He's so good at swarming, he can swarm all by himself!

name: Jeweled Scarab
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a3-Cost card.
flavor_text: It's amazing what you can do with super glue!

name: Keeper Stalladris
card_text: After you cast a Choose One spell, add copies of both choices to your hand.
flavor_text: Keeps your choices handy.

name: King's Elekk
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
flavor_text: Elekk jousting is AWESOME.

name: Kobold Hermit
card_text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
flavor_text: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

name: Kul Tiran Chaplain
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor_text: The maritime Kul Tiran clergy are unique among priests for using holy saltwater.

name: Lab Recruiter
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle 3 copies of a friendly minion into your deck.
flavor_text: Join the chemistry lab! We've got all the solutions.

name: Lance Carrier
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Lance Carrier is an obscure entry level position in orcish armies. A mystery, since orcs don't generally use lances.

name: Loot Hoarder
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Always roll need.

name: Lost Spirit
card_text: Deathrattle: Give your minions +1 Attack.
flavor_text: She simply refuses to ask for directions.

name: Lushwater Scout
card_text: After you summon a Murloc, give it +1 Attack and Rush.
flavor_text: Only knows how to play "Careless Murgl" and "Mrgl Mrgl Little Star."

name: Mana Cyclone
card_text: Battlecry: For each spellyou've cast this turn, adda random Mage spellto your hand.
flavor_text: It'll put a good spin on your spells.

name: Mana Reservoir
card_text: Spell Damage +1
flavor_text: If it soaks too long, it becomes a reservoir hog.

name: Mana Wraith
card_text: ALL minions cost (1) more.
flavor_text: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

name: Master Swordsmith
card_text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor_text: He's currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can't be done.

name: Medivh's Valet
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, deal 3 damage.
flavor_text: "Magus Medivh sir, I've brought the flaming balloons, as you requested."

name: Micro Machine
card_text: At the start of each turn, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: This card is the real thing.

name: Micro Mummy
card_text: RebornAt the end of your turn, giveanother random friendlyminion +1 Attack.
flavor_text: The dramatically detailed terrifically trimmed replica of the real thing!

name: Millhouse Manastorm
card_text: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
flavor_text: "I'm gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

name: Murgur Murgurgle
card_text: Divine ShieldDeathrattle: Shuffle'Murgurgle Prime'into your deck.
flavor_text: Murlocs are not native to Outland. When the Sungills arrived, one among them rose to the challenge of this dark world. They call him... Murgurgle. Murgur Murgurgle.

name: Murloc Tidehunter
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
flavor_text: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Museum Curator
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavor_text: He is forever cursing the kids who climb on the rails and the evil archeologists who animate the exhibits.

name: Nat Pagle
card_text: At the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavor_text: Nat Pagle, Azeroth's premier fisherman! He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Kindly Grandmother
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/2 Big Bad Wolf.
flavor_text: "Goodness! What… abundant drool you have."

name: Knife Juggler
card_text: After you summon aminion, deal 1 damageto a random enemy.
flavor_text: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers. They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Kobold Geomancer
card_text: Spell Damage +1
flavor_text: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Lightwell
card_text: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavor_text: It isn't clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Lorewalker Cho
card_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
flavor_text: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

name: Lushwater Murcenary
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Murloc, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: You can't just switch sides because they have more fish!

name: Mad Bomber
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavor_text: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Mad Scientist
card_text: Deathrattle: Put a Secret from your deck into the battlefield.
flavor_text: His mother wanted him to be a mage or a warlock, but noooooooo, he had to go and be a scientist like his father.

name: Magic Dart Frog
card_text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: There's a powerful throat in this frog.

name: Mana Addict
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

name: Mana Geode
card_text: Whenever this minion is healed, summon a 2/2 Crystal.
flavor_text: Gadgetzan, where even the pet rocks have pet rocks.

name: Novice Engineer
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they'll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

name: Manafeeder Panthara
card_text: Battlecry: If you've used your Hero Power this turn, draw a card.
flavor_text: Feeds on mana, crystal kibble, and whatever it was you were just snacking on.

name: Mechwarper
card_text: Your Mechs cost (1) less.
flavor_text: Mechs that summon mechs? What's next? Donuts that summon donuts? Mmmmm.

name: Menacing Nimbus
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
flavor_text: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.

name: Murkspark Eel
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has only even-Cost cards, deal 2 damage.
flavor_text: Makes shockingly good unagi.

name: Murmuring Elemental
card_text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers twice.
flavor_text: Déjà Dude.

name: Nat, the Darkfisher
card_text: At the start of your opponent's turn, they have a 50% chance to draw an extra card.
flavor_text: You can take away his humanity, but you will never take away his fishing pole.

name: Neferset Ritualist
card_text: Battlecry: Restore adjacent minions to full Health.
flavor_text: The Neferset are great—they'll always make sure their friends are feline fine.

name: Omega Mind
card_text: Battlecry: If you have 10Mana Crystals, your spells have Lifesteal this turn.
flavor_text: Has a side-business selling her lipstick shade, "Omega Red."

name: Pint-Sized Summoner
card_text: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
flavor_text: She's quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

name: Pompous Thespian
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Alas poor Annoy-o-Tron! A fellow of infinite jest, of most excellent fancy!

name: Primalfin Champion
card_text: Deathrattle: Return anyspells you cast on thisminion to your hand.
flavor_text: Sure, he'll return your stuff. OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

name: Prince Keleseth
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no 2-Cost cards, give all minions in your deck +1/+1.
flavor_text: Three Princes stand before you. This one wants to buff his brothers.

name: Public Defender
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Happy to defend any public offender!

name: Pyros
card_text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
flavor_text: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

name: Recombobulator
card_text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor_text: For when you didn’t combobulate quite right the first time around.

name: Redband Wasp
card_text: RushHas +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: Also comes in other colors, but red's in fashion this season.

name: Rockpool Hunter
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc +1/+1.
flavor_text: Loves crab meat. Fears crabs.

name: Nerub'ar Weblord
card_text: Minions with Battlecry cost (2) more.
flavor_text: Weblords spend all day making giant trampoline parks.

name: Nerubian Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor_text: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

name: Netherspite Historian
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discovera Dragon.
flavor_text: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!

name: Oasis Thrasher
card_text: Frenzy: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Didn't get tickets for E.T.C.'s show.

name: One-eyed Cheat
card_text: Whenever you summon a Pirate, gain Stealth.
flavor_text: When pirates say there is no "Eye" in "team," they are very literal about it.

name: Parachute Brigand
card_text: After you play a Pirate,summon this minionfrom your hand.
flavor_text: She flies standby.

name: Patient Assassin
card_text: Stealth Poisonous
flavor_text: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Phase Stalker
card_text: After you use your HeroPower, cast a Secretfrom your deck.
flavor_text: It's not just a phase! I don't have to tell you anything! GAWSH!

name: Plated Beetle
card_text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
flavor_text: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

name: Primalfin Totem
card_text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavor_text: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

name: Puddlestomper
flavor_text: He pays homage to Morgl, the great murloc oracle! (Who doesn't??)

name: Queen of Pain
card_text: Lifesteal
flavor_text: Her sister is the Queen of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

name: Questing Explorer
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Quest, draw a card.
flavor_text: Earned her merit badges the hard way—twelve zhevra hooves at a time.

name: Radiant Elemental
card_text: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavor_text: It's a literal lava lamp!

name: Ravasaur Runt
card_text: Battlecry: If you control at least 2 other minions, Adapt.
flavor_text: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

name: Raven Familiar
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a spell in each deck. If yours costs more, draw it.
flavor_text: Quoth the raven, 'Does yours cost more?'

name: Razorpetal Lasher
card_text: Battlecry: Add aRazorpetal to your handthat deals 1 damage.
flavor_text: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

name: Redscale Dragontamer
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavor_text: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: River Crocolisk
flavor_text: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Serena Bloodfeather
card_text: Battlecry: Choose an enemy minion. Steal Attack and Health from it until this has more.
flavor_text: She’s really into networking! After all, she’s introduced countless low-level Horde players to the Spirit Healer.
