name: Serpent Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/4 Sea Serpent.
flavor_text: These things go from "adorable danger noodle!" to "MY FACE IS MELTING!" all too quickly.

name: Shadowboxer
card_text: Whenever a minion is healed, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: Punching is its primary function. Also, its secondary function.

name: Sharkfin Fan
card_text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate.
flavor_text: His taste in soup is criminal.

name: Shieldbreaker
card_text: Battlecry: Silence an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor_text: Can also break up fights, relationships, and unions.

name: Ship's Cannon
card_text: After you summon aPirate, deal 2 damageto a random enemy.
flavor_text: If you hear someone yell, "Cannonball!" you're about to get wet. Or crushed.

name: Shrubadier
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Treant.
flavor_text: Her shoots can kill.

name: Soldier's Caravan
card_text: At the start of your turn,summon two 1/1Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor_text: It’s a clown car… for JUSTICE!

name: Soup Vendor
card_text: Whenever you restore 3 or more Health to your hero, draw a card.
flavor_text: Fresh from the floor of the arena!

name: Spark Engine
card_text: Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Spark with Rush to your hand.
flavor_text: He goes by Bzzzzt Aldrin.

name: Spirit of the Bat
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.After a friendly minion dies, give a minion in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah, nah nah nah nah

name: Squashling
card_text: EchoBattlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavor_text: Everyone hail to the squashling song!

name: Starscryer
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell.
flavor_text: Often grieves with the Starsweeper.

name: Steamwheedle Sniper
card_text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavor_text: Goblins seldom have the patience for sniping. Most prefer lobbing explosives.

name: Sandstorm Elemental
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

name: Savage Striker
card_text: Battlecry: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to your hero's Attack.
flavor_text: Ruthless at tribal roasts.

name: Scarab Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Scarabs.
flavor_text: They say you can’t make an omelet without AHHH THEY’RE EATING MY FACE!

name: Scavenging Hyena
card_text: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
flavor_text: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they'll eat pretty much anything. Even Brussels sprouts.

name: Scorp-o-matic
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 1 or less Attack.
flavor_text: Back in my day, we had to manually scorp.

name: Security Automaton
card_text: After you summon a Mech, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: Honestly, I feel less secure when it's around.

name: Serpent Ward
card_text: At the end of your turn,deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: When snakes get sick, they get sent to the Serpent Ward.

name: Shadow Ascendant
card_text: At the end of your turn,give another randomfriendly minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

name: Shadowjeweler Hanar
card_text: After you play a Secret,Discover a Secret froma different class.
flavor_text: What is a shadowjeweler? A miserable little pile of secrets.

name: Shadowy Figure
card_text: Battlecry: Transform into a 2/2 copy of a friendly Deathrattle minion.
flavor_text: Terrible at shadow puppets: “This is… a tentacle! And this is… two tentacles!”

name: Shielded Minibot
card_text: Divine Shield
flavor_text: He chooses to believe what he is programmed to believe!

name: Shimmering Tempest
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor_text: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

name: Shotbot
card_text: Reborn
flavor_text: Impact detected. Assuming hero pose.

name: Shrinkmeister
card_text: Battlecry: Give a minion -2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: After the debacle of the Gnomish World Enlarger, gnomes are wary of size-changing inventions.

name: Sir Finley of the Sands
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck hasno duplicates, Discover anupgraded Hero Power.
flavor_text: "The sands shall be my sea! And this scarab shall be my, er, strange and wriggly boat!"

name: Sneaky Delinquent
card_text: Stealth. Deathrattle: Add a 3/1 Ghost with Stealth to your hand.
flavor_text: All right, now open your lid and say "Ahh!"

name: Snowchugger
card_text: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor_text: Do the slow chant when he waddles by: "Chug! Chug! Chug!"

name: Sparring Partner
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Give aminion Taunt.
flavor_text: Come at me, bro.

name: Spellshifter
card_text: Spell Damage +1Each turn this is in your hand,swap its Attack and Health.
flavor_text: He also goes by "worg-lock."

name: Spellzerker
card_text: Has Spell Damage +2 while damaged.
flavor_text: But don’t ask her to use it in a sentence.

name: Spirit of the Dragonhawk
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.Your Hero Power also targets adjacent minions.
flavor_text: Dragonhawks aren’t known for their accuracy.

name: Spirit Wolf
card_text: Taunt

name: Spitting Camel
card_text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to another random friendly minion.
flavor_text: Were you expectorating another bad pun?

name: Starving Buzzard
card_text: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
flavor_text: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

name: Stubborn Gastropod
card_text: Taunt Poisonous
flavor_text: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

name: Sunreaver Spy
card_text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: She's watching. Always watching.

name: Tortollan Forager
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
flavor_text: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

name: Transmogrifier
card_text: Whenever you draw a card, transform it into a random Legendary minion.
flavor_text: All it takes is some imagination and a cardboard box.

name: Stonesplinter Trogg
card_text: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: The only thing worse than smelling troggs is listening to their poetry.

name: Sunfury Protector
card_text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.
flavor_text: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

name: Tainted Zealot
card_text: Divine ShieldSpell Damage +1
flavor_text: The love she shares seems to go nowhere. Now she's lost her Light, tosses and turns, she can't sleep at night...

name: Tasty Flyfish
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a Dragon in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: Reinforced with vitamins and mrglrls.

name: Temple Berserker
card_text: RebornHas +2 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: He's back. He's angry. And he's here to wrap things up.

name: Tenwu of the Red Smoke
card_text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (1) this turn.
flavor_text: Red, the color of subtlety.

name: Tiny Knight of Evil
card_text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

name: Toad of the Wilds
card_text: TauntBattlecry: If you're holdinga Nature spell, gain+2 Health.
flavor_text: "Someday we'll find it. The Oasis Connection. The peons, the caravans, and me."

name: Totem Golem
card_text: Overload: (1)
flavor_text: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

name: Toxicologist
card_text: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Double-majoring in culinary sciences was definitely a mistake.

name: Trogg Beastrager
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random Beast in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Still angry that the Gadgetzan Rager Club wouldn't accept him as a member.

name: Twisted Worgen
card_text: Stealth
flavor_text: Sometimes the Old Gods' corruptions gives you power untold, sometimes you get +1 Attack. We can’t all be winners in the Eldritch lottery.

name: Underbelly Fence
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holdinga card from another class, gain +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor_text: She’ll take anything you have—except scruples and a good work ethic.

name: Undercity Valiant
card_text: Combo: Deal 1 damage.
flavor_text: Almost went to play for Stormwind before signing with Undercity.

name: Unpowered Mauler
card_text: Can only attack if you cast a spell this turn.
flavor_text: After a stressful work day it really needs an outlet.

name: Unstable Ghoul
card_text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: Filling your Ghouls with Rocket Fuel is all the rage at Necromancer school.

name: Upgradeable Framebot
flavor_text: *Awesome arm not included.

name: Venomizer
card_text: MagneticPoisonous
flavor_text: Keeps getting banned for toxic behavior.

name: Vitality Totem
card_text: At the end of your turn, restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

name: Vulgar Homunculus
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

name: Wild Pyromancer
card_text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor_text: BOOM BABY BOOM! BAD IS GOOD! DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Wrathguard
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
flavor_text: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

name: Wyrmrest Agent
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +1 Attack and Taunt.
flavor_text: Keeping tabs on the Grand Tournament is priority #1 for the five mighty Dragonflights!

name: Abusive Sergeant
card_text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Acherus Veteran
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor_text: This is my Runeblade. There are many like it but this one is mine.

name: Air Elemental
card_text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor_text: Makes a mean puff pastry.

name: Trick Totem
card_text: At the end of your turn, cast a random spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor_text: It knows how to sit still and do tricks. Still working on rolling over, though.

name: Tuskarr Fisherman
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Spell Damage +1.
flavor_text: If you bring him 500 fish, he'll give you this sweet Kalu'ak Fishing Pole.

name: Twilight Geomancer
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Give your C'ThunTaunt (wherever it is).
flavor_text: "Ok C'Thun, repeat after me: 'Your mother was a hamster.'"

name: Underbelly Angler
card_text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor_text: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: Undercity Huckster
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor_text: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

name: Vanessa VanCleef
card_text: Combo: Add a copy of the last card your opponent played to your hand.
flavor_text: Some people collect stamps or flowers. She collects enemies.

name: Vicious Scalehide
card_text: LifestealRush
flavor_text: They make wonderful pets if you're not allergic to blood loss.

name: Vicious Scraphound
card_text: Whenever this miniondeals damage, gain that much Armor.
flavor_text: It begs for scraps.

name: Void Analyst
card_text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Conclusion: Nothing there.

name: Volatile Elemental
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

name: Waterboy
card_text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn costs (0).
flavor_text: 100% organic troll sweat.

name: Whirliglider
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 0/2 Goblin Bomb.
flavor_text: She's on a bomb voyage.

name: Whirling Zap-o-matic
card_text: Windfury
flavor_text: If you pay a little extra, you can get it in "candy-apple red."

name: Wickerclaw
card_text: After your hero gains Attack, this miniongains +2 Attack.
flavor_text: They say pets tend to look like their owners.

name: Wyrmrest Purifier
card_text: Battlecry: Transform allNeutral cards in your deckinto random cards fromyour class.
flavor_text: She keeps your deck classy.

name: Youthful Brewmaster
card_text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor_text: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews. Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Zephrys the Great
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no duplicates, wish for the perfect card.
flavor_text: "Of course it's perfect, you're just not seeing how to use it."

name: Acornbearer
card_text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/1 Squirrels to your hand.
flavor_text: You’d be nuts to mess with the squirrel squad.

name: Aldor Attendant
card_text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of your Librams by (1) this game.
flavor_text: Will check to make sure you have a valid libramary card.

name: Alleycat
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Cat.
flavor_text: To be a cool cat in Gadgetzan, you gotta have bling.

name: Angry Chicken
card_text: Has +5 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

name: Animated Broomstick
card_text: RushBattlecry: Give your other minions Rush.
flavor_text: "Blimey, that's a Stratocumulus 1000!"

name: Arcane Artificer
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor_text: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

name: Armor Vendor
card_text: Battlecry: Give 4 Armor to each hero.
flavor_text: "You look like the kind of person that would buy three sets of armor. One to wear, a spare, and a spare for the spare."

name: Bladed Cultist
card_text: Combo: Gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

name: Blood Imp
card_text: Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor_text: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

name: Bloodsail Corsair
card_text: Battlecry: Remove1 Durability from youropponent's weapon.
flavor_text: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers. It's called the "Pirate's Code".

name: Bloodsail Flybooter
card_text: Battlecry: Add two 1/1 Pirates to your hand.
flavor_text: They’re pretty fly for some pirate guys.

name: Chameleos
card_text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a card your opponent is holding.
flavor_text: He's everyone you want to be.

name: Animated Berserker
card_text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
flavor_text: He'd be a lot easier to animate if he would just stand still.

name: Arcane Anomaly
card_text: After you cast a spell, give this minion +1 Health.
flavor_text: He used to get work as a Spatial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.

name: Argent Squire
card_text: Divine Shield
flavor_text: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

name: Babbling Book
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor_text: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.

name: Beaming Sidekick
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor_text: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

name: Blackjack Stunner
card_text: Battlecry: If you control aSecret, return a minionto its owner's hand.It costs (2) more.
flavor_text: "I'm about to ruin this 10-cost minion's whole career."

name: Blazing Battlemage
flavor_text: Weaponized an ancient technique once used to slice cold butter.

name: Bloodsail Deckhand
card_text: Battlecry: The nextweapon you play costs(1) less.
flavor_text: Piracy is technically a discount.

name: Brave Archer
card_text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: This is a "bearly" concealed reference.

name: Buccaneer
card_text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
flavor_text: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

name: Cleric of Scales
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor_text: If she can't find a spell, it's a clerical error.

name: Crystallizer
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damageto your hero. Gain 5 Armor.
flavor_text: This elf's winning the arms race.

name: Daring Fire-Eater
card_text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power this turn deals 2 more damage.
flavor_text: A few hours later he DESTROYED the arena bathrooms.

name: Dragon Egg
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
flavor_text: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.

name: Dust Devil
card_text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
flavor_text: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

name: Dwarven Sharpshooter
card_text: Your Hero Power can target minions.
flavor_text: Scissors, knives, needles, you name it! He'll shoot it.

name: Elven Archer
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor_text: Don't bother asking her out on a date. She'll shoot you down.

name: Emboldener 3000
card_text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion +1/+1.

name: Emerald Reaver
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
flavor_text: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

name: Enchanted Raven
flavor_text: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!

name: Eternium Rover
card_text: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain 2 Armor.
flavor_text: He's all beeps and smiles but you're just a walking pile of armor to him.

name: Faithful Lumi
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Mech +1/+1.
flavor_text: They're a little light-headed.

name: Click-Clocker
card_text: Divine Shield. Battlecry:Give a random Mech inyour hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Allan please add details

name: Clockwork Gnome
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
flavor_text: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.

name: Cogmaster
card_text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
flavor_text: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

name: Crystalline Oracle
card_text: Deathrattle: Copy a cardfrom your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavor_text: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

name: Deadscale Knight
card_text: Lifesteal
flavor_text: His favorite spell is Chum Explosion.

name: Depth Charge
card_text: At the start of your turn, deal 5 damage to ALL minions.
flavor_text: * Does not have Charge.

name: Dire Mole
flavor_text: You especially don't want to make a dire mountain out of a dire mole hill.

name: Emerald Hive Queen
card_text: Your minions cost (2) more.
flavor_text: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

name: Feral Gibberer
card_text: After this minion attacks a hero, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text: It's certainly not civilized gibbering.

name: Fiery Bat
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: He'll always be our first.

name: Fire Fly
card_text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavor_text: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

name: Frazzled Freshman
flavor_text: "Late to bed, early to rise, makes a student unable to open her eyes."

name: Gadgetzan Jouster
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

name: Glacial Shard
card_text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy.
flavor_text: Ice, ice, baby!

name: Glow-Tron
card_text: Magnetic
flavor_text: They tried for weeks to make a stealth version, but eventually decided to just let it glow.

name: Goldshire Footman
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

name: Gravelsnout Knight
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a random 1-Cost minion for your opponent.
flavor_text: The mole of La Mancha rides again!

name: Grimscale Chum
card_text: Battlecry: Give a randomMurloc in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: Listen, see? We'll take 'em to the docks, see? And throw 'em in the sea, see?

name: Guardian Augmerchant
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it Divine Shield.
flavor_text: "What doesn't kill you makes me money!"

name: Gurubashi Chicken
card_text: Overkill: Gain +5 Attack.
flavor_text: “Ya hold it by da feet, mon. Den ya THROW.”

name: Healing Totem
card_text: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to all friendly minions.

name: Helpless Hatchling
card_text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a Beast in your hand by (1).
flavor_text: It can’t be all that helpful. Not wif dose widdle wings!

name: Imprisoned Homunculus
card_text: Dormant for 2 turns.Taunt
flavor_text: He got a time out for excessive vulgarity.

name: Infectious Sporeling
card_text: After this damages a minion, turn it into an Infectious Sporeling.
flavor_text: "The best thing about being me—there’s so many 'me's."

name: Fiendish Servant
card_text: Deathrattle: Give thisminion's Attack to a randomfriendly minion.
flavor_text: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Flame Imp
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: Imps like being on fire. They just do.

name: Forbidden Ancient
card_text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each Mana spent.
flavor_text: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

name: Goblin Bomb
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damageto the enemy hero.
flavor_text: They're Dr. Boom's babies. His baby boomers.

name: Grimscale Oracle
card_text: Your other Murlocs have +1 Attack.
flavor_text: These are the brainy murlocs. It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

name: Gurubashi Offering
card_text: At the start of your turn, destroy this and gain 8 Armor.
flavor_text: For a limited time, loa blessings are on a pray-one-get-two deal (on selected sacrifices only).

name: Hot Air Balloon
card_text: At the start of your turn, gain +1 Health.
flavor_text: The Gadgetzan Pilgrim's Bounty parade is missing a float this year.

name: Hungry Crab
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Murloc. It's what's for dinner.

name: Imprisoned Sungill
card_text: Dormant for 2 turns.When this awakens, summon two 1/1Murlocs.
flavor_text: Imprisoned for ten thousand years! Not because it's a demon. Because of the dancing.

name: Injured Kvaldir
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavor_text: Don't worry. With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

name: Irondeep Trogg
card_text: After your opponentcasts a spell, summon another Irondeep Trogg.
flavor_text: STOP AGGROING MORE!

name: Jeweled Macaw
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavor_text: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Leper Gnome
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

name: Lowly Squire
card_text: Inspire: Gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: But not the lowliest!

name: Malchezaar's Imp
card_text: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
flavor_text: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.

name: Meanstreet Marshal
card_text: Deathrattle: If this minion has 2 or more Attack, draw a card.
flavor_text: Remember, submit your bribes directly to the Marshal - it's the law!

name: Mogu Cultist
card_text: Battlecry: If your board is full of Mogu Cultists, sacrifice them all and summon Highkeeper Ra.
flavor_text: Mogu cultists have the worst team-building exercises.

name: Murloc Raider
flavor_text: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Murmy
card_text: Reborn
flavor_text: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

name: Ivus, the Forest Lord
card_text: Battlecry: Spend the rest ofyour Mana and gain +2/+2,Rush, Divine Shield, or Tauntat random for each.
flavor_text: He's always welcome at the local tavern, unlike a certain Ancient.

name: Kabal Lackey
card_text: Battlecry: The next Secretyou play this turn costs (0).
flavor_text: I'll tell you one thing he doesn't lack: GUMPTION.

name: Kindling Elemental
card_text: Battlecry: The next Elemental you playcosts (1) less.
flavor_text: Burn baby burn. Little inferno!

name: Kobold Librarian
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

name: Lightwarden
card_text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

name: Mana Wyrm
card_text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Mecharoo
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Jo-E Bot.
flavor_text: Its project name was KAN-GA. The little one was R-00.

name: Mistress of Mixtures
card_text: Deathrattle: Restore 4 Health to each hero.
flavor_text: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.

name: Murloc Tidecaller
card_text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Mystery Winner
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
flavor_text: Yeah, but the mystery prize could be anything! Even a boat!

name: Pit Snake
card_text: Poisonous
flavor_text: It could be worse. It could be a Snake Pit.

name: Possessed Villager
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
flavor_text: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

name: Poultryizer
card_text: At the start of your turn, transform a random minion into a 1/1 Chicken.

name: Psychic Conjurer
card_text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor_text: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Reliquary Seeker
card_text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
flavor_text: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers. The League of Explorers doesn't.

name: Righteous Protector
card_text: TauntDivine Shield
flavor_text: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

name: Northshire Cleric
card_text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavor_text: They help the downtrodden and distressed. Also they sell cookies.

name: N'Zoth's First Mate
card_text: Battlecry: Equip a 1/3 Rusty Hook.
flavor_text: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

name: Patches the Pirate
card_text: After you play a Pirate,summon this minionfrom your deck.
flavor_text: What do sailors yell when Patches steals their treasure chest full of laws and other things being transported to parliament for a vote? "The Eyes have it!"

name: Peasant
card_text: At the start of your turn, draw a card.
flavor_text: Better pay them, or they'll join the Defias.

name: Pharaoh Cat
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Reborn minion to your hand.
flavor_text: Mightiest of mousers, enduring in kingship of the upper and lower cat tree, conqueror of the red dot, the all-wise Catshepsut.

name: Pogo-Hopper
card_text: Battlecry: Gain +2/+2 foreach other Pogo-Hopperyou played this game.
flavor_text: Once you hop, you just can't stop!

name: Potion Vendor
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor_text: Everyone gets two because that’s all she can hold.

name: Prize Plunderer
card_text: Combo: Deal 1 damage toa minion for each other cardyou've played this turn.
flavor_text: But he'll never be able to plunder the prize of a happy childhood.

name: Raptor Hatchling
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
flavor_text: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

name: Reliquary of Souls
card_text: LifestealDeathrattle: Shuffle'Reliquary Prime'into your deck.
flavor_text: These three represent Anger, Desire, and Suffering. Much like raid night guild chat.

name: Repair Bot
card_text: At the end of your turn, restore 6 Health to a damaged character.

name: Runic Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Oh man! Runic omelettes are the best!

name: Sanguine Reveler
card_text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain +2/+2.
flavor_text: Have some! This drink is to die for!

name: Saronite Taskmaster
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/3 Free Agent with Taunt for your opponent.
flavor_text: Don't even think of asking for time off.

name: Secretkeeper
card_text: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: Where is Mankrik’s wife? She’ll never tell.

name: Shieldbearer
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game?? This is no easy job.

name: Sir Finley, Sea Guide
card_text: Battlecry: Swap yourhand with the bottom ofyour deck.
flavor_text: "No need to worry, ol' chums, I have the map right here. It says to continue going straight down!"

name: Skaterbot
card_text: MagneticRush
flavor_text:
"See you later bot"
- Jaina

name: Sky Raider
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random Pirate to your hand.
flavor_text: Maybe he should've hatched a plan that could actually carry booty back too.

name: Sludge Slurper
card_text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: You can't stop slurping this delicious sludge!

name: Selfless Hero
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor_text: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

name: Shadowbomber
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to each hero.
flavor_text: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

name: Toxfin
card_text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc Poisonous.
flavor_text: I'm addicted to him, but I know that he's Toxfin.

name: Shifter Zerus
card_text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.
flavor_text: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

name: Shimmerfly
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Hunter spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Plenty of buzz around this card.

name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
card_text: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
flavor_text: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.

name: Skeletal Knight
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a Knights of the Frozen Throne card to your opponent's hand.

name: Small-Time Buccaneer
card_text: Has +2 Attack while you have a weapon equipped.
flavor_text: "Oh, I'm not serious about it. I only pirate on the weekends."

name: Southsea Deckhand
card_text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
flavor_text: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

name: Spirit of the Raptor
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor_text: “Loti! LOTI! Drop it. Drop it Loti! Down! Down Loti!”

name: Stoneclaw Totem
card_text: Taunt

name: Swamp Leech
card_text: Lifesteal
flavor_text: A face only a druid could love.

name: Swashburglar
card_text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavor_text: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"

name: Test Subject
card_text: Deathrattle: Return anyspells you cast on thisminion to your hand.
flavor_text: “Now I feel... REALLY icky.”

name: Tour Guide
card_text: Battlecry: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
flavor_text: "Here is the original blueprint for the Academy grounds! Don't mind those so-called dark chambers… They'll be at the end of the tour."

name: Twilight Whelp
card_text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
flavor_text: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.

name: Undertaker
card_text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1/+1.
flavor_text: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.

name: Spirit Jailer
card_text: Battlecry: Shuffle 2 Soul Fragments into your deck.
flavor_text: "Sure, they're in your deck, but the mind is like, the REAL prison."

name: Spirit of the Dead
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.After a friendly minion dies,shuffle a 1-Cost copy of itinto your deck.
flavor_text: Just because you’re dead doesn’t mean you’re off the team.

name: Spirit of the Rhino
card_text: Stealth for 1 turn.Your Rush minions are Immune the turn they're summoned.
flavor_text: Where did they get this preposterous hypothesis?

name: Springpaw
card_text: RushBattlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynxwith Rush to your hand.
flavor_text: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!

name: Stonetusk Boar
card_text: Charge
flavor_text: This card is boaring.

name: Surging Tempest
card_text: Has +1 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

name: Swamp Dragon Egg
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Dragon to your hand.
flavor_text: Would you eat them in a ditch? Would you eat them with a witch?

name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

name: Timber Wolf
card_text: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavor_text: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Tournament Attendee
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament. He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

name: Town Crier
card_text: Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion from your deck.
flavor_text: When he was younger, he was the town crybaby.

name: Tunnel Trogg
card_text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
flavor_text: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels. You try your beauty routine without natural light.

name: Vibrant Squirrel
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acornsinto your deck. When drawn,summon a 2/1 Squirrel.
flavor_text: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

name: Vilefin Inquisitor
card_text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'
flavor_text: Nobody expects the Vilefin Inquisition!

name: Violet Spellwing
card_text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to your hand.
flavor_text: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Voidwalker
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

name: Voodoo Doctor
card_text: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavor_text: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Wand Thief
card_text: Combo: Discover a Mage spell.
flavor_text: "What’re ya buyin’?”

name: Wax Elemental
card_text: TauntDivine Shield
flavor_text: Takes double damage from wick-based weapons.

name: Witch's Apprentice
card_text: TauntBattlecry: Add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Is she a frog that became a witch, or a witch that became a frog?

name: Wolpertinger
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor_text: Scholomance student Brewfest prank gone awry.

name: Zombie Chow
card_text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Zombie. It's what's for dinner.

name: Warbot
card_text: Has +1 Attack while damaged.
flavor_text: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

name: Wartbringer
card_text: Battlecry: If you played 2 spells this turn, deal 2 damage.
flavor_text: “Does she cause them with magic, or just…like have a bucket she brings with her?”

name: Weasel Tunneler
card_text: Deathrattle: Shuffle this minion into your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: He's the reason the First Bank of Gadgetzan has steel floors.

name: Webspinner
card_text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
flavor_text: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!

name: Witchwood Imp
card_text: StealthDeathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor_text: This wood imp. Stop asking!

name: Worgen Infiltrator
card_text: Stealth
flavor_text: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Wrath of Air Totem
card_text: Spell Damage +1

name: Wretched Tiller
card_text: Whenever this minion attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: If you ever tried to plow permafrost, you’d be wretched, too.

name: Young Dragonhawk
card_text: Windfury
flavor_text: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

name: Young Priestess
card_text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavor_text: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Zealous Initiate
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

name: Chicken
card_text: Hey Chicken!

name: Mirror Image
card_text: Taunt

name: Murloc Tinyfin
flavor_text: High mortality rate, from often being hugged to death.

name: Shadow of Nothing
card_text: Mindgames whiffed! Your opponent had no minions!

name: Target Dummy
card_text: Taunt
flavor_text: The engineering equivalent of a "Kick Me" sticker.

name: Wisp
flavor_text: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode. But why?

name: Snowflipper Penguin
flavor_text: On land, a group of penguins is called a "waddle."

name: Dimensional Ripper
card_text: Summon 2 copies of a minion in your deck.
flavor_text:
The first dimensional ripper had a point.
The second fell flat.
The THIRD one really started to take shape!

name: Mind Control
card_text: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavor_text: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Puzzle Box of Yogg-Saron
card_text: Cast 10 random spells (targets chosen randomly).
flavor_text: "PUT THE BOX DOWN, RENO!"

name: Pyroblast
card_text: Deal 10 damage.
flavor_text: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Shield Shatter
card_text: Deal 4 damage to allminions. Costs (1) lessfor each Armor you have.
flavor_text:
"Is the shield being shattered or doing the shattering?"
"Yes."

name: Libram of Hope
card_text: Restore 8 Health. Summon an 8/8 Guardian with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: "Think you got lethal? Libram of NOPE!"

name: Plague of Death
card_text: Silence and destroy all minions.
flavor_text: Don't worry, there's a happy little funhouse right under that sand pit.

name: The Boomship
card_text: Summon 3 random minions from your hand. Give them Rush.
flavor_text: Dr. Boom ends his motivational speeches by dropping the mechs.

name: Call of the Wild
card_text: Summon all three Animal Companions.
flavor_text: "Hello. Misha, Leokk and Huffer aren't here right now, but if you leave a message we'll get back to you right away." BEEP.

name: Cenarion Ward
card_text: Gain 8 Armor.Summon a random8-Cost minion.
flavor_text: Don't ask about his right hand. He's still growing into it.

name: Deep Freeze
card_text: Freeze an enemy. Summon two 3/6 Water Elementals.
flavor_text: "Dancing with the Satyrs… on Ice!"

name: Anyfin Can Happen
card_text: Summon 7 Murlocs that died this game.
flavor_text: Theme song by Ellie Goldfin and Blagghghlrlrl Harris.

name: DOOM!
card_text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
flavor_text: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

name: Eye of the Storm
card_text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor_text: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

name: Lantern of Power
card_text: Give a minion +10/+10.

name: Nagrand Slam
card_text: Summon four 3/5 Clefthoofs that attack random enemies.
flavor_text: Come on and slam, and welcome to Nagrand!

name: Ultimate Infestation
card_text: Deal 5 damage. Draw5 cards. Gain 5 Armor.Summon a 5/5 Ghoul.
flavor_text: Ghouls in the pipe, five by five.

name: Mass Resurrection
card_text: Summon 3 friendly minions that diedthis game.
flavor_text: One's company, two's a crowd, and three's a “mass” resurrection, apparently.

name: Tree of Life
card_text: Restore all characters to full Health.
flavor_text: Healing: It grows on trees!

name: Zerek's Cloning Gallery
card_text: Summon a 1/1 copy of each minion in your deck.
flavor_text: Cloning can be a jarring experience.

name: Demigod's Favor
card_text: Give your other minions +2/+2.

name: Demonbolt
card_text: Destroy a minion. Costs (1) less for each minion you control.
flavor_text: Or as it’s known in troll, “De bolt, mon.”

name: Dinosize
card_text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
flavor_text: Comes with fries and a drink.

name: Free From Amber
card_text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
flavor_text: Bingo! Minion DNA!

name: Gift of the Wild
card_text: Give your minions +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor_text: The gift that keeps on living.

name: Lay on Hands
card_text: Restore 8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
flavor_text: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: The Forest's Aid
card_text: TwinspellSummon five 2/2 Treants.
flavor_text: Delicious Forest’s Aid! Made from real forests.

name: Tip the Scales
card_text: Summon 7 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor_text: Hold on, I need to get some murlocs to weigh in on this.

name: Crush
card_text: Destroy a minion. If you have a damaged minion, this costs (4) less.
flavor_text: Using this card on your enemies is one of the best things in life, according to some barbarians.

name: Earthquake
card_text: Deal 5 damage to all minions, then deal 2 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

name: Everyfin is Awesome
card_text: Give your minions +2/+2.Costs (1) less for each Murloc you control.
flavor_text: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!

name: Flamestrike
card_text: Deal 5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Kangor's Endless Army
card_text: Resurrect 3 friendly Mechs. They keep any Magnetic upgrades.
flavor_text:
"That's three, Kangor. Three isn't endless."
- Countess Ashmore

name: Lesser Mithril Spellstone
card_text: Summon one 5/5 Mithril Golem. (Equip a weapon to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
To dwarves of stone the demon called
With promises of might, enthralled
In grasping greed they found their doom
Forever bound in mithril tombs.

name: Glacial Mysteries
card_text: Put one of each Secret from your deck intothe battlefield.
flavor_text: The secret is in the frosting.

name: Miracle Growth
card_text: Draw 3 cards.Summon a Plant withTaunt and stats equalto your hand size.
flavor_text: I’ve got NO idea what’s in that fertilizer.

name: Power of Creation
card_text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon two copies of it.
flavor_text: Mostly used for party tricks, to be honest.

name: Shan'do's Lesson
card_text: Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.

name: Tidal Wave
card_text: LifestealDeal 3 damage toall minions.
flavor_text: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Twisting Nether
card_text: Destroy all minions.
flavor_text: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Void Contract
card_text: Destroy half of each player's deck.
flavor_text: “YOU SIGNED WHAT?!”

name: A New Challenger...
card_text: Discover a 6-Cost minion. Summon it with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: … Arrives? Approaches? TELL US ALREADY!

name: Crushing Walls
card_text: Destroy your opponent's left and right-most minions.
flavor_text: "It could be worse!" "It's worse."

name: Elekk Mount
card_text: Give a minion +4/+7 and Taunt. When it dies, summon an Elekk.
flavor_text: Pink Elekks are on parade!

name: Firelands Portal
card_text: Deal 5 damage. Summon a random5-Cost minion.
flavor_text: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

name: Flark's Boom-Zooka
card_text: Summon 3 minions fromyour deck. They attackenemy minions, then die.
flavor_text: It used to be a Ba-zooka but we ran out of sheep.

name: Greater Arcane Missiles
card_text: Shoot three missiles at random enemies that deal 3 damage each.
flavor_text: Wow, and I thought Arcane Missiles was great!

name: Lesser Diamond Spellstone
card_text: Resurrect 2 different friendly minions. @(Cast 4 spells to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
A diamond, white, this stone the eighth
A precious jewel for those of faith
A whispered prayer restores the lost
But none among them know the cost.

name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
card_text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

name: Luna's Pocket Galaxy
card_text: Change the Cost of minions in yourdeck to (1).
flavor_text: Luna became head of the astronomy department when her boss invented the Pocket Black Hole.

name: Psychic Scream
card_text: Shuffle all minions into your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Everybody! Hit the deck!

name: Soul Mirror
card_text: Summon copies of enemy minions. They attack their copies.
flavor_text: It’s a doppelgang-war!

name: Wisps of the Old Gods
card_text: Choose One - Summon seven 1/1 Wisps; or Give your minions +2/+2.
flavor_text: They're just normal wisps, actually. The "Of the Old Gods" bit is just marketing.

name: Avenging Wrath
card_text: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor_text: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

name: Candle Breath
card_text: Draw 3 cards. Costs (3) less while you're holding a Dragon.
flavor_text:
"And Waxadred shall light their fires, with roaring breath hotter than pyres!
Come before him, scamp and vandal, pledge your faith and lift your candle!"

name: Dark Wispers
card_text: Choose One - Summon 5 Wisps; or Give a minion +5/+5 and Taunt.
flavor_text: Don't worry; we fired the person who named this card.

name: Ectomancy
card_text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
flavor_text: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

name: Embrace Darkness
card_text: Choose an enemy minion.At the start of your turn,gain control of it.
flavor_text: Once you both get comfortable, darkness is actually pretty snuggly.

name: Entomb
card_text: Choose an enemy minion.Shuffle it into your deck.
flavor_text: It's perfectly safe as long as you remember to put in air holes.

name: Felfire Potion
card_text: Deal 5 damage to all characters.
flavor_text: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

name: Gather Your Party
card_text: Recruit a minion.
flavor_text: Thrilling adventure! Danger guaranteed! Loot uncertain! Death optional! Who’s with me?

name: Hand of Gul'dan
card_text: When you playor discard this,draw 3 cards.
flavor_text: His skull also draws three cards. Imagine how many cards he could draw with HIS ENTIRE BODY!

name: Hidden Oasis
card_text: Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Ancient with Taunt; or Restore 12 Health.
flavor_text: Amazing that it's been hidden, given the twenty-foot treant splashing around in it.

name: Holy Fire
card_text: Deal 5 damage. Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

name: Level Up!
card_text: Give your Silver Hand Recruits +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavor_text:
Ding!
Grats.

name: Overflow
card_text: Restore 5 Healthto all characters.Draw 5 cards.
flavor_text: It's a high five followed by a low tide.

name: Ball of Spiders
card_text: Summon three 1/1 Webspinners.
flavor_text: "THEY'RE EVERYWHERE GET THEM OFF!!!" - Everyone

name: Blizzard
card_text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor_text: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Cannon Barrage
card_text: Deal 3 damage to arandom enemy. Repeatfor each of your Pirates.
flavor_text: Why fire your cannons strategically when you can fire them all at once?

name: Dark Bargain
card_text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
flavor_text: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

name: Darkest Hour
card_text: Destroy all friendly minions. For each one, summon a random minion from your deck.
flavor_text: It's always darkest just before you find the light switch.

name: Deadly Arsenal
card_text: Reveal a weapon from your deck. Deal its Attack to all minions.
flavor_text: Oh look. A Gorehowl.

name: Dragonfire Potion
card_text: Deal 5 damage to allminions except Dragons.
flavor_text: No one was brave enough to fire the dragon in person… so they made the potion do it.

name: Enter the Coliseum
card_text: Destroy all minions except each player's highest Attack minion.
flavor_text: You have to get past the vendors first. So many are lost to shopping...

name: Eureka!
card_text: Summon a copy of a random minion from your hand.
flavor_text: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

name: Heavy Metal!
card_text: Summon a randomminion with Cost equalto your Armor (up to 10).
flavor_text: This metal is so heavy it will satisfy your iron requirements for the next year.

name: Lightbomb
card_text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavor_text: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Meteor
card_text: Deal 15 damage to a minion and 3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor_text: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

name: Pharaoh's Blessing
card_text: Give a minion +4/+4, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
flavor_text: Life hack: Sneeze near a pharaoh.

name: Rain of Toads
card_text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor_text: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

name: Shadow Essence
card_text: Summon a 5/5 copy of a random minion in your deck.
flavor_text: Difficult to bottle up and sell. But it packs a punch.

name: Spikeridged Steed
card_text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
flavor_text: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

name: Stampeding Roar
card_text: Summon a random Beast from your hand and give it Rush.
flavor_text:
[x]The Gurubashi Arena has an
extremely permissive policy on
pets in the workplace.

name: Swarm of Locusts
card_text: Summon seven 1/1 Locusts with Rush.
flavor_text: Good things never come in swarms.

name: Unidentified Contract
card_text: Destroy a minion. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor_text: The terms of service are constantly changing.

name: Unleash the Beast
card_text: TwinspellSummon a 5/5 Wyvern with Rush.
flavor_text: The Kirin Tor have always been lax in enforcing leash laws.

name: Vanish
card_text: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: Baited Arrow
card_text: Deal 3 damage. Overkill: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
flavor_text: The card is common, but the steak is rare.

name: Blessed Champion
card_text: Double a minion's Attack.
flavor_text: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

name: Bloodlust
card_text: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

name: Cobra Shot
card_text: Deal 3 damage to a minion and the enemy hero.
flavor_text: "Cobra Shot" hurts way, way, way more than "Cobra Cuddle."

name: Command of Neptulon
card_text: Summon two 5/4 Elementals with Rush.Overload: (1)
flavor_text: "REVENANT TO F6. CHECKMATE, OZUMAT!"

name: Moonglade Portal
card_text: Restore 6 Health. Summon a random6-Cost minion.
flavor_text: Ain't no party like a Moonglade party ‘cause a Moonglade party got bears.

name: Recycle
card_text: Shuffle an enemy minion into your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Druidic recycling involves putting plastics in one bin and enemy minions in another bin.

name: Runic Carvings
card_text: Choose One - Summon four 2/2 Treant Totems; or Overload: (2) to summon them with Rush.
flavor_text: "That totem was beautiful… and you runed it!"

name: Spreading Plague
card_text: Summon a 1/5 Scarab with Taunt. If your opponent has more minions, cast this again.
flavor_text: In the past, plagues were spread by mice or fleas. These days they're spread by elves.

name: Sprint
card_text: Draw 4 cards.
flavor_text: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Starfire
card_text: Deal 5 damage.Draw a card.
flavor_text: Balance is important to druids. This card is perfectly balanced.

name: The Storm Bringer
card_text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
flavor_text: Finally, Electra can work from home.

name: Thistle Tea
card_text: Draw a card. Add 2 extra copies of it to your hand.
flavor_text: Aren't Thistles prickly? Why would you drink them? I don't get Rogues.

name: To My Side!
card_text: Summon an AnimalCompanion, or 2 if yourdeck has no minions.
flavor_text: I hunt alone. Well, me and Misha. And Huffer. And Leokk.

name: Unidentified Shield
card_text: Gain 5 Armor.Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor_text: The kobold stared at the bundle for a long time. “Ah hah!” he said. “It’s a shield.”

name: Aeroponics
card_text: Draw 2 cards.Costs (2) less for each Treant you control.
flavor_text: Good seeds can go far.

name: Arbor Up
card_text: Summon two 2/2 Treants. Give your minions +2/+1.
flavor_text: If you can’t outrun a tree, you really shouldn’t be here anyway.

name: Bane of Doom
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavor_text: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Blast Wave
card_text: Deal 2 damage to all minions.Overkill: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor_text: If you’re burning and you know it, wave your hands!

name: Brawl
card_text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavor_text: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Cabalist's Tome
card_text: Add 3 random Mage spells to your hand.
flavor_text: What's in there? I bet it's cookie recipes!

name: Devour Mind
card_text: Copy 3 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor_text: A mind is a terrible thing to waste. Seconds, anyone?

name: Excavated Evil
card_text: Deal 3 damage to all minions.Shuffle this card into your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: MOM! DAD! DON'T TOUCH IT! IT'S EVIL!!!!!!

name: Feeding Time
card_text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
flavor_text: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

name: Glowfly Swarm
card_text: Summon a 2/2 Glowfly for each spell in your hand.
flavor_text: Glowflies are distant relations to spelling bees.

name: Holy Wrath
card_text: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its Cost.
flavor_text: C'mon Molten Giant!!

name: Kara Kazham!
card_text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
flavor_text: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.

name: Lesser Onyx Spellstone
card_text: Destroy 1 random enemy minion.@(Play 3 Deathrattle cards to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
The trolls of old embraced the gift
A jewel of black for daggers swift
No party lasts who finds the stone
Those wielding it soon stand alone.

name: Libram of Justice
card_text: Equip a 1/4 weapon. Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor_text: Proper justice. Throw the book at him!

name: Lunar Visions
card_text: Draw 2 cards. Minions drawn cost (2) less.
flavor_text: The true mystery of lunar visions is how there is nothing to watch when there are so many channels.

name: Mass Hysteria
card_text: Force each minion to attack another random minion.
flavor_text: Black Friday gets worse every year.

name: Myra's Unstable Element
card_text: Draw the rest ofyour deck.
flavor_text: What could go wrong?

name: Necrium Vial
card_text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle twice.
flavor_text: Two near-death experiences for the price of one!

name: Nourish
card_text: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavor_text: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird's chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Cutting Class
card_text: Draw 2 cards.Costs (1) less per Attackof your weapon.
flavor_text: When you actually are the sharpest tool in the shed.

name: Deck of Wonders
card_text: Shuffle 5 Scrolls into your deck. When drawn, cast a random spell.
flavor_text: "Pick a card, any card. Wait! No! Not that one!" - Last words of previous owner

name: Demonheart
card_text: Deal 5 damage to a minion. If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
flavor_text: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

name: Dragon's Breath
card_text: Deal 4 damage. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor_text: Dragons breathe fire, sure, but did you know they can also breathe Cotton Candy? It's harder to give them a reason to do that, though.

name: Dragon's Fury
card_text: Reveal a spell from your deck. Deal damage equal to its Cost to all minions.
flavor_text: “C’mon Hucklemuck. She’ll never notice if we take just one little coin.”

name: Duel!
card_text: Summon a minion from each player's deck.They fight!
flavor_text: If you don’t fight to the death, it’s Duel Yielding.

name: Enrich
card_text: Draw 3 cards.

name: Explosive Shot
card_text: Deal 5 damage to a minion and 2 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor_text: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot. Then duck.

name: Flame Lance
card_text: Deal 8 damage to a minion.
flavor_text: It's on the rack next to ice lance, acid lance, and English muffin lance.

name: Force of Nature
card_text: Summon three 2/2 Treants.
flavor_text: "I think I'll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Hagatha's Scheme
card_text: Deal @ damageto all minions.(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor_text:
"All shall suffer!"
"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."
"I said ALL!!!"

name: Holy Water
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text: For a healthier option, try Holy Water: Zero.

name: Ironforge Portal
card_text: Gain 4 Armor.Summon a random4-Cost minion.
flavor_text: Come to beautiful Ironforge! Where irons are forged and the forges are iron!

name: Lesser Emerald Spellstone
card_text: Summon two 3/3 Wolves. (Play a Secret to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
An emerald stone for Tauren hands
Who sought its strength to save their lands
Their tribes now lost, their rage released
Who’s hunting now? And who’s the beast?

name: Living Mana
card_text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
flavor_text: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

name: Power Word: Replicate
card_text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 5/5 copy of it.
flavor_text: Available as a bundle, along with Power Words: Detonate, Animate, Annihilate, and Paper Weight.

name: Rampant Growth
card_text: Gain 2 Mana Crystals.

name: Rolling Fireball
card_text: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Any excess damage continues tothe left or right.
flavor_text: Why don't they ever run perpendicular?

name: Shrink Ray
card_text: Set the Attack and Health of all minionsto 1.
flavor_text: Actually works by enlarging the rest of the world.

name: Siphon Soul
card_text: Destroy a minion. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Solemn Vigil
card_text: Draw 2 cards. Costs (1) less for each minion that died this turn.
flavor_text: Each year, folk gather in front of Blackrock Mountain to mourn those who were mind-controlled into the lava.

name: Stand Against Darkness
card_text: Summon five 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor_text: Or if you're too tired, you can just kind of lean against the darkness.

name: Sudden Genesis
card_text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
flavor_text: Being hurt can make you another person.

name: Webweave
card_text: Summon two 1/2 Poisonous Spiders.
flavor_text: O, what a tangled web we weave, hoping spiders dodge the cleave.

name: Academic Espionage
card_text: Shuffle 10 cards from your opponent's class into your deck. They cost (1).
flavor_text: The tenth Pyroblast really felt like overkill.

name: Power Word: Tentacles
card_text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor_text: Because you're wrapped in a protective layer of… tentacles?

name: Psyche Split
card_text: Give a minion +1/+2. Summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: This is how the arakkoa make friends.

name: Refreshing Spring Water
card_text: Draw 2 cards.Refresh 2 Mana Crystals for each spell drawn.
flavor_text: "Mana" is just another name for "electrolytes."

name: Righteousness
card_text: Give your minions Divine Shield.
flavor_text: Shield yourself in righteousness! It feels like a warm fuzzy blanket.

name: Starfall
card_text: Choose One -Deal 5 damage to a minion; or 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Is the sky falling? Yes. Yes it is.

name: Volcano
card_text: Deal 15 damage randomly split among all minions.Overload: (2)
flavor_text: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

name: Ancestor's Call
card_text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

name: Assassinate
card_text: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor_text: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Astral Communion
card_text: Gain 10 Mana Crystals. Discard your hand.
flavor_text: Hey! Moon! Can I have some mana crystals?

name: Azsharan Ritual
card_text: Silence a minion and summon a copy of it. Put a 'Sunken Ritual' on the bottom of your deck.
flavor_text: The harmonious silence surrounding the ritual was unceremoniously BROKEN when HAROLD began eating stale potato chips.

name: Barricade
card_text: Summon a 2/4 Guard with Taunt. If it's your only minion, summon another.
flavor_text: The Alliance and Horde join forces to enforce the fire safety capacity.

name: Blastcrystal Potion
card_text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

name: Bloodbloom
card_text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor_text: Help save mana. Donate blood today!

name: Branching Paths
card_text: Choose Twice - Draw acard; Give your minions +1 Attack; Gain 6 Armor.
flavor_text:
Three paths diverged in a darkened hall, and I –
I took the one less traveled by,
And got eaten by a slime.

name: Cataclysm
card_text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
flavor_text: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

name: Consecration
card_text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor_text: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy. But it smells a little, too.

name: Dark Alley Pact
card_text: Summon a Fiendwith stats equal toyour hand size.
flavor_text: "With your help, I can finally install some proper lighting in this alley."

name: Dire Frenzy
card_text: Give a Beast +3/+3. Shuffle 3 copies into your deck with +3/+3.
flavor_text: It's always Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer. And Huffer.

name: Eternal Servitude
card_text: Discover a friendly minion that died this game. Summon it.
flavor_text: What do you mean I don't get overtime pay for this?!

name: Fire Sale
card_text: TradeableDeal 3 damageto all minions.
flavor_text: Everything is 50% off now that our warehouse burned down.

name: Fist of Jaraxxus
card_text: When you play or discard this, deal 4 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

name: Flanking Strike
card_text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Summon a 3/3 Wolf.
flavor_text: Wolves to the left and arrows to the right, here I am stuck in the middle with you.

name: Germination
card_text: Summon a copy of a friendly minion.Give the copy Taunt.
flavor_text: I regret asking how sporelings are made.

name: Avalanche
card_text: Freeze a minion and deal 3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor_text: One of our more snowbally cards.

name: Bite
card_text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn. Gain 4 Armor.
flavor_text: Chew your food!

name: Blessing of Kings
card_text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavor_text: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

name: Call in the Finishers
card_text: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor_text: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

name: Call to Arms
card_text: Recruit 3 minions that cost (2) or less.
flavor_text: More personal than a text to arms.

name: Cascading Disaster
card_text: Destroy a random enemyminion. Corrupt: Destroy 2.Corrupt Again: Destroy 3.
flavor_text: Please keep all hands, arms, feet and legs inside the ride until the monster comes to a complete stop.

name: Dun Baldar Bridge
card_text: After you summon aminion, give it +2/+2.Lasts 3 turns.
flavor_text: At least there's no fall damage in Hearthstone.

name: Echo of Medivh
card_text: Put a copy of each friendly minion into your hand.
flavor_text: Medivh's echo haunts Karazhan, eternally cheating at chess and Hearthstone.

name: Evolving Spores
card_text: Adapt your minions.
flavor_text: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

name: Fireball
card_text: Deal 6 damage.
flavor_text: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Grave Rune
card_text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon 2 copies of this."
flavor_text: I'm gravely sorry to rune this.

name: Greater Healing Potion
card_text: Restore 12 Health to a friendly character.
flavor_text: Filled with electrolytes!

name: Hammer of Wrath
card_text: Deal 3 damage.Draw a card.
flavor_text: A good paladin has many tools. Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Hex
card_text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor_text: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

name: Holy Nova
card_text: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor_text: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell. Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Imp-losion
card_text: Deal 2-4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
flavor_text: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

name: Invigorating Sermon
card_text: Give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor_text: Every underdog sports coach knows this one.

name: Juicy Psychmelon
card_text: Draw a 7, 8, 9, and10-Cost minion from your deck.
flavor_text: It's not juicy at all. IT'S JUST MESSING WITH YOUR HEAD.

name: Molten Reflection
card_text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

name: Mortal Strike
card_text: Deal 4 damage. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 6 instead.
flavor_text: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

name: Oaken Summons
card_text: Gain 6 Armor.Recruit a minion that costs (4) or less.
flavor_text: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

name: Polymorph
card_text: Transform a minioninto a 1/1 Sheep.
flavor_text: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Potion of Illusion
card_text: Add 1/1 copies of your minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor_text: Unfortunately, there's no potion that can make you unsee all the faces in that bottle.

name: Power Infusion
card_text: Give a minion +2/+6.
flavor_text: It infuses, it enthuses, it amuses!

name: Predatory Instincts
card_text: Draw a Beast from yourdeck. Double its Health.
flavor_text: Somebody’s been eating their funnel cakes.

name: Rally!
card_text: Resurrect a friendly1-Cost, 2-Cost, and3-Cost minion.
flavor_text: One for the squire, two for the gnome, three for the glory, and GO, GO, GO!

name: Sabotage
card_text: Destroy a random enemy minion. Combo: And your opponent's weapon.
flavor_text: Rogues can't stand it. They know you planned it! They are going to set you straight!

name: Hellfire
card_text: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters.
flavor_text: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Hysteria
card_text: Choose an enemy minion.It attacks randomminions until it dies.
flavor_text: "My mount and I share a special connection. Just not a good one."

name: Impbalming
card_text: Destroy a minion. Shuffle 3 Worthless Imps into your deck.
flavor_text: With your complexion, Imp Balm is a great demonizer.

name: Incanter's Flow
card_text: Reduce the Cost of spells in your deck by (1).
flavor_text: "Gettin' them discounts in bulk amounts, spells can come, and spells can go, castin' costs drop with my sweet, sweet flow."

name: Jade Lightning
card_text: Deal 4 damage. Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal 4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor_text: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

name: Kodo Mount
card_text: Give a minion +4/+2 and Rush. When it dies, summon a Kodo.
flavor_text: No matter how big they are or how many times you tell them no, they STILL won't stay off the couch.

name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
card_text: Lifesteal. Deal 3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

name: Mark of the Loa
card_text: Choose One -Give a minion +2/+4and Taunt; or Summontwo 3/2 Raptors.
flavor_text: Ah, yes. Mark. The mightiest Loa.

name: Marked Shot
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Discover a spell.
flavor_text: Obviously it's marked for greatness.

name: Mass Dispel
card_text: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor_text: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Mindgames
card_text: Put a copy ofa random minion fromyour opponent's deck into the battlefield.
flavor_text: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

name: Molten Breath
card_text: Deal 5 damage to aminion. If you're holdinga Dragon, gain 5 Armor.
flavor_text: Pizza so hot it burns OTHER PEOPLE’S MOUTHS.

name: Multi-Shot
card_text: Deal 3 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavor_text: You see, it's all about throughput.

name: Overgrowth
card_text: Gain two empty Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: Zangarmarsh: it's a fungal out there!

name: Poison Seeds
card_text: Destroy all minions and summon 2/2 Treants to replace them.
flavor_text: "Poisonseed Bagel" is the least popular bagel at McTiggin's Druidic Bagel Emporium.

name: Prismatic Lens
card_text: Draw a minion and a spell from your deck. Swap their Costs.
flavor_text: Mined exclusively from the dark side of the moon.

name: Rancor
card_text: Deal 2 damage to allminions. Gain 2 Armorfor each destroyed.
flavor_text: Wise men say "Only fools rush in." Wise Orcs say the opposite.

name: Shadow of Death
card_text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 'Shadows' into your deck that summon a copy when drawn.
flavor_text: Making new friends takes skill.

name: Shadow Word: Horror
card_text: Destroy all minions with 2 or less Attack.
flavor_text: It's more succinct than "Shadow Word: Suck Into Vortex."

name: Shadowflame
card_text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

name: Unsleeping Soul
card_text: Silence a friendly minion, then summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: It's 3 am. Do you know where your soul is?

name: Vendetta
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you're holding a card from another class.
flavor_text: A vengeful and vicarious vanguard against violent villains or vexed victims.

name: WANTED!
card_text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, add a Coin to your hand.
flavor_text: Wanted: Dead or Undead.

name: Wing Blast
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. If a minion died this turn, this costs (1).
flavor_text: Emeriss uses Wing Blast. It's super effective!

name: Wispering Woods
card_text: Summon a 1/1 Wisp foreach card in your hand.
flavor_text: We didn't actually fire the guy who named Dark Wispers.

name: Aimed Shot
card_text: Deal 3 damage. Your next Hero Power deals 2 more damage.
flavor_text: Wait, you WEREN'T aiming before?!

name: Apotheosis
card_text: Give a minion +2/+3 and Lifesteal.
flavor_text: Defined as the absolute pinnacle of existence. Plus Lifesteal.

name: Bash
card_text: Deal 3 damage.Gain 3 Armor.
flavor_text: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice. It doesn't.

name: BEEEES!!!
card_text: Choose a minion.Summon four 1/1 Beesthat attack it.
flavor_text: Right before CEEEES!!!

name: Blessing of the Ancients
card_text: TwinspellGive your minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: Arguably the cutest blessing.

name: Scorch
card_text: Deal 4 damage to aminion. Costs (1) if youplayed an Elementallast turn.
flavor_text:
The hoof.
The hoof.
The hoof is on fire.

name: Silvermoon Portal
card_text: Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random2-Cost minion.
flavor_text: What's Millhouse Manastorm doing in Silvermoon?

name: Soul of the Forest
card_text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
flavor_text: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

name: Swipe
card_text: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies.
flavor_text: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he's about to Swipe! ... or hug.

name: The Dark Portal
card_text: Draw a minion. If you have at least 8 cards in hand, it costs (5) less.
flavor_text: Some say it's the source of Azeroth's greatest problems—aside from the gnomes.

name: Tinker's Sharpsword Oil
card_text: Give your weapon +3 Attack. Combo: Give a random friendly minion +3 Attack.
flavor_text: "Get ready to strike oil!" - Super-cheesy battle cry

name: Vivid Spores
card_text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor_text: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

name: Walk the Plank
card_text: Destroy an undamaged minion.
flavor_text: Pirates will fall for anything.

name: Animal Companion
card_text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor_text: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer! Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Arcane Intellect
card_text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: Playing this card makes you SMARTER. And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Backfire
card_text: Draw 3 cards. Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: "That's the last time I let an imp spit gasoline into my car."

name: Beneath the Grounds
card_text: Shuffle 3 Ambushes into your opponent's deck. When drawn, you summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor_text: Can you hold these eggs for just a second? I promise they're not full of giant enraged undead spider things.

name: Bloodfury Potion
card_text: Give a minion +3 Attack.If it's a Demon, alsogive it +3 Health.
flavor_text: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

name: Breath of the Infinite
card_text: Deal 2 damage to all minions. If you're holding a Dragon, only damage enemies.
flavor_text: It's called "circular breathing."

name: Burgle
card_text: Add 2 random cards to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor_text: Yoink!

name: Charge
card_text: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
flavor_text: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Cinderstorm
card_text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor_text: Forecast: "Cloudy with a chance of fireballs."

name: Conjurer's Calling
card_text: TwinspellDestroy a minion. Summon 2 minions of the same Cost to replace it.
flavor_text: If only you’d let it go to voicemail…

name: Day at the Faire
card_text: Summon 3 SilverHand Recruits.Corrupt: Summon 5.
flavor_text: Karl knew he would someday regret that turkey leg.

name: Drain Life
card_text: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Duplicate
card_text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, put 2 copies of it into your hand.
flavor_text: The one time when duping cards won't get your account banned!

name: Elemental Destruction
card_text: Deal 4-5 damage to all minions. Overload: (5)
flavor_text: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

name: Envenom Weapon
card_text: Give your weapon Poisonous.
flavor_text: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

name: Explosive Runes
card_text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal 6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
flavor_text: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

name: Extra Arms
card_text: Give a minion +2/+2.Add 'More Arms!' to yourhand that gives +2/+2.
flavor_text: All the better to hug you with!

name: Far Sight
card_text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavor_text: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

name: Feat of Strength
card_text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +5/+5.
flavor_text: Generally happens right after the airing of grievances.

name: Feral Rage
card_text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
flavor_text: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

name: Blood Warriors
card_text: Add a copy of each damaged friendly minion to your hand.
flavor_text: They have an uneasy rivalry with the Blood Paladins.

name: Bogbeam
card_text: Deal 3 damage to a minion.Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: Some think the mysterious bright lights in the bog are alien invaders, others think they're just swamp gas. Turns out, it's just druids.

name: Bouncing Blade
card_text: Deal 1 damage to a random minion. Repeat until a minion dies.
flavor_text: Only goblins would think this was a good idea. Even they are starting to have their doubts.

name: Call to Adventure
card_text: Draw the lowest Cost minion from your deck. Give it +2/+2.
flavor_text: Even the smallest minion can change the outcome of the game.

name: Cone of Cold
card_text: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.
flavor_text: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Counterspell
card_text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor_text: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Dark Skies
card_text: Deal 1 damage to arandom minion. Repeatfor each card in your hand.
flavor_text: "It's a drizzle of fire. A fine mist, really."

name: Deadly Shot
card_text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Demonwrath
card_text: Deal 2 damage to allminions except Demons.
flavor_text: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.

name: Divine Favor
card_text: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
flavor_text: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

name: Effigy
card_text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, summon a random minion with the same Cost.
flavor_text: Burning man, brah.

name: Fan of Knives
card_text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor_text: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.
