name: Feral Spirit
card_text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

name: Flame Burst
card_text: Shoot 5 missiles at random enemies for 1 damage each.

name: Forgotten Torch
card_text: Deal 3 damage. Shuffle a 'Roaring Torch' into your deck that deals 6 damage.
flavor_text: Why does a forgotten torch turn into a roaring torch with no provocation? It's one of life's many mysteries.

name: Frost Nova
card_text: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Hey man, that's cold. Literally and metaphorically.

name: Frozen Clone
card_text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, add two copies of it to your hand.
flavor_text: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Fungal Fortunes
card_text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any minions drawn.
flavor_text: Far superior to a beanstalk boondoggle.

name: Gnash
card_text: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor_text: It's rude to gnash with your mouth open.

name: Haunting Visions
card_text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
flavor_text: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

name: Healing Rain
card_text: Restore 12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
flavor_text: It's filled with electrolytes!

name: Healing Wave
card_text: Restore 7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore 14 instead.
flavor_text: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

name: Hogger SMASH!
card_text: Deal 4 damage.

name: Ice Barrier
card_text: Secret: When yourhero is attacked,gain 8 Armor.
flavor_text: This is Rank 1. Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Ice Block
card_text: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
flavor_text: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

name: Infest
card_text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Beast to your hand."
flavor_text: The best part is the look on their face when you jump out of the cake! Err… corpse.

name: Kill Command
card_text: Deal 3 damage. If you control a Beast, deal5 damage instead.
flavor_text: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: Legacy of the Emperor
card_text: Give your minions +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)

name: Lightning Storm
card_text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor_text: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Mark of Nature
card_text: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
flavor_text: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature." Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

name: Master's Call
card_text: Discover a minion in your deck.If all 3 are Beasts,draw them all.
flavor_text: "Hello? Yes, this is Huffer."

name: Mimic Pod
card_text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text: Jinx!

name: Ferocious Howl
card_text: Draw a card.Gain 1 Armor for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: Have you ever heard the wolf cry to the blue corn moon?

name: Fiendish Circle
card_text: Summon four 1/1 Imps.
flavor_text: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

name: Flame Ward
card_text: Secret: After a minion attacks your hero, deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Not to be confused with the burn ward.

name: Full-Blown Evil
card_text: Deal 5 damage randomly split amongall enemy minions. Repeatable this turn.
flavor_text:
This isn’t your average, everyday evil.
This is ADVANCED evil.

name: Gift of Luminance
card_text: Give a minion Divine Shield, then summon a 1/1 copy of it.
flavor_text: You get a small version of yourself in a snow globe to remember the moment.

name: Headcrack
card_text: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
flavor_text: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

name: Healing Touch
card_text: Restore 8 Health.
flavor_text: 8 Health, no waiting.

name: Hunter's Pack
card_text: Add a random Hunter Beast, Secret, and weapon to your hand.
flavor_text: Oh look! It's a trap!

name: Impferno
card_text: Give your Demons +1 Attack. Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: Imps don't get mad when you set them on fire. They think it's cozy.

name: Jade Blossom
card_text: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.@Summon a Jade Golem. Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor_text: Meditating under a jade blossom is said to grant you wisdom, unless you have a pollen allergy.

name: Landscaping
card_text: Summon two 2/2 Treants.
flavor_text: We'll put a happy tree right here... and give him a little friend.

name: Lava Burst
card_text: Deal 5 damage. Overload: (2)
flavor_text: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

name: Mana Bind
card_text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
flavor_text: Nice spell. YOINK!

name: Mirror Entity
card_text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: "You go first." - Krush'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Mulch
card_text: Destroy a minion.Add a random minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor_text: Is this a noun or a verb? We will never know.

name: Muster for Battle
card_text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavor_text: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Netherwind Portal
card_text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a random4-Cost minion.
flavor_text: More aromatic than a regular portal.

name: Nine Lives
card_text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle minion that died this game. Also trigger its Deathrattle.
flavor_text: Beware the night of the living pets!

name: Oasis Ally
card_text: Secret: When afriendly minion isattacked, summon a3/6 Water Elemental.
flavor_text: As gentle as a bellyflop.

name: Palm Reading
card_text: Discover a spell. Reduce the Cost of spells in your hand by (1).
flavor_text: Actual palms not required.

name: Petting Zoo
card_text: Summon a 3/3 Strider. Repeat for each Secret you control.
flavor_text: Welcome to the petting zoo. DO NOT TOUCH THE ANIMALS.

name: Plague of Murlocs
card_text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
flavor_text: This is horrible! And adorable!

name: Primal Talismans
card_text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
flavor_text: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

name: Protect the King!
card_text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Pawn with Taunt.
flavor_text: Form ranks! Everyone into the King's Tuskarr Defense!

name: Raiding Party
card_text: Draw 2 Pirates from your deck.Combo: And a weapon.
flavor_text: And a bowl of chips. And some of those little cocktail weenies!

name: Reckless Flurry
card_text: Spend all your Armor. Deal that much damage to all minions.
flavor_text: Look. Cautious Flurries will only get you so far in life.

name: School Spirits
card_text: Deal 2 damage to allminions. Shuffle 2 SoulFragments into your deck.
flavor_text: "B-E A-G-G-R-E-S-S-I-V-E!"

name: Sense Demons
card_text: Draw 2 Demonsfrom your deck.
flavor_text: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

name: Shadow Bolt
card_text: Deal 4 damageto a minion.
flavor_text: It’s a Bolt. It's made out of Shadow. What more do you need to know!

name: Shadow Madness
card_text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor_text: You can rationalize it all you want, it's still a mean thing to do.

name: Shield Block
card_text: Gain 5 Armor.Draw a card.
flavor_text: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Simulacrum
card_text: Copy the lowest Cost minion in your hand.
flavor_text: It's like déjà vu, times two.

name: Spellbender
card_text: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavor_text: While it's fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild. It just feels meaner. And blood elves... well, they're a little mean.

name: Pilfered Power
card_text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal for each friendly minion.
flavor_text: The Hozen don't get paid much, but at least they get to keep any excess mana.

name: Polymorph: Boar
card_text: Transform a minion into a 4/2 Boar with Charge.
flavor_text: It's always Huffer.

name: Potion of Polymorph
card_text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, transform it into a1/1 Sheep.
flavor_text: Tastes like Baaaaananas.

name: Powershot
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor_text: pow POW pow

name: Rafaam's Scheme
card_text: Summon @ 1/1 |4(Imp, Imps). (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor_text: "When your first plan fails... imp-rovise."

name: Rigged Faire Game
card_text: Secret: If you didn't take any damage during your opponent's turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor_text: What's faire is fair.

name: Savage Roar
card_text: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze". It's probably not that, though.

name: Seal of Champions
card_text: Give a minion+3 Attack and Divine Shield.
flavor_text: "Arf! Arf! Arf!" - Seal of Champions

name: Serpentshrine Portal
card_text: Deal 3 damage.Summon a random3-Cost minion.Overload: (1)
flavor_text: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

name: Shadow Strike
card_text: Deal 5 damage to an undamaged character.
flavor_text: It's like a backstab, only from the front. And with two more stabs.

name: Small-Time Recruits
card_text: Draw three 1-Costminions from your deck.
flavor_text: Now we know why they wear tiny watches.

name: Spirit Echo
card_text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return this to your hand."
flavor_text: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

name: Splitting Image
card_text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: Sometimes you get punched so hard they see double.

name: Time Out!
card_text: Your hero is Immune until your next turn.
flavor_text: Highly effective against 3 year olds.

name: Twilight's Call
card_text: Summon 1/1 copies of 2 friendly Deathrattle minionsthat died this game.
flavor_text: If you’re experiencing resurrection sickness, press 1.

name: Unexpected Results
card_text: Summon two random2-Cost minions (improvedby Spell Damage).
flavor_text: Sometimes science is more art than science. A lot of people don’t get that.

name: Unleash the Hounds
card_text: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavor_text: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Vaporize
card_text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavor_text: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card. We may never know the truth.

name: Will of Mukla
card_text: Restore 8 Health.

name: Witching Hour
card_text: Summon a random friendly Beast that died this game.
flavor_text: The gates to the Gilnean pet cemetary MUST remain locked at all times.

name: Air Raid
card_text: TwinspellSummon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits with Taunt.
flavor_text: It's difficult to get an air raid together. You have to get twenty-five people, and they all want to play a paladin!

name: Ambush
card_text: Secret: After youropponent plays a minion,summon a 2/3 Ambusherwith Poisonous.
flavor_text: Clip-clop clip-clop CLIP-CLOP STAB!

name: Ancestral Knowledge
card_text: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (2)
flavor_text: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

name: Ancient Mysteries
card_text: Draw a Secret from your deck. It costs (0).
flavor_text: I'm not saying it was aliens, but it was TOTALLY aliens!

name: Spreading Madness
card_text: Deal 9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
flavor_text: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

name: Surrender to Madness
card_text: Destroy 3 of your ManaCrystals. Give all minionsin your deck +2/+2.
flavor_text: Never give up, always surrender!

name: Tidal Surge
card_text: LifestealDeal 4 damage to a minion.
flavor_text: Also good for removing pesky stains.

name: Totemic Reflection
card_text: Give a minion +2/+2.If it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
flavor_text: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

name: Treachery
card_text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to your opponent.
flavor_text: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

name: Unidentified Elixir
card_text: Give a minion +2/+2. Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor_text: "Here, taste this." (Slurp) "What is it?" "I don't know, I found it in one of the labs."

name: Unwilling Sacrifice
card_text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

name: Velen's Chosen
card_text: Give a minion +2/+4 and Spell Damage +1.
flavor_text: Velen wrote a "Lovely Card" for Tyrande with a picture of the Deeprun Tram that said "I Choo-Choo-Choose you!"

name: Vivid Nightmare
card_text: Choose a friendly minion.Summon a copy of it with1 Health remaining.
flavor_text: "I… I dreamed I accidentally crafted a golden Millhouse! It was so REAL!"

name: Volcanic Potion
card_text: Deal 2 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: The secret ingredient in Kazakus's award-winning chili recipe.

name: Wild Growth
card_text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor_text: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

name: A Light in the Darkness
card_text: Discover a minion.Give it +1/+1.
flavor_text: Wait, how can you have a light in the dark? If you turn on a light while it’s dark, doesn’t that mean it’s no longer dark?

name: Ancestral Spirit
card_text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor_text: It was just a flesh wound.

name: Astral Rift
card_text: Add 2 random minions to your hand.
flavor_text: Let's see what's behind rift number one!

name: Bamboozle
card_text: Secret: When one ofyour minions is attacked,transform it into a randomone that costs (3) more.
flavor_text: "WE DO YOU A BAMBOOZLE, HOOMAN!"

name: Bear Trap
card_text: Secret: After your hero is attacked, summon a 3/3 Bear with Taunt.
flavor_text: You'll never guess what's in that conveniently bear-sized, bear-smelling box.

name: Big Bad Voodoo
card_text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."
flavor_text: Murlocs practice Small Nice Voodoo.

name: Bolster
card_text: Give your Taunt minions +2/+2.
flavor_text: The best offense is a good defense.

name: Bring It On!
card_text: Gain 10 Armor. Reduce the Cost of minions in your opponent's hand by (2).
flavor_text: Brrr, it's cold in here. Let's hope she doesn't have an Auctioneer!

name: Bulk Up
card_text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +1/+1 and copy it.
flavor_text: "For breakfast I usually go for a couple of kodo steaks, 5 Plainstrider eggs and an ice-cold milk to wash it down… all raw."

name: Cheat Death
card_text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.It costs (2) less.
flavor_text: Reported.

name: Clever Disguise
card_text: Add 2 random spells from another class to your hand.
flavor_text: "It me! Togwaggle!"

name: Cold Blood
card_text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
flavor_text: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

name: Convert
card_text: Put a copy of an enemy minion into your hand.
flavor_text: "Are you interested in... HEALTH benefits?!"

name: Corrosive Breath
card_text: Deal 3 damage to aminion. If you're holdinga Dragon, it also hitsthe enemy hero.
flavor_text: It's a breath of fresh terror!

name: Corsair Cache
card_text: Draw a weapon.Give it +1/+1.
flavor_text: Where's a corsair's favorite place to hide treasure? Under their deck!

name: Cram Session
card_text: Draw 1 |4(card, cards) (improved by Spell Damage).
flavor_text: The font of the arcane gives nearly limitless access to power and energy! But it can't keep you awake, for that we still use coffee.

name: Crushing Hand
card_text: Deal 8 damage to a minion. Overload: (3)
flavor_text: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

name: Crystalsong Portal
card_text: Discover a Druid minion. If your hand has no minions, keep all 3.
flavor_text: Experience the draw of the wild!

name: Curse of Weakness
card_text: EchoGive all enemy minions -2 Attack until your next turn.
flavor_text: Warlocks refer to this as a "balance change."

name: Dark Conviction
card_text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 3.
flavor_text: In his court, Uther is judge, jury, AND executioner…

name: Dart Trap
card_text: Secret: After an opposing Hero Power is used, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.
flavor_text: Five years of tap-dancing lessons are FINALLY going to pay off!

name: Arcane Explosion
card_text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Battle Rage
card_text: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
flavor_text: "You won't like me when I'm angry."

name: Betrayal
card_text: Force an enemy minion to deal its damage to the minions next to it.
flavor_text: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

name: Blade Flurry
card_text: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemy minions.
flavor_text: "Look, it's not just about waving daggers around really fast. It's a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

name: Bola Shot
card_text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and 2 damage to its neighbors.
flavor_text: On second thought, bolas aren't very good against flying worms.

name: Bomb Toss
card_text: Deal 2 damage. Summon a 0/2 Goblin Bomb.
flavor_text: Me throw face.

name: Book of Specters
card_text: Draw 3 cards. Discard any spells drawn.
flavor_text: Known throughout the land as the Spooky-nomicon.

name: Breath of Dreams
card_text: Draw a card. If you're holding a Dragon, gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor_text: Ysera has the worst morning breath.

name: Call Pet
card_text: Draw a card.If it's a Beast, it costs (4) less.
flavor_text: Real hunters tame hungry crabs.

name: Cat Trick
card_text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, summon a 4/2 Panther with Stealth.
flavor_text: "I know some new tricks, a lot of good tricks. I will show them to you. Medivh will not mind at all if I do."

name: Cheap Shot
card_text: Echo Deal 2 damage to a minion.
flavor_text: 50% off. Every shot must go!

name: Cleave
card_text: Deal 2 damage totwo random enemyminions.
flavor_text: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Commanding Shout
card_text: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn. Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

name: Condemn (Rank 1)
card_text: Deal 1 damage toall enemy minions.(Upgrades when youhave 5 Mana.)
flavor_text: "I wished you no harm, but for your cruelty, by the light, I condemn you all!" Xyrella shouted, unaware that irony was not her strong suit.

name: Confuse
card_text: Swap the Attack and Health of all minions.
flavor_text: This minion is really powerful!

name: Conviction (Rank 1)
card_text: Give a random friendlyminion +3 Attack.(Upgrades when youhave 5 Mana.)
flavor_text: It was the strength of Cariel's faith that emboldened the defenders of Northwatch that day. Although the strength of her giant hammer didn’t exactly hurt either.

name: Corrupting Mist
card_text: Curse all minions. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
flavor_text: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

name: Crackle
card_text: Deal 3-6 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Snap! This card! Pop!

name: Cryostasis
card_text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Freeze it.
flavor_text: We'll thaw you out when we find a cure!

name: Curse of Rafaam
card_text: Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.While they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
flavor_text: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.

name: Cybertech Chip
card_text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Add a random Mech to your hand."
flavor_text: Goes great with Cyber-Salsa.

name: Darkbomb
card_text: Deal 3 damage.
flavor_text: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

name: Dead Man's Hand
card_text: Shuffle a copy of your hand into your deck.
flavor_text: I got two pair, Rags and Armorsmiths. What you got?

name: Defile
card_text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
flavor_text: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

name: Demonfuse
card_text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
flavor_text: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

name: Desperate Stand
card_text: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Return this to life with 1 Health."
flavor_text: They're grateful for the help, but most minions would prefer not dying in the first place.

name: Dinomancy
card_text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
flavor_text: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

name: Dirty Tricks
card_text: Secret: After youropponent casts a spell,draw 2 cards.
flavor_text: "Ahh sand in my eyes! Also, I'm being stabbed."

name: Divine Hymn
card_text: Restore 6 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor_text: Taken up an octave, it's highly effective against stained glass golems.

name: Embrace the Shadow
card_text: This turn, your healing effects deal damage instead.
flavor_text: For when your Auchenai Soulpriests call in sick.

name: Explorer's Hat
card_text: Give a minion +1/+1 and "Deathrattle: Add an Explorer's Hat to your hand."
flavor_text: Harrison Jones was disappointed that he didn't get to be part of the League of Explorers, but his hat did.

name: Feign Death
card_text: Trigger all Deathrattles on your minions.
flavor_text: The hardest part about doing a "Feign Death" convincingly is learning how to make the right smell. It takes a lot of commitment.

name: Forge of Souls
card_text: Draw 2 weapons from your deck.
flavor_text: Powerful weaponry forged by Bronjahm, the Godfather of Souls.

name: Freezing Trap
card_text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor_text: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Frostbolt
card_text: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
flavor_text: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Furious Howl
card_text: Draw a card.Repeat until you have at least 3 cards.
flavor_text: Hunters make the worst neighbors.

name: Grievous Bite
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion and 1 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor_text: Ooh. I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

name: Heroic Strike
card_text: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: Really, if you're a hero, this is every strike.

name: Holy Light
card_text: Restore 8 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Demonfire
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
flavor_text: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

name: Demonic Project
card_text: Each player transforms a random minion in their hand into a Demon.
flavor_text: Another group project where Jaraxxus doesn't do any work.

name: Devolve
card_text: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
flavor_text: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

name: Divine Spirit
card_text: Double a minion's Health.
flavor_text: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

name: Dragon Roar
card_text: Add 2 random Dragons to your hand.
flavor_text: Not to be confused with Dragon Yodel.

name: Drain Soul
card_text: LifestealDeal 3 damageto a minion.
flavor_text: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Dreamway Guardians
card_text: Summon two 1/2 Dryads with Lifesteal.
flavor_text: They're a nightmare to deal with.

name: Earthen Might
card_text: Give a minion +2/+2.If it's an Elemental, adda random Elementalto your hand.
flavor_text: Or it might not.

name: Earthen Scales
card_text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor_text: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

name: Elementary Reaction
card_text: Draw a card. Copy it if you played an Elemental last turn.
flavor_text: It's just a Tempest Tantrum.

name: Equality
card_text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor_text: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Evasion
card_text: Secret: After your hero takes damage, become Immune this turn.
flavor_text: Works on weapons, missiles, and taxes.

name: Eviscerate
card_text: Deal 2 damage. Combo: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavor_text: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Explore Un'Goro
card_text: Replace your deck with copies of "Discover a card."
flavor_text: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

name: Explosive Trap
card_text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavor_text: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Flame Geyser
card_text: Deal 2 damage.Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavor_text: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

name: Flamecannon
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: Calling something a flamecannon really doesn't do much to distinguish it from other goblin devices.

name: Flash of Light
card_text: Restore 4 Health.Draw a card.
flavor_text: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Frozen Buckler
card_text: Gain 10 Armor. At the start of your next turn, lose 5 Armor.
flavor_text: "Hey, I bet I could shatter this."

name: Gang Up
card_text: Choose a minion. Shuffle 3 copies of it into your deck.
flavor_text: If you are thinking about visiting Moonbrook, you better roll deep.

name: Goblin Prank
card_text: Give a friendly minion +3/+3 and Rush. It dies at end of turn.
flavor_text: "Ha ha! Glork looks ridiculous! ...Glork? Glork?"

name: Guard the City
card_text: Gain 3 Armor.Summon a 2/3 Naga with Taunt.
flavor_text: At thousands of feet below the surface, it's a pretty high-pressure job.

name: Hand of A'dal
card_text: Give a minion +2/+1.Draw a card.
flavor_text: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

name: Hidden Cache
card_text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, give a random minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: There is an urban legend that the first Toxic Sewer Ooze was born because a rookie Goon stashed an open container of milk in a Hidden Cache.

name: Ice Fishing
card_text: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor_text: Glow fish, war fish... blow fish, more fish...

name: Icicle
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it's Frozen, draw a card.
flavor_text: This may appear weak at frost glance, but it's actually a very ice spell.

name: Imp Swarm (Rank 1)
card_text: Summon a 3/2 Imp. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor_text: Not a cauldron, or a mischief, or a cackle, but a swarm.

name: Insight
card_text: Draw a minion. Corrupt: Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor_text: Shouldn't the eyes be facing backwards for insight?

name: Jade Shuriken
card_text: Deal 2 damage.Combo: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal 2 damage.Combo: Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor_text: Good news is, after you remove it from your wound, you can use it to pay your medical bills!

name: Lava Shock
card_text: Deal 2 damage.Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.

name: Leader of the Pack
card_text: Give your minions +1/+1.

name: Lesser Pearl Spellstone
card_text: Summon a 2/2 Spirit with Taunt. @(Restore 3 Health to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
In ages old, when Ancients broke
Azari of the Legion spoke
To tempt the mortals: gems of power
The weak succumbed, their souls devoured.

name: Lightforged Blessing
card_text: TwinspellGive a friendly minion Lifesteal.
flavor_text: Some might call this a lightforgery.

name: Lunar Eclipse
card_text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Your next spell this turn costs (2) less.
flavor_text: When the Azeroth is between the Sun and the Moon.

name: Misdirection
card_text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, instead it attacks another random character.
flavor_text: Sometimes it's as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

name: Nitroboost Poison
card_text: Give a minion +2 Attack.Corrupt: And your weapon.
flavor_text: Pouring iced milk into your vehicle's fuel tank does NOT provide a Nitro boost, but it does go great with your victory cookies.

name: Penance
card_text: LifestealDeal 3 damage to a minion.
flavor_text: This is what happens when you don’t give a sincere apology.

name: Plagiarize
card_text: Secret: At the end of your opponent's turn, add copies of the cards they played to your hand.
flavor_text: Copying is just using your resources wisely.

name: Potion of Heroism
card_text: Give a minion Divine Shield.Draw a card.
flavor_text: Also known as "Liquid Courage."

name: Pressure Plate
card_text: Secret: After your opponent casts a spell, destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: The appropriate dishware for stressful situations.

name: Primordial Glyph
card_text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor_text: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

name: In Formation!
card_text: Add 2 random Taunt minions to your hand.
flavor_text: None can doubt the strength of the Scholomance student body.

name: Ironbark
card_text: Give a minion +1/+3 and Taunt.Costs (0) if you have at least 7 Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: "The important thing, son, is to protect your spores! I have spoken!"

name: Lesser Ruby Spellstone
card_text: Add 1 random Mage spell to your hand. @(Play 2 Elementals to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
The final stone undid its master
Spun into wards by nameless caster
Azari wailed a savage roar
Now sealed in nether, evermore.

name: Libram of Wisdom
card_text: Give a minion +1/+1and "Deathrattle: Adda 'Libram of Wisdom'spell to your hand."
flavor_text: The best wisdom is passed on.

name: Maelstrom Portal
card_text: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Summon a random1-Cost minion.
flavor_text: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.

name: Mark of the Wild
card_text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+3.(+2 Attack/+3 Health)
flavor_text: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Mark of Y'Shaarj
card_text: Give a minion +2/+2.If it's a Beast, drawa card.
flavor_text: Y'Shaarj had three sons: Mark, Theodore, and Chris.

name: Mind Blast
card_text: Deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

name: Minefield
card_text: Deal 5 damage randomly split among all minions.
flavor_text: Dodge bombs like you're playing Tonksweeper!

name: Nether Breath
card_text: Deal 2 damage.If you're holding a Dragon, deal 4 damage with Lifesteal instead.
flavor_text:
"Whether the Nether is cold,
whether the Nether is hot,
we'll burn together,
whatever the Nether,
whether we like it or not."

name: Pack Tactics
card_text: Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/3 copy.
flavor_text: "Just you wait, I’ll go get on my main!"

name: Pick Pocket
card_text: EchoAdd a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor_text: He'll pick anyone's pocket, except a gnome's. He'd never stoop so low.

name: Plot Twist
card_text: Shuffle your handinto your deck.Draw that many cards.
flavor_text: It’s coming from inside the deck!

name: Power of the Wild
card_text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
flavor_text: Never look a panther in the eye. Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'? Well, it's one of those.

name: Power Word: Feast
card_text: Give a minion +2/+2. Restore it to full Health at the end of this turn.
flavor_text: Some people are here for the stellar, world-renowned academic program. Others are here for the buffet.

name: Purify
card_text: Silence a friendly minion. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Even better than a hot shower with vigorous scrubbing!

name: Pursuit of Justice
card_text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavor_text: "Is this about justice or just us?"

name: Quick Shot
card_text: Deal 3 damage.If your hand is empty, draw a card.
flavor_text: Han shot first.

name: Rampage
card_text: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavor_text: Minion get ANGRY. Minion SMASH!

name: Razorpetal Volley
card_text: Add two Razorpetals to your hand that deal 1 damage.
flavor_text: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

name: Rebuke
card_text: Enemy spells cost (5) more next turn.
flavor_text: When one buke just isn’t enough.

name: Research Project
card_text: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavor_text: Abstract: Analyzing systemic applications of coldlight data sets vis-a-vis shuffle-related paradigms. Conclusion: Yay, cards!

name: Revenge
card_text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. If you have 12 or less Health, deal 3 damage instead.
flavor_text: This is better than Arcane Explosion, so I guess warriors are finally getting revenge on mages for Mortal Strike being worse than Fireball.

name: Rising Winds
card_text: TwinspellChoose One - Draw a card; or Summon a 3/2 Eagle.
flavor_text: Do not talk to me or my chick ever again.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
card_text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Rocket Boots
card_text: Give a minion Rush. Draw a card.
flavor_text: This is the happiest moment of Grik's life. We'll miss him.

name: Roll the Bones
card_text: Draw a card.If it has Deathrattle, cast this again.
flavor_text: Call it: Heads or Tailbone…

name: Sap
card_text: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavor_text: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Seal of Light
card_text: Restore 4 Health to your hero and gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: The walrus of Light restores EIGHT Health.

name: Shadow or Light?
card_text: Choose One - Each player draws 2 cards; or Restore 8 Health to each hero.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
card_text: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
flavor_text: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Shatter
card_text: Destroy a Frozen minion.
flavor_text: What's cooler than being cool?

name: Shiv
card_text: Deal 1 damage.Draw a card.
flavor_text: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

name: Sleep with the Fishes
card_text: Deal 3 damage to all damaged minions.
flavor_text: If you're sleeping with the fishes, we highly suggest not bringing an electric blanket.

name: Solar Eclipse
card_text: The next spell you cast this turn casts twice.
flavor_text: When the Moon is between the Sun and the Azeroth.

name: Soul of the Murloc
card_text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
flavor_text: Previously thought nonexistent.

name: Stolen Goods
card_text: Give a random Taunt minion in your hand +3/+3.
flavor_text: It fell off a kodo, I promise!

name: Stomp
card_text: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.

name: Pursuit of Justice
card_text: Give +1 Attack to Silver Hand Recruits you summon this game.
flavor_text: "Is this about justice or just us?"

name: Rapid Fire
card_text: TwinspellDeal 2 damage.
flavor_text: Pew! Pew!

name: Rat Trap
card_text: Secret: After youropponent plays threecards in a turn, summona 6/6 Rat.
flavor_text: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

name: Reincarnate
card_text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavor_text: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.

name: Renounce Darkness
card_text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
flavor_text: SEE YA DARKNESS!

name: Resurrect
card_text: Summon a random friendly minion that died this game.
flavor_text: I walked into the dungeon and noticed a slain adventurer. In his final moments, he had scrawled out a message in the dust on the wall beside him. Two words: "rez plz"

name: Revenge of the Wild
card_text: Summon your Beasts that died this turn.
flavor_text: My roommates only use Revenge of the Passive Aggressive.

name: Seance
card_text: Choose a minion. Add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor_text:
“The spirits spoke to me.”
"What did they say?"
"You had lethal two turns ago."

name: Shadow Visions
card_text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
flavor_text: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

name: Shadow Word: Death
card_text: Destroy a minion with 5 or more Attack.
flavor_text: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Shadowform
card_text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor_text: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Slam
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor_text: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Snake Trap
card_text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
flavor_text: Why did it have to be snakes?

name: Snipe
card_text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal 4 damage to it.
flavor_text: A great sniper hits the spot. Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

name: Soul Shear
card_text: Deal 3 damage to aminion. Shuffle 2 SoulFragments into your deck.
flavor_text: "Just a little off the sides please."

name: Sound the Bells!
card_text: EchoGive a minion +1/+2.
flavor_text: Weirdly, the bells stop ringing after 5.

name: Spirit Lash
card_text: LifestealDeal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: We've got spirit, yes we do! We've got spirit, stolen from you!

name: Stolen Steel
card_text: Discover a weapon (from another class).
flavor_text: Because Thrall wouldn't lend me Doomhammer.

name: Stormcrack
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

name: Subdue
card_text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 1.
flavor_text: Like humility but more humiliating.

name: Summon a Panther
card_text: Summon a 3/2 Panther.

name: Thrive in the Shadows
card_text: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor_text: Why would your spells be afraid of the dark? It's easier to nap there.

name: Toxic Arrow
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If it survives, give it Poisonous.
flavor_text: What doesn't kill you makes you toxic.

name: Venomstrike Trap
card_text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon a 2/3 Poisonous Cobra.
flavor_text: Snakes on a frozen plain.

name: Violet Haze
card_text: Add 2 random Deathrattle cards to your hand.
flavor_text: Elite Tauren Chieftain's next hit single.

name: Warpath
card_text: EchoDeal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: "Left, right, left, right, there's none of the enemy left… Right?"

name: Weapons Project
card_text: Each player equips a 2/3 weapon andgains 6 Armor.
flavor_text: Harrison Jones was kicked off this project.

name: Windfury
card_text: Give a minion Windfury.
flavor_text: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Witchwood Apple
card_text: Add three 2/2 Treants to your hand.
flavor_text: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

name: Wrath
card_text: Choose One -Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damageand draw a card.
flavor_text: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Activate the Obelisk
card_text: Quest: Restore 15 Health.Reward: Obelisk's Eye.
flavor_text: A one-eyed, one stone, towering purple minion healer.

name: Arcane Blast
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.
flavor_text: Now with 100% more blast!

name: Arcane Missiles
card_text: Deal 3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor_text: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

name: Sudden Betrayal
card_text: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, instead it attacks one of its neighbors.
flavor_text: You thought he was your bro-bold, but turns out he's your foe-bold.

name: Swindle
card_text: Draw a spell.Combo: And a minion.
flavor_text: You know, it's probably just cheaper to find a place that sells the plushie…

name: Thoughtsteal
card_text: Copy 2 cards in your opponent's deck and add them to your hand.
flavor_text: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc? Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Twisted Knowledge
card_text: Discover 2 Warlock cards.
flavor_text: People eat eight spiders in their sleep per year. Centaurs have two rib cages. Dwarves are just counterfeit titans.

name: Unstable Portal
card_text: Add a random minion to your hand. It costs (3) less.
flavor_text: The denizens of Azeroth have no idea how much work goes into stabilizing portals. We spend like 30% of GDP on portal upkeep.

name: Wandering Monster
card_text: Secret: When an enemy attacks your hero, summon a 3-Cost minion as the new target.
flavor_text: Not all who wander are lost. This one is lost though, for sure.

name: Waxmancy
card_text: Discover a Battlecry minion. Reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor_text:
The waxmancer works with flame and form, giving shape to figures warm.
Some think he's a crazy creeper, but crafting minions is simply cheaper.

name: Wicked Stab (Rank 1)
card_text: Deal 2 damage. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor_text: Always go for the glowing weak point.

name: Witch's Brew
card_text: Restore 4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor_text: The swill has eyes!

name: Adaptation
card_text: Adapt a friendly minion.
flavor_text: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

name: Altar of Fire
card_text: Destroy the top 3 cards of each deck.
flavor_text: "I now pronounce you, Crispy and Fried."

name: Arcane Breath
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a spell.
flavor_text: One of many side effects from eating mana cookies.

name: Arcane Shot
card_text: Deal 2 damage.
flavor_text: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves. The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Autodefense Matrix
card_text: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, give it Divine Shield.
flavor_text: We call it the bubble machine.

name: Awaken the Makers
card_text: Quest: Summon7 Deathrattle minions.Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
flavor_text: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

name: Barkskin
card_text: Give a minion +3 Health. Gain 3 Armor.
flavor_text: Make like a tree… and gain armor.

name: Barrel Toss
card_text: Deal 2 damage.

name: Bestial Wrath
card_text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor_text: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface. Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

name: Binding Heal
card_text: Restore 5 Health to a minion and your hero.
flavor_text: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

name: Blessing of Might
card_text: Give a minion +3 Attack.
flavor_text: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Blood To Ichor
card_text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
flavor_text: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

name: Brain Freeze
card_text: Freeze a minion. Combo: Also deal 3 damage to it.
flavor_text: "The professor called on me, and I totally froze!"

name: Call of the Void
card_text: Add a random Demon to your hand.
flavor_text:
"Marco!"
"Polo!"
"Marco!"
"Who dares summon me?!"

name: Claw
card_text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Gain 2 Armor.
flavor_text: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

name: Cloning Device
card_text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Zerek got sick of fighting over the remote.

name: Corrupt the Waters
card_text: Quest: Play 6 Battlecrycards.Reward: Heart of Vir'naal.
flavor_text: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

name: Corruption
card_text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavor_text: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM! Corrupted!

name: Crystal Power
card_text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage to a minion; or Restore 5 Health.
flavor_text: Often used as healing crystals, but also good for throwing at people.

name: Daring Escape
card_text: Return all friendly minions to your hand.
flavor_text: Impossible to cast without cackling evilly.

name: Avenge
card_text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
flavor_text: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force". Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.

name: Bananas
card_text: Give a minion +1/+1.

name: Barbed Nets
card_text: Deal 2 damage to anenemy. If you played aNaga while holding this,choose a second target.
flavor_text: I caught'ya a dollar.

name: Bazaar Burglary
card_text: Quest: Add 4 cards fromother classes to your hand.Reward: Ancient Blades.
flavor_text: Just when you set up your "All-Natural Scented Candles" at the farmer's market and then some STUPID KOBOLD COMES AND TAKES THEM ALL!

name: Biology Project
card_text: Each player gains 2 Mana Crystals.
flavor_text:
Step 1: Grow giant evil strawberry.
Step 2: ????
Step 3: Rule Azeroth!

name: Blazing Invocation
card_text: Discover a Battlecry minion.
flavor_text: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
card_text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
flavor_text: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

name: Boom Squad
card_text: Discover a Lackey, Mech, or Dragon.
flavor_text: Discover the meaning of squad goals.

name: Breath of Sindragosa
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy minion and Freeze it.
flavor_text: Is it cold in here or is it just Sindragosa?

name: Clear the Way
card_text: Sidequest: Summon3 Rush minions.Reward: Summon a4/4 Gryphon with Rush.
flavor_text: The terrifying part is the gryphons' squeaky voices afterward.

name: Competitive Spirit
card_text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself. Or kill all the competitors.

name: Conceal
card_text: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
flavor_text: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions. You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

name: Crystology
card_text: Draw two 1-Attackminions from your deck.
flavor_text: "The Light is neither a particle nor a wave. It's more of a juice, really."

name: Dark Pact
card_text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

name: Dark Possession
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
flavor_text: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

name: Deadly Poison
card_text: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells. Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison? Poison Elemental? Nobody wants that.

name: Desperate Measures
card_text: TwinspellCast a random Paladin Secret.
flavor_text: Desperate times call for disparate secrets.

name: Draconic Studies
card_text: Discover a Dragon. Yournext one costs (1) less.
flavor_text: Our Draconic Studies program has a high rate of burnout.

name: Evolve
card_text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavor_text: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

name: Execute
card_text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor_text: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Eye for an Eye
card_text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

name: Felosophy
card_text: Copy the lowest CostDemon in your hand.Outcast: Give both +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Like, isn't evil subjective man?"

name: First Flame
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Add a Second Flame to your hand.
flavor_text: You never forget your first love: fire.

name: Flash Heal
card_text: Restore 5 Health.
flavor_text: Flash! Ahhhhhhh~

name: Floop's Glorious Gloop
card_text: Whenever a minion dies this turn, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor_text:
How much gloop could Floop's Gloop gloop if Floop's Gloop
could gloop gloop?

name: Forked Lightning
card_text: Deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor_text: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

name: Frost Shock
card_text: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavor_text: FROST SHOCK!

name: Getaway Kodo
card_text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Get to da Kodo! Now!

name: Devastate
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a damaged minion.
flavor_text: No thanks, I already devast-ate.

name: Devolving Missiles
card_text: Shoot three missilesat random enemy minionsthat transform them intoones that cost (1) less.
flavor_text: Most intermural spell-dueling contests end with a field of wisps.

name: Divine Strength
card_text: Give a minion +1/+2.
flavor_text: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

name: Doomerang
card_text: Throw your weapon at a minion. It deals its damage, then returns to your hand.
flavor_text: Guaranteed to return your weapon directly to your hand! (Wear gloves. Thick ones.)

name: Dragon's Hoard
card_text: Discover a Legendary minion from another class.
flavor_text: The Alliance loves this hoard.

name: Earth Shock
card_text: Silence a minion, then deal 1 damage to it.
flavor_text: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

name: Embalming Ritual
card_text: Give a minion Reborn.
flavor_text: "Guess what! We're getting a new cat."

name: Evocation
card_text: Fill your hand with random Mage spells.At the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor_text: You too could be the winner of the national spelling spree!

name: Finders Keepers
card_text: Discover a card with Overload. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: INFINITE LOOP!

name: Fire Plume's Heart
card_text: Quest: Play7 Taunt minions.Reward: Sulfuras.
flavor_text: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

name: First Day of School
card_text: Add 2 random 1-Cost minions to your hand.
flavor_text: "Report to the bookstore to buy your books, the alchemist to buy your potions, and then get your wands at the… wandryroom?"

name: Flare
card_text: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but it's also great for parties!

name: Focused Will
card_text: Silence a minion, then give it +3 Health.
flavor_text: Extreme focus is almost as effective as a really flashy distraction.

name: Galloping Savior
card_text: Secret: After youropponent plays threecards in a turn, summon a3/4 Steed with Taunt.
flavor_text: "Look to my coming on the first light of the third card."

name: Grim Rally
card_text: Destroy a friendly minion. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: There’s no “Aiiiieeee” in “Team.”

name: Hallucination
card_text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
flavor_text: It's the good kind of hallucination.

name: Hidden Wisdom
card_text: Secret: After youropponent plays threecards in a turn, draw2 cards.
flavor_text: Find your own wisdom. Perhaps behind the couch.

name: Humility
card_text: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavor_text: This card makes something really damp. Oh wait. That's "Humidity."

name: Ice Lance
card_text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal 4 damage instead.
flavor_text: The trick is not to break the lance. Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces." Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

name: Improve Morale
card_text: Deal 1 damageto a minion.If it survives, add aLackey to your hand.
flavor_text: "The beatings will continue until MY morale improves."

name: Inner Fire
card_text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavor_text: Good idea: Buffing your minions. Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Into the Fray
card_text: Give all Taunt minions in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: "You are in my FRAY!"

name: Journey Below
card_text: Discover a Deathrattle card.
flavor_text: Don't stop believing there's something below.

name: Learn Draconic
card_text: Sidequest: Spend8 Mana on spells.Reward: Summon a6/6 Dragon.
flavor_text: Upon taking up the spellbook, Reno realized with a start: "I can't read."

name: Leeching Poison
card_text: Give your weapon Lifesteal this turn.
flavor_text: No actual leeches were harmed in the creation of this card.

name: Lightning Bolt
card_text: Deal 3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Lock and Load
card_text: Each time you cast a spell this turn, add a random Hunter card to your hand.
flavor_text:
Rexxar narrowed his eyes, grabbed his machine gun, and said: "It's go time. Lock and load."
This card pays homage to that special moment.

name: Magic Trick
card_text: Discover a spell that costs (3) or less.
flavor_text: The world is not ready for an illusion of this depth and intricacy!

name: Making Mummies
card_text: Quest: Play 5 Rebornminions.Reward: Emperor Wraps.
flavor_text: "I do say, this gives me the vapors every single time!"

name: Mark of the Lotus
card_text: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: The mark of the Lotus is a little flower drawn in permanent marker on the ankle.

name: Mirror Image
card_text: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavor_text: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

name: Hand of Protection
card_text: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavor_text: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Holy Smite
card_text: Deal 3 damageto a minion.
flavor_text: It doesn't matter how pious you are. Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Hunter's Mark
card_text: Change a minion's Health to 1.
flavor_text: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

name: I Know a Guy
card_text: Discover a Taunt minion.
flavor_text: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

name: Iron Hide
card_text: Gain 5 Armor.
flavor_text: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

name: Jade Idol
card_text: Choose One - Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.@Choose One - Summon a Jade Golem; or Shuffle 3 copies of this card into your deck.
flavor_text: Shuffle or no guts.

name: Jungle Giants
card_text: Quest: Summon5 minions with5 or more Attack.Reward: Barnabus.
flavor_text: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

name: Lakkari Sacrifice
card_text: Quest: Discard 6 cards.Reward: Nether Portal.
flavor_text: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

name: Lesser Jasper Spellstone
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. @(Gain 3 Armor to upgrade.)
flavor_text:
In ancient woods, elves fought the curse
The demon’s shadow to disperse
But hatred raged and frail souls turned
Now horned and hooved their forests burned.

name: Light of the Naaru
card_text: Restore 3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
flavor_text: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

name: Living Roots
card_text: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavor_text: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Lost in the Jungle
card_text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
flavor_text: George and Karl were never heard from again.

name: Mind Vision
card_text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavor_text: I see what you did there.

name: Mortal Coil
card_text: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor_text: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Naturalize
card_text: Destroy a minion.Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavor_text: Another one bites the dust.

name: Noble Sacrifice
card_text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavor_text: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: On the Hunt
card_text: Deal 1 damage.Summon a 1/1 Mastiff.
flavor_text: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

name: Open the Waygate
card_text: Quest: Cast 8 spells thatdidn't start in your deck.Reward: Time Warp.
flavor_text: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

name: Pilfer
card_text: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavor_text: The class is always greener on the other side of the board.

name: Pint-Size Potion
card_text: Give all enemy minions-3 Attack this turn only.
flavor_text: I hope you didn't disenchant your Shadow Word: Horror!

name: Power Overwhelming
card_text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
flavor_text: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is. It's CRAZY bad! Maybe worse than that. Just don't do it.

name: Primordial Studies
card_text: Discover a Spell Damage minion. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor_text: A long forgotten tome whose very essence seeps of magic. 40 dust, used.

name: Rain of Fire
card_text: Deal 1 damage to all characters.
flavor_text: You know it’s autumn when the skies rain brimstone and fire. Also: pumpkin spice!

name: Raven Idol
card_text: Choose One -Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
flavor_text: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothian Idol.

name: Reckoning
card_text: Secret: After an enemy minion deals 3 or more damage, destroy it.
flavor_text: He would henceforth be known as "Karmerr, the Doom of Kazzak."

name: Repentance
card_text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavor_text: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Righteous Cause
card_text: Sidequest: Summon 5 minions.Reward: Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: "And I hereby dub thee a cadet of the Explorer’s League! NEXT!"

name: Nature Studies
card_text: Discover a spell. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor_text: "I have a first edition! Go ahead, count the rings."

name: Never Surrender!
card_text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, give your minions +2 Health.
flavor_text: But sometimes concede.

name: Oh My Yogg!
card_text: Secret: When youropponent casts a spell,they instead cast a randomone of the same Cost.
flavor_text: Many wonders lie within, but they are not mere toys when your mind is their plaything.

name: Omega Assembly
card_text: Discover a Mech. If youhave 10 Mana Crystals,keep all 3 cards.
flavor_text: They told Dr. Boom he could only pick one. He disagreed.

name: Plague of Flames
card_text: Destroy all your minions.For each one, destroy arandom enemy minion.
flavor_text: This is fine.

name: Play Dead
card_text: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor_text: He's a very literal dog.

name: Potion of Madness
card_text: Gain control of an enemy minion with 2 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavor_text: You'd be insane NOT to drink it!

name: Power Word: Glory
card_text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health toyour hero.
flavor_text: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding. Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

name: Power Word: Shield
card_text: Give a minion +2 Health.Draw a card.
flavor_text: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Primal Fusion
card_text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
flavor_text: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

name: Psionic Probe
card_text: Copy a spell in your opponent's deck and add it to your hand.
flavor_text: She prefers calling it "Psionic Tickling."

name: Radiance
card_text: Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: Because you're worth it!

name: Raid the Sky Temple
card_text: Quest: Cast 10 spells.Reward: Ascendant Scroll.
flavor_text: "Why can't I hold all these scrolls?"

name: Ray of Frost
card_text: TwinspellFreeze a minion.If it's already Frozen,deal 2 damage to it.
flavor_text: If you have zero chill, this can help.

name: Redemption
card_text: Secret: When a friendly minion dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavor_text: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time. It’s a mystery!

name: Renew
card_text: Restore 3 Health. Discover a spell.
flavor_text: I am rejuvenated, I am renewed, I am my own nightlight!

name: Sacred Trial
card_text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
flavor_text: You have chosen poorly.

name: Savagery
card_text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
flavor_text: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

name: Secret Plan
card_text: Discover a Secret.
flavor_text: The secret is... There is no plan!

name: Shadow Word: Devour
card_text: Choose a minion.It steals 1 Health from ALL other minions.
flavor_text: Devouring souls is like a buffet. You have to take a little bit of everything.

name: Shield Slam
card_text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor_text: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Shooting Star
card_text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
flavor_text: Literally starstruck.

name: Sinister Deal
card_text: Discover a Lackey.
flavor_text:
"So, what's in the sack?"
"Something... sinister."
"Okay, it's a deal."

name: Smuggler's Run
card_text: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: One of the most famous busts in Gadgetzan’s history happened on Smuggler’s Run, where Sergeant Sally apprehended a cadre of Grimy Goons transporting a massive number of illegal fish heads.

name: Soul Infusion
card_text: Give theleft-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

name: Soulfire
card_text: Deal 4 damage.Discard a random card.
flavor_text: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

name: Spirit Bomb
card_text: Deal 4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavor_text: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: Sand Breath
card_text: Give a minion +1/+2.Give it Divine Shield ifyou're holding a Dragon.
flavor_text: After Uldum, EVERYONE had sand breath.

name: Secret Passage
card_text: Replace your hand with 4 cards from your deck. Swap back next turn.
flavor_text: I use this to sneak out at night and do some villainous baking in the kitchen.

name: Secure the Deck
card_text: Sidequest: Attack twice with your hero. Reward: Add 3 'Claw' spells to your hand.
flavor_text: "Tied it down, boss. I don't really know why you asked me to do that."

name: Shriek
card_text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Deal 2 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: The first warning sign of an oncoming warlock temper tantrum.

name: Sinister Strike
card_text: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor_text: There's something about this strike that just feels off. Sinister, even.

name: Smuggler's Crate
card_text: Give a random Beast in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: Are you sure these are the crates that are supposed to go to the Gadgetzan petting zoo?

name: Snap Freeze
card_text: Freeze a minion.If it's already Frozen, destroy it.
flavor_text: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.

name: Stage Dive
card_text: Draw a Rush minion. Corrupt: Give it +2/+1.
flavor_text: The most metal trust fall.

name: Stampede
card_text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add a random Beast to your hand.
flavor_text: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

name: Storm's Wrath
card_text: Give your minions +1/+1.Overload: (1)
flavor_text: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

name: Supreme Archaeology
card_text: Quest: Draw 20 cards.Reward: Tome of Origination.
flavor_text: Archaeology is the discovery of rare and powerful artifacts. Supreme Archaeology is TAKING THEM!

name: The Beast Within
card_text: Give a friendly Beast +1/+1, then it attacks a random enemy minion.
flavor_text: Undoes years of obedience school training.

name: The Caverns Below
card_text: Quest: Play four minionswith the same name.Reward: Crystal Core.
flavor_text: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

name: The Marsh Queen
card_text: Quest: Play seven1-Cost minions.Reward: Queen Carnassa.
flavor_text: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

name: The Soularium
card_text: Draw 3 cards.At the end of your turn, discard them.
flavor_text: Worst field trip ever.

name: Togwaggle's Scheme
card_text: Choose a minion. Shuffle @ |4(copy, copies) of it into your deck.(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor_text: "Many minions equals many treasures for king. Kobold arithmetic!"

name: Touch of the Nathrezim
card_text: Deal 2 damage to aminion. If it dies, restore3 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: "You're giving your soul to me? I'm touched."

name: Tracking
card_text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor_text: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Transcendence
card_text: Until you kill Cho's minions, he can't be attacked.

name: Treenforcements
card_text: Choose One - Give aminion +2 Health andTaunt; or Summon a2/2 Treant.
flavor_text: Treemendous value!

name: Unseal the Vault
card_text: Quest: Summon 20 minions.Reward: Pharaoh's Warmask.
flavor_text: "Huh... That's a nice card back."

name: Untapped Potential
card_text: Quest: End 4 turnswith any unspent Mana.Reward: Ossirian Tear.
flavor_text: The official term is "strategic laziness."

name: Wicked Whispers
card_text: Discard your lowest Cost card. Give your minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: When the Old Ones whisper, others will scream.

name: Worthy Expedition
card_text: Discover a Choose One card.
flavor_text: This isn't where I parked my mount.

name: The Last Kaleidosaur
card_text: Quest: Cast 6 spellson your minions.Reward: Galvadon.
flavor_text: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

name: Tome of Intellect
card_text: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
flavor_text: Just a compilation of napkins of intellect.

name: Totemic Smash
card_text: Deal 2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
flavor_text: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

name: Toxic Reinforcements
card_text: Sidequest: Use your HeroPower three times.Reward: Summon three2/1 Leper Gnomes.
flavor_text: In the event of a sudden loss of cabin pressure, a slingshot will be deployed for convenient evacuation.

name: Unite the Murlocs
card_text: Quest: Summon10 Murlocs.Reward: Megafin.
flavor_text: Form feet and legs! Form arms and body! Oh. Sorry. I was thinking about Mechafin.

name: Unstable Evolution
card_text: EchoTransform a friendly minion into one that costs (1) more.
flavor_text: They grow up so fast.

name: Upgrade!
card_text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavor_text: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Voltaic Burst
card_text: Summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Batteries have three components: Cathode, Anode, and Overload.

name: Whirlwind
card_text: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor_text: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Wildfire
card_text: Your Hero Powerdeals 1 more damagethis game.
flavor_text: The Barrens were a lush jungle. Then this happened.

name: Wound Prey
card_text: Deal 1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavor_text: You steal the cranberry juice, you pay the price.

name: Ancestral Healing
card_text: Restore a minionto full Health andgive it Taunt.
flavor_text: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

name: Backstab
card_text: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor_text: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Beakered Lightning
card_text: Deal 1 damage to all minions. Overload: (2)
flavor_text: Working in a shaman's lab, it's important to be well-grounded.

name: Circle of Healing
card_text: Restore 4 Health to ALL minions.
flavor_text: It isn't really a circle.

name: Counterfeit Coin
card_text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor_text: There is something funny about this coin… can't quite put my finger on it…

name: Elemental Evocation
card_text: The next Elemental you play this turn costs (2) less.
flavor_text: It's just lighter fluid.

name: Embiggen
card_text: Give all minions in your deck +2/+2. They cost (1) more (up to 10).
flavor_text: Did you set it to "wumbo?"

name: Flurry (Rank 1)
card_text: Freeze a random enemy minion. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor_text: Flurry, Flurrier, Flurriest.

name: Forbidden Flame
card_text: Spend all your Mana. Deal that much damage to a minion.
flavor_text: WARNING: This flame is not to be used unless you are a licensed acolyte of the Old Gods.

name: Forbidden Ritual
card_text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
flavor_text: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

name: Freezing Potion
card_text: Freeze an enemy.
flavor_text: This is delicious! Oh no. BRAIN FREEEEEEEZE!

name: Forbidden Healing
card_text: Spend all your Mana. Restore twice that much Health.
flavor_text: No one's quite sure why it's forbidden. And yes, that should make you nervous.

name: Forbidden Shaping
card_text: Spend all your Mana. Summon a random minion that costs that much.
flavor_text: But the minion arrives covered in goo.

name: Forbidden Words
card_text: Spend all your Mana.Destroy a minion with thatmuch Attack or less.
flavor_text: Please confirm your age before reading this flavor text.

name: Inner Rage
card_text: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavor_text: They're only smiling on the outside.

name: Innervate
card_text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor_text: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Lazul's Scheme
card_text: Reduce the Attack of an enemy minion by@ until your next turn. (Upgrades each turn!)
flavor_text:
"What's that you're dreaming?
You're weak and you're screaming!
It must be my scheming..."

name: Lightning Bloom
card_text: Refresh 2 Mana Crystals.Overload: (2)
flavor_text: Curiously, this plant never blooms in the same place twice.

name: Moonfire
card_text: Deal 1 damage.
flavor_text: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

name: Mutate
card_text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor_text: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

name: Pounce
card_text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn.
flavor_text: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.

name: Preparation
card_text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor_text: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Raise Dead
card_text: Deal 3 damage to your hero. Return two friendly minions that died this game to your hand.
flavor_text: Technically, it’s just really late healing.

name: Regenerate
card_text: Restore 3 Health.
flavor_text: Finally a cure for degenerates.

name: Ritual of Doom
card_text: Destroy a friendly minion. If you had 5 or more, summon a5/5 Demon.
flavor_text: "Who wants to sing the Doom song?!"

name: Sacrificial Pact
card_text: Destroy a friendly Demon. Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavor_text: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Shadowstep
card_text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor_text: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance. Crowds love it.

name: Shifting Scroll
card_text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random Mage spell.
flavor_text: Next turn, this is going to be AMAZING.

name: Silence
card_text: Silence a minion.
flavor_text: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

name: The Coin
card_text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor_text: Whether you spend it or save it, it's always there for a second.

name: Totemic Surge
card_text: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavor_text: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

name: Topsy Turvy
card_text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.
flavor_text: "Help! I've fallen and I can't get down!"

name: Totemic Might
card_text: Give your Totems +2 Health.
flavor_text: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Zap!
card_text: Deal 2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavor_text: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

name: Silver Sword
card_text: After your hero attacks, give your minions +1/+1.
flavor_text: Silver’s malleability limits its utility as an edged weapon. On the other hand... SHINY!

name: The Runespear
card_text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spelland cast it with random targets.
flavor_text: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

name: Gorehowl
card_text: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavor_text: Grommash Hellscream's famous axe. Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar's possession. Quite the mystery!

name: Aluneth
card_text: At the end of your turn, draw 3 cards.
flavor_text: PHENOMENAL ARCANE POWER…itty bitty living space.

name: Hammer of the Naaru
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
flavor_text: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

name: Sul'thraze
card_text: Overkill: You may attack again.
flavor_text: “Griftah here with de Sul’chop. One chop, you get four damage. Two chops, eight damage - you gonna change de way you fight."

name: Val'anyr
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a minion in your hand +4/+2. When it dies, reequip this.
flavor_text: Recently unearthed in one of the deepest kobold caves. Traded for a large candle.

name: Farraki Battleaxe
card_text: Overkill: Give a minion in your hand +2/+2.
flavor_text: Only two things in life are certain: death and axes.

name: Hammer of Twilight
card_text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Elemental.
flavor_text: Stop! It's Twilight Hammer time.

name: Piranha Launcher
card_text: After your hero attacks,summon a 1/1 Piranha.
flavor_text: A great improvement over the guppy launcher.

name: Tentacles for Arms
card_text: Deathrattle: Return this to your hand.
flavor_text: That's right. Garrosh just slapped you to death with a tentacle.

name: Brass Knuckles
card_text: After your hero attacks,give a random minion inyour hand +1/+1.
flavor_text: For the goon that wants to make a fashion statement.

name: Light's Sorrow
card_text: After a friendly minion loses Divine Shield, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: These sorrows cut deep.

name: Obsidian Shard
card_text: Costs (1) less for eachcard you've played fromanother class.
flavor_text: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

name: Outrider's Axe
card_text: After your hero attacks and kills a minion, draw a card.
flavor_text: "I only have to get 4 Zhevra hooves? How hard could that be?"

name: Poisoned Blade
card_text: Your Hero Power gives this weapon +1 Attack instead of replacing it.
flavor_text: How much more poisoned can a blade get? The answer is a lot. A lot more poisoned.

name: Rinling's Rifle
card_text: After your hero attacks, Discover a Secret and cast it.
flavor_text: This rifle needs a muzzle for its muzzle.

name: Woecleaver
card_text: After your hero attacks, Recruit a minion.
flavor_text: Turn that frown into TWO frowns!

name: Gladiator's Longbow
card_text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor_text: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Rhok'delar
card_text: Battlecry: If your deck has no minions, fill your hand with Hunter spells.
flavor_text: Rhok'delar is ready to Rhok'de'casbah!

name: Vinecleaver
card_text: After your hero attacks,summon two 1/1 SilverHand Recruits.
flavor_text: George and Karl! Thank the Light we found you!

name: Arcanite Reaper
flavor_text: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

name: Doomhammer
card_text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
flavor_text: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall. His name is a total coincidence.

name: Fool's Bane
card_text: Unlimited attacks each turn. Can't attack heroes.
flavor_text: A fool and his bane are soon parted.

name: Skull of the Man'ari
card_text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
flavor_text: Don't trust the skull.

name: Supercollider
card_text: After you attack a minion,force it to attack oneof its neighbors.
flavor_text:
Boom's Second Law of Motion:
HIT IT VERY HARD!

name: Assassin's Blade
flavor_text: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin. Certificate of authenticity included.

name: Blood Razor
card_text: Battlecry and Deathrattle:Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: For the close shave that you've always wanted. Caution: Very sharp.

name: Charged Hammer
card_text: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor_text: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

name: Death's Bite
card_text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor_text: "Take a bite outta Death." - McScruff the Deathlord

name: Spectral Cutlass
card_text: LifestealWhenever you play a cardfrom another class,gain +1 Durability.
flavor_text: So sharp it can cut through a spectral tomato!

name: Ancharrr
card_text: After your hero attacks, draw a Pirate from your deck.
flavor_text: The problem with anchors is they often end up sinking to the bottom of your deck.

name: Coghammer
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield and Taunt.
flavor_text: So you ripped this out of a machine, carved some runes on it, stuck it on a handle, and now it's a weapon of great divine power? Seems legit.

name: Hooked Scimitar
card_text: Combo: Gain +2 Attack.
flavor_text: Oooooooooooow. I'm hooked on a scimitar!

name: King's Defender
card_text: Battlecry: If you have a minion with Taunt, gain +1 Durability.
flavor_text: "King's Attacker" is a shield. Funny, huh?

name: Ogre Warmaul
card_text: 50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor_text: Simple, misguided, and incredibly dangerous. You know, like most things ogre.

name: Overlord's Whip
card_text: After you play a minion, deal 1 damage to it.
