flavor_text: "This merit badge is for cruelty. This one's for whipping. And this one is for embroidery..."

name: Powermace
card_text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavor_text: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

name: Rallying Blade
card_text: Battlecry: Give +1/+1 to your minions with Divine Shield.
flavor_text: As far as blades go, this one is pretty great in the motivation department.

name: Self-Sharpening Sword
card_text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: You no longer have to bring a stack of #2 swords to a test!

name: Stormhammer
card_text: Doesn't lose Durability while you control a Dragon.
flavor_text: It brings the storm before the calm.

name: Swinetusk Shank
card_text: After you play a Poison, gain +1 Durability.
flavor_text: Comes with a rack of ribs!

name: Swordfish
card_text: Battlecry: Dredge.If it's a Pirate, give this weapon and the Pirate +2 Attack.
flavor_text: While you were partying, I studied the fish.

name: Splitting Axe
card_text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
flavor_text: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

name: Truesilver Champion
card_text: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
flavor_text: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn't want to.)

name: Twig of the World Tree
card_text: Deathrattle: Gain 10 Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: For druids who want to branch out.

name: Waggle Pick
card_text: Deathrattle: Returna random friendlyminion to your hand.It costs (2) less.
flavor_text: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Cogmaster's Wrench
card_text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
flavor_text: For tightening cogs and smashin' troggs!

name: Desert Spear
card_text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Locust with Rush.
flavor_text: Goes on the right, next to the desert spoon.

name: Dragon Soul
card_text: After you cast 3 spells in a turn, summon a 5/5 Dragon.
flavor_text: Crafted by Deathwing's goblin horde, but the dragon added the rainbow sparkles himself.

name: Eaglehorn Bow
card_text: Whenever a friendlySecret is revealed,gain +1 Durability.
flavor_text: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor_text: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Harpoon Gun
card_text: After your hero attacks, Dredge. If it's a Beast, reduce its Cost by (3).
flavor_text: Get ooooover here!

name: Ice Breaker
card_text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by this.
flavor_text: A great way to end a conversation.

name: Livewire Lance
card_text: After your Hero attacks, add a Lackey to your hand.
flavor_text: The lance is heavy but it’s the battery pack that really does a number on the shoulders.

name: Necrium Blade
card_text: Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly minion.
flavor_text: Grab death by the handle.

name: Perdition's Blade
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
flavor_text: Perdition's Blade is Ragnaros's back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

name: Shadowblade
card_text: Battlecry: Your hero is Immune this turn.
flavor_text: It's tacky to call it "Shadeblade."

name: Sword of Justice
card_text: After you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
flavor_text: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Unidentified Maul
card_text: Gains a bonus effect in your hand.
flavor_text: When all you have is an unidentified maul, everything else looks like an unidentified nail.

name: Whack-A-Gnoll Hammer
card_text: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor_text: Hogger's most hated attraction.

name: Bladed Gauntlet
card_text: Has Attack equal to your Armor. Can't attack heroes.
flavor_text: CAUTION: DO NOT SCRATCH NOSE.

name: Glaivezooka
card_text: Battlecry: Give a random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavor_text: For the times when a regular bazooka just isn't enough.

name: Headhunter's Hatchet
card_text: Battlecry: If youcontrol a Beast, gain+1 Durability.
flavor_text: Zul'jin's primary recruiting tool.

name: Jade Claws
card_text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.Overload: (1)@Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.Overload: (1)
flavor_text: "Best manicure ever!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Likkim
card_text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor_text: "I double frog dare you!"

name: Mysterious Blade
card_text: Battlecry: If you control aSecret, gain +1 Attack.
flavor_text: It knows every secret you have left.

name: Bloodclaw
card_text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavor_text: This weapon – ow! Requires a little – OWW! Finesse.

name: Candleshot
card_text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavor_text: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.

name: Cursed Blade
card_text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
flavor_text: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.

name: Underlight Angling Rod
card_text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor_text: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Argent Lance
card_text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, +1 Durability.
flavor_text: The stripes make it look like a candy cane, but we recommend against licking it.

name: Stormforged Axe
card_text: Overload: (1)
flavor_text: Yo, that's a nice axe.

name: Sword of the Fallen
card_text: After your hero attacks,cast a Secret fromyour deck.
flavor_text: Hoarding secrets is no fun, so play each and every one.

name: Woodcutter's Axe
card_text: Deathrattle: Give +2/+1 to a random friendly Rush minion.
flavor_text: It's a lumberjack's axe and that's ok.

name: Kingsbane
card_text: Always keepsenchantments.Deathrattle: Shuffle thisinto your deck.
flavor_text: But it has a soft spot for emperors.

name: Light's Justice
flavor_text: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Molten Blade
card_text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
flavor_text: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

name: Sphere of Sapience
card_text: At the start of your turn,look at your top card. Youcan put it on the bottom and lose 1 Durability.
flavor_text: This is what it sounds like when spheres scry.

name: Spirit Claws
card_text: Has +2 Attack while youhave Spell Damage.
flavor_text: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.

name: Serrated Tooth
card_text: Deathrattle: Give your minions Rush.
flavor_text: The tooth hurts, don’t it?

name: Trueaim Crescent
card_text: After your Hero attacks a minion, your minions attack it too.
flavor_text: You could have just pointed.
